  7400                                  cmos_clock_read:	
  7401 0000226D 50                      		push	ax
  7402 0000226E 51                      		push	cx
  7403 0000226F 52                      		push	dx
  7404 00002270 55                      		push	bp
  7405 00002271 31ED                    		xor	bp, bp
  7406                                  loop_clock:				
  7407 00002273 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  7408 00002275 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7409 00002277 B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  7410 00002279 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7411                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  7412                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  7413                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  7414 0000227B 83F900                  		cmp	cx, 0
  7415 0000227E 7512                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7416 00002280 83FA00                  		cmp	dx, 0
  7417 00002283 750D                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7418 00002285 83FD01                  		cmp	bp, 1		; read again after a slight delay, in case clock
  7419 00002288 741C                    		jz	short no_readdate ; was	at zero	setting.
  7420 0000228A 45                      		inc	bp		; only perform delay once.
  7421 0000228B B90040                  		mov	cx, 4000h	; 16384
  7422                                  delay:					
  7423 0000228E E2FE                    		loop	delay
  7424 00002290 EBE1                    		jmp	short loop_clock
  7425                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7426                                  
  7427                                  clock_present:				
  7428 00002292 2EC606[F304]01          		mov	byte [cs:havecmosclock], 1 ; set the flag for cmos clock
  7429 00002298 E81000                  		call	cmosck		; reset	cmos clock rate	that may be
  7430                                  					; possibly destroyed by	cp dos and
  7431                                  					; post routine did not restore that.
  7432 0000229B 56                      		push	si
  7433 0000229C E88AF2                  		call	read_real_date	; read real-time clock for date
  7434 0000229F FA                      		cli
  7435                                  		;mov	ds:daycnt, si	; set system date
  7436 000022A0 8936[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], si
  7437 000022A4 FB                      		sti
  7438 000022A5 5E                      		pop	si
  7439                                  
  7440                                  no_readdate:				
  7441 000022A6 5D                      		pop	bp
  7442 000022A7 5A                      		pop	dx
  7443 000022A8 59                      		pop	cx
  7444 000022A9 58                      		pop	ax
  7445 000022AA C3                      		retn
  7446                                  
  7447                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7448                                  
  7449                                  ; the following code is written by jack gulley in engineering group.
  7450                                  ; cp dos (CP/DOS, OS/2) is changing cmos clock rate for its own purposes
  7451                                  ; and if the use cold boot the system to use pc dos while running cp dos,
  7452                                  ; the cmos clock rate are still slow which slow down disk operations
  7453                                  ; of pc dos which uses cmos clock. pc dos is put this code in msinit
  7454                                  ; to fix this problem at the request of cp dos.
  7455                                  ;
  7456                                  ; the program is modified to be run on msinit. equates are defined
  7457                                  ; in cmosequ.inc. this program will be called by cmos_clock_read procedure.
  7458                                  ;
  7459                                  ;  the following code cmosck is used to insure that the cmos has not
  7460                                  ;	had its rate controls left in an invalid state on older at's.
  7461                                  ;
  7462                                  ;	it checks for an at model byte "fc" with a submodel type of
  7463                                  ;	00, 01, 02, 03 or 06 and resets the periodic interrupt rate
  7464                                  ;	bits in case post has not done it. this initilization routine
  7465                                  ;	is only needed once when dos loads. it should be run as soon
  7466                                  ;	as possible to prevent slow diskette access.
  7467                                  ;
  7468                                  ;	this code exposes one to dos clearing cmos setup done by a
  7469                                  ;	resident program that hides and re-boots the system.
  7470                                  
  7471                                  cmosck:					; check and reset rtc rate bits	
  7472                                  
  7473                                  ;model byte and submodel byte were already determined in msinit.
  7474                                  
  7475                                  	; 16/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7476                                  	; 19/03/2018 (Model: 0FCh, Sub Model: 01h, REF: AMIBIOS Prog. Guide)
  7477                                  			
  7478 000022AB 50                      		push	ax
  7479 000022AC 2E803E[3E06]FC          		cmp	byte [cs:model_byte], 0FCh
  7480 000022B2 7525                    		jnz	short cmosck9	; Exit if not an AT model
  7481 000022B4 2E803E[3F06]06          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 6
  7482                                  					; Is it 06 for the industral AT ?
  7483 000022BA 7408                    		jz	short cmosck4	; Go reset CMOS	periodic rate if 06
  7484 000022BC 2E803E[3F06]04          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 4
  7485                                  					; Is it 00, 01, 02, or 03 ?
  7486 000022C2 7315                    		jnb	short cmosck9	; EXIT if problem fixed by POST  
  7487                                  					; Also,Secondary_model_byte = 0 
  7488                                  					;   when AH=0C0h, int 15h failed.
  7489                                  					;	RESET THE CMOS PERIODIC RATE 
  7490                                  					;  Model=FC submodel=00,01,02,03 or 06 
  7491                                  cmosck4:				
  7492 000022C4 B08A                    		mov	al, 8Ah		; cmos_reg_a|nmi
  7493                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7494 000022C6 B426                    		mov	ah, 26h		; 00100110b
  7495                                  					; Set divider &	rate selection
  7496 000022C8 E83000                  		call	cmos_write
  7497 000022CB B08B                    		mov	al, 8Bh		; cmos_reg_b|nmi
  7498                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7499 000022CD E80B00                  		call	cmos_read
  7500 000022D0 2407                    		and	al, 7		; 00000111b
  7501                                  					; clear	SET,PIE,AIE,UIE,SQWE
  7502 000022D2 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  7503 000022D4 B00B                    		mov	al, 0Bh		; cmos_reg_b
  7504                                  					; NMI enabled on return
  7505 000022D6 E82200                  		call	cmos_write
  7506                                  cmosck9:				
  7507 000022D9 58                      		pop	ax
  7508 000022DA C3                      		retn
  7509                                  
  7510                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7511                                  
  7512                                  ;--- CMOS_READ -----------------------------------------------------------------
  7513                                  ;		read byte from cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7514                                  ;									       :
  7515                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be read				       :
  7516                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7517                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to read		       :
  7518                                  ;									       :
  7519                                  ; output: (al)	value at location (al) moved into (al). if bit 7 of (al) was   :
  7520                                  ;		on then nmi left disabled.  during the cmos read both nmi and  :
  7521                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7522                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7523                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7524                                  ;		only the (al) register and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7525                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7526                                  
  7527                                  cmos_read:				; read location (al) into (al)	
  7528 000022DB 9C                      		pushf
  7529 000022DC FA                      		cli
  7530 000022DD 53                      		push	bx
  7531 000022DE 50                      		push	ax		; AL = cmos table address to be	read
  7532 000022DF 0C80                    		or	al, 80h
  7533 000022E1 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7534                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7535 000022E3 90                      		nop			; (undocumented	delay needed)
  7536 000022E4 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7537 000022E6 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax
  7538 000022E8 58                      		pop	ax
  7539 000022E9 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7540 000022EB 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7541 000022ED E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7542                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7543 000022EF 90                      		nop
  7544 000022F0 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7545 000022F2 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7546 000022F4 5B                      		pop	bx
  7547 000022F5 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7548 000022F6 E80100                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7549 000022F9 C3                      		retn			; return with flags restored
  7550                                  
  7551                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7552                                  
  7553                                  cmos_popf:				
  7554 000022FA CF                      		iret			; popf for level b- parts
  7555                                  					; return far and restore flags
  7556                                  
  7557                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7558                                  
  7559                                  ;--- cmos_write ----------------------------------------------------------------
  7560                                  ;		write byte to cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7561                                  ;									       :
  7562                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be written to			       :
  7563                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7564                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to write		       :
  7565                                  ;	 (ah)=	new value to be placed in the addressed table location	       :
  7566                                  ;									       :
  7567                                  ; output:	value in (ah) placed in location (al) with nmi left disabled   :
  7568                                  ;		if bit 7 of (al) is on. during the cmos update both nmi and    :
  7569                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7570                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7571                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7572                                  ;		only the cmos location and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7573                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7574                                  
  7575                                  cmos_write:				; write (ah) to location (al)	
  7576 000022FB 9C                      		pushf			; write (ah) to location (al)
  7577 000022FC 50                      		push	ax		; save work register values
  7578 000022FD FA                      		cli
  7579 000022FE 50                      		push	ax		; save user nmi	state
  7580 000022FF 0C80                    		or	al, 80h		; disable nmi for us
  7581 00002301 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7582                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7583 00002303 90                      		nop
  7584 00002304 88E0                    		mov	al, ah
  7585 00002306 E671                    		out	71h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7586 00002308 58                      		pop	ax		; get user nmi
  7587 00002309 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7588 0000230B 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7589 0000230D E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7590                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7591 0000230F 90                      		nop
  7592 00002310 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7593 00002312 58                      		pop	ax		; restore work registers
  7594 00002313 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7595 00002314 E8E3FF                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7596 00002317 C3                      		retn
  7597                                  
  7598                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7599                                  ; MSINIT.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  7600                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7601                                  ; The following routines provide support for reading in the file MSDOS.SYS.
  7602                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7603                                  
  7604                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7605                                  ;
  7606                                  ; (For Retro DOS, 'IO.SYS' and 'MSDOS.SYS' are already loaded together
  7607                                  ;  at once -as single kernel file- by the Retro DOS boot sector code.
  7608                                  ;  So, following disk reads -MSDOS.SYS loading- is not needed!
  7609                                  ;  Only needing is to move MSDOS Kernel to it's final memory location.) 
  7610                                  
  7611                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7612                                  
  7613                                  ; GetClus, read in a cluster at a specified address
  7614                                  ;
  7615                                  ;  bx = cluster to read
  7616                                  ;  cx = sectors per cluster
  7617                                  ;  es:di = load location
  7618                                  
  7619                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7620                                  ;DISKRD equ diskrd - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h	; (8E5h for MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7621                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7622                                  DISKRD equ diskrd
  7623                                  
  7624                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7625                                  getclus:				
  7626 00002318 51                      		push	cx
  7627 00002319 57                      		push	di
  7628 0000231A 2E890E[D016]            		mov	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7629 0000231F 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7630 00002321 48                      		dec	ax
  7631 00002322 48                      		dec	ax
  7632 00002323 F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to logical sector
  7633                                  					; dx:ax	= matching logical sector number
  7634                                  					;	  starting from the data sector
  7635 00002325 2E0306[CC16]            		add	ax, [cs:bios_l]
  7636 0000232A 2E1316[CE16]            		adc	dx, [cs:bios_h]	; dx:ax	= first	logical	sector to read
  7637                                  unpack:					
  7638 0000232F 1E                      		push	ds
  7639 00002330 50                      		push	ax
  7640 00002331 53                      		push	bx
  7641 00002332 2E8B36[D316]            		mov	si, [cs:fatloc]
  7642 00002337 8EDE                    		mov	ds, si
  7643 00002339 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; next cluster
  7644 0000233B 2EF606[D216]40          		test	byte [cs:fbigfat], 40h	; fbig
  7645                                  					; 16 bit fat?
  7646 00002341 753C                    		jnz	short unpack16	; yes
  7647 00002343 D1EE                    		shr	si, 1		; 12 bit fat. si=si/2
  7648                                  					; si = clus + clus/2
  7649 00002345 01DE                    		add	si, bx		;
  7650                                  					; (si =	byte offset of the cluster in the FAT)
  7651 00002347 52                      		push	dx
  7652 00002348 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7653 0000234A E87C00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7654 0000234D 5A                      		pop	dx
  7655 0000234E 8B07                    		mov	ax, [bx]	; save it into ax
  7656 00002350 7517                    		jnz	short even_odd	; if not a splitted fat, check even-odd.
  7657                                  		; 25/06/2023
  7658                                  		;mov	al, [bx]	; splitted fat
  7659 00002352 2EA2[DA16]              		mov	[cs:temp_cluster], al
  7660 00002356 46                      		inc	si		; (next	byte)
  7661 00002357 52                      		push	dx
  7662 00002358 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7663 0000235A E86C00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7664 0000235D 5A                      		pop	dx
  7665                                  		;mov	al, ds:0
  7666 0000235E A00000                  		mov	al, [0] ; 19/10/2022
  7667 00002361 2EA2[DB16]              		mov	[cs:temp_cluster+1], al
  7668 00002365 2EA1[DA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:temp_cluster]
  7669                                  even_odd:				
  7670 00002369 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore old fat entry	value
  7671 0000236A 53                      		push	bx		; save it right	away.
  7672 0000236B D1EB                    		shr	bx, 1		; was it even or odd?
  7673 0000236D 7308                    		jnb	short havclus	; it was even.
  7674 0000236F D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1		; odd. massage fat value and keep
  7675                                  					; the highest 12 bits.
  7676 00002371 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7677 00002373 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7678 00002375 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7679                                  havclus:				
  7680 00002377 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax		; now bx = new fat entry.
  7681 00002379 81E3FF0F                		and	bx, 0FFFh	; keep low 12 bits.
  7682 0000237D EB0E                    		jmp	short unpackx
  7683                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7684                                  
  7685                                  unpack16:				
  7686 0000237F 52                      		push	dx
  7687 00002380 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7688 00002382 D1E6                    		shl	si, 1		; extend to 32 bit offset
  7689 00002384 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  7690 00002387 E83F00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7691 0000238A 5A                      		pop	dx
  7692 0000238B 8B1F                    		mov	bx, [bx]	;
  7693                                  					; bx = new fat entry.
  7694                                  unpackx:				
  7695 0000238D 5E                      		pop	si		; restore old bx value into si
  7696 0000238E 58                      		pop	ax		; restore logical sector (low)
  7697 0000238F 1F                      		pop	ds
  7698 00002390 29DE                    		sub	si, bx
  7699 00002392 83FEFF                  		cmp	si, -1		; one apart?
  7700 00002395 7507                    		jnz	short getcl2
  7701 00002397 2E010E[D016]            		add	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7702 0000239C EB91                    		jmp	short unpack
  7703                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7704                                  
  7705                                  getcl2:					
  7706 0000239E 53                      		push	bx
  7707 0000239F 52                      		push	dx		; sector to read (high)
  7708 000023A0 50                      		push	ax		; sector to read (low)
  7709 000023A1 2EA1[CA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive and	fat spec
  7710 000023A5 2E8B0E[D016]            		mov	cx, [cs:doscnt]
  7711 000023AA 5A                      		pop	dx		; sector to read for diskrd (low)
  7712 000023AB 2E8F06[2B05]            		pop	word [cs:start_sec_h]
  7713                                  					; sector to read for diskrd (high)
  7714 000023B0 1E                      		push	ds
  7715 000023B1 0E                      		push	cs
  7716 000023B2 1F                      		pop	ds
  7717 000023B3 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7718                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7719 000023B4 BD[C208]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  7720                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  7721                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  7722 000023B7 E8ABF3                  		call	call_bios_code	; read the clusters
  7723 000023BA 1F                      		pop	ds
  7724 000023BB 5B                      		pop	bx
  7725 000023BC 5F                      		pop	di
  7726 000023BD 2EA1[D016]              		mov	ax, [cs:doscnt]	; get number of	sectors	read
  7727 000023C1 86E0                    		xchg	ah, al		; multiply by 256
  7728 000023C3 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1		; times	2 equal	512
  7729 000023C5 01C7                    		add	di, ax		; update load location
  7730 000023C7 59                      		pop	cx		; restore sectors/cluster
  7731 000023C8 C3                      		retn
  7732                                  
  7733                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7734                                  
  7735                                  
  7736                                  ;function: find and read the corresponding fat sector into ds:0
  7737                                  ;
  7738                                  ;in). dx:si - offset value (starting from fat entry 0) of fat entry to find. M054
  7739                                  ;     ds - fatloc segment
  7740                                  ;     cs:drvfat - logical drive number, fat id
  7741                                  ;     cs:md_sectorsize
  7742                                  ;     cs:last_fat_secnum - last fat sector number read in.
  7743                                  ;
  7744                                  ;out). corresponding fat sector read in.
  7745                                  ;      bx = offset value from fatlog segment.
  7746                                  ;      other registera saved.
  7747                                  ;      zero flag set if the fat entry is splitted, i.e., when 12 bit fat entry
  7748                                  ;      starts at the last byte of the fat sector. in this case, the caller
  7749                                  ;      should save this byte, and read the next fat sector to get the rest
  7750                                  ;      of the fat entry value. (this will only happen with the 12 bit fat.)
  7751                                  
  7752                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7753                                  get_fat_sector:	
  7754 000023C9 50                      		push	ax
  7755 000023CA 51                      		push	cx
  7756 000023CB 57                      		push	di
  7757 000023CC 56                      		push	si
  7758 000023CD 06                      		push	es
  7759 000023CE 1E                      		push	ds
  7760 000023CF 89F0                    		mov	ax, si
  7761 000023D1 2E8B0E[D816]            		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  7762 000023D6 F7F1                    		div	cx		; ax = sector number, dx = offset
  7763 000023D8 90                      		nop
  7764                                  
  7765                                  		; Get rid of the assumption that
  7766                                  		; there	is only	one reserved sector
  7767                                  
  7768 000023D9 06                      		push	es
  7769 000023DA 1E                      		push	ds
  7770 000023DB 57                      		push	di
  7771 000023DC 50                      		push	ax
  7772 000023DD 0E                      		push	cs
  7773 000023DE 1F                      		pop	ds
  7774                                  
  7775 000023DF 2EA1[CA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive # and FAT id
  7776 000023E3 BD[CB04]                		mov	bp, SETDRIVE
  7777                                  		;mov	bp, 4D7h	; setdrive
  7778                                  					; at 2C7h:4D7h = 70h:2A47h
  7779 000023E6 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7780 000023E7 E87BF3                  		call	call_bios_code	; get bds for drive
  7781 000023EA 58                      		pop	ax		; (sector number -without reserved and hidden sectors-)
  7782 000023EB 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
  7783                                  					; add #reserved_sectors
  7784 000023EF 5F                      		pop	di
  7785 000023F0 1F                      		pop	ds
  7786 000023F1 07                      		pop	es
  7787 000023F2 2E3B06[DC16]            		cmp	ax, [cs:last_fat_sec_num]
  7788 000023F7 742A                    		jz	short gfs_split_chk ; don't need to read it again.
  7789 000023F9 2EA3[DC16]              		mov	[cs:last_fat_sec_num], ax 
  7790                                  					; sector number
  7791                                  					; (in the partition, without hidden sectors)
  7792 000023FD 52                      		push	dx
  7793 000023FE 2EC706[2B05]0000        		mov	word [cs:start_sec_h], 0 
  7794                                  					; prepare to read the fat sector
  7795                                  					; start_sec_h is always	0 for fat sector.
  7796 00002405 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax
  7797 00002407 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1		; 1 sector read
  7798 0000240A 2EA1[CA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]
  7799 0000240E 1E                      		push	ds
  7800 0000240F 07                      		pop	es
  7801 00002410 31FF                    		xor	di, di		; es:di	-> fatloc segment:0
  7802 00002412 1E                      		push	ds
  7803 00002413 0E                      		push	cs
  7804 00002414 1F                      		pop	ds
  7805 00002415 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7806 00002416 BD[C208]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  7807                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  7808                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  7809 00002419 E849F3                  		call	call_bios_code
  7810 0000241C 1F                      		pop	ds
  7811 0000241D 5A                      		pop	dx
  7812 0000241E 2E8B0E[D816]            		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  7813                                  
  7814                                  gfs_split_chk:				
  7815 00002423 49                      		dec	cx		; 511
  7816 00002424 39CA                    		cmp	dx, cx		; if offset points to the
  7817                                  					; last byte of this sector,
  7818                                  					; then splitted	entry.
  7819 00002426 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; set bx to dx
  7820 00002428 1F                      		pop	ds
  7821 00002429 07                      		pop	es
  7822 0000242A 5E                      		pop	si
  7823 0000242B 5F                      		pop	di
  7824 0000242C 59                      		pop	cx
  7825 0000242D 58                      		pop	ax
  7826 0000242E C3                      		retn
  7827                                  
  7828                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7829                                  ;Bios_Data_Init	ends
  7830                                  
  7831                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7832                                  
  7833                                  		; 09/12/2022
  7834                                  		;db 0
  7835                                  
  7836                                  numbertodiv	equ ($-BData_start)
  7837                                  numbertomod	equ (numbertodiv % 16)
  7838                                  
  7839                                  %if numbertomod>0 & numbertomod<16
  7840 0000242F 00                      		times (16-numbertomod) db 0
  7841                                  %endif
  7842                                  
  7843                                  ;align 16
  7844                                  
  7845                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7846                                  IOSYSCODESEGOFF	equ $ - BData_start
  7847                                  IOSYSCODESEG	equ (IOSYSCODESEGOFF>>4)+(700h>>4)
  7848

  7850                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

  7855                                  
  7856                                  ;============================================================================
  7857                                  ; DOS BIOS (IO.SYS) CODE SEGMENT 
  7858                                  ;============================================================================
  7859                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7860                                  
  7861                                  section .BIOSCODE vstart=0  
  7862                                  
  7863                                  BCode_start:	 ; 09/12/2022
  7864                                   
  7865                                  ; 02/10/2022
  7866                                  
  7867                                  ;--- DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------------
  7868                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7869                                  ; MSBIO1.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  7870                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7871                                  
  7872                                  DOSBIOSEG_2C7h:	;db 30h dup(0)		; SEGMENT 2C7h (2C70h-700h=2570h)
  7873 00000000 00<rep 30h>             		times 48 db 0		; 19/10/2022	
  7874 00000030 7000                    BiosDataWord:	dw 70h
  7875                                  
  7876                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7877                                  ;BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h
  7878                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7879                                  BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord
  7880                                  
  7881                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7882                                  
  7883                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS) 
  7884                                  
  7885                                  ;************************************************************************
  7886                                  ;*									*
  7887                                  ;*	seg_reinit is called with ax = our new code segment value,	*
  7888                                  ;*	  trashes di, cx, es						*
  7889                                  ;*									*
  7890                                  ;*	cas -- should be made disposable!				*
  7891                                  ;*									*
  7892                                  ;************************************************************************
  7893                                  
  7894                                  _seg_reinit:
  7895 00000032 2E8E06[3000]            		mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
  7896                                  					; at 2C7h:30h or 70h:25A0h
  7897                                  		;mov	di, (offset cdev+2)
  7898 00000037 BF[E006]                		mov	di, cdev+2	; 19/10/2022
  7899 0000003A B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; (end_BC_entries - cdev)/4
  7900                                  
  7901                                  _seg_reinit_1:				
  7902 0000003D AB                      		stosw			; modify Bios_Code entry points
  7903 0000003E 47                      		inc	di
  7904 0000003F 47                      		inc	di
  7905 00000040 E2FB                    		loop	_seg_reinit_1
  7906 00000042 CB                      		retf
  7907                                  
  7908                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7909                                  
  7910                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7911                                  
  7912                                  ;************************************************************************
  7913                                  ;*									*
  7914                                  ;*	chardev_entry - main device driver dispatch routine		*
  7915                                  ;*	   called with a dummy parameter block on the stack		*
  7916                                  ;*	   dw dispatch_table, dw prn/aux numbers (optional)		*
  7917                                  ;*									*
  7918                                  ;*	will eventually take care of doing the transitions in		*
  7919                                  ;*	   out of Bios_Code						*
  7920                                  ;*									*
  7921                                  ;************************************************************************
  7922                                  
  7923                                  chardev_entry:				; 0070h:25B3h =	02C7h:0043h
  7924 00000043 56                      		push	si
  7925 00000044 50                      		push	ax
  7926 00000045 51                      		push	cx
  7927 00000046 52                      		push	dx
  7928 00000047 57                      		push	di
  7929 00000048 55                      		push	bp
  7930 00000049 1E                      		push	ds
  7931 0000004A 06                      		push	es
  7932 0000004B 53                      		push	bx
  7933 0000004C 89E5                    		mov	bp, sp
  7934 0000004E 8B7612                  		mov	si, [bp+18]	; get return address (dispatch table)
  7935                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h]
  7936                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  7937 00000051 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  7938 00000056 8B4402                  		mov	ax, [si+2]	; get the device number	if present
  7939 00000059 A2[2100]                		mov	[auxnum], al
  7940 0000005C 8826[E704]              		mov	[printdev], ah
  7941 00000060 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; point	to the device dispatch table
  7942 00000062 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; get pointer to i/o packet
  7943 00000066 268A4701                		mov	al, [es:bx+1]	; [es:bx+unit]	; al = unit code
  7944 0000006A 268A670D                		mov	ah, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+media]	; ah = media descrip
  7945 0000006E 268B4F12                		mov	cx, [es:bx+18]	; [es:bx+count]	; cx = count
  7946 00000072 268B5714                		mov	dx, [es:bx+20]	; [es:bx+start]	; dx = start sector
  7947                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7948 00000076 81FE[9604]              		cmp	si, DSKTBL
  7949                                  		;cmp	si, 4A2h	; dsktbl
  7950                                  					; at 2C7h:4A2h = 70h:2A12h
  7951 0000007A 7517                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  7952                                  
  7953                                  ; Special case for 32-bit start sector number:
  7954                                  ;   if (si==dsktbl) /* if this is a disk device call */
  7955                                  ;      set high 16 bits of secnum to 0
  7956                                  ;      if (secnum == 0xffff) fetch 32 bit sector number
  7957                                  ;
  7958                                  ; pass high word of sector number in start_sec_h, low word in dx
  7959                                  ;
  7960                                  ; note: start_l and start_h are the offsets within the io_request packet
  7961                                  ;	  which contain the low and hi words of the 32 bit start sector if
  7962                                  ;	  it has been used.
  7963                                  ;
  7964                                  ; note: remember not to destroy the registers which have been set up before
  7965                                  
  7966                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	0 ; initialize to 0
  7967 0000007C C706[2B05]0000          		mov	word [start_sec_h], 0
  7968 00000082 83FAFF                  		cmp	dx, 0FFFFh
  7969 00000085 750C                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  7970 00000087 268B571C                		mov	dx, [es:bx+28]	; [es:bx+start_h]
  7971                                  					; 32 bits dsk req
  7972                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	dx ; start_sec_h = packet.start_h
  7973 0000008B 8916[2B05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx
  7974 0000008F 268B571A                		mov	dx, [es:bx+26]	; [es:bx+start_l]
  7975                                  					; dx = packet.start_l
  7976                                  no_sector32_mapping:			
  7977 00000093 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  7978 00000094 268A4702                		mov	al, [es:bx+2]	; [es:bx+cmd]
  7979 00000098 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, cs:[si]
  7980 0000009B 732C                    		jnb	short command_error
  7981 0000009D 98                      		cbw			; note that al <= 15 means ok
  7982 0000009E D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
  7983 000000A0 01C6                    		add	si, ax
  7984 000000A2 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  7985 000000A3 26C47F0E                		les	di, [es:bx+14]	; [es:bx+trans]
  7986 000000A7 FC                      		cld
  7987                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7988 000000A8 2EFF5401                		call	near [cs:si+1]
  7989                                  		;call	word ptr cs:si+1
  7990 000000AC 7202                    		jb	short already_got_ah_status
  7991 000000AE B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  7992                                  already_got_ah_status:
  7993                                  		;;mov	ds, [cs:0030h]	; 15/10/2022			
  7994                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  7995                                  					; cas note: shouldn't be needed!
  7996 000000B0 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  7997                                  		;lds	bx, ds:ptrsav
  7998 000000B5 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
  7999 000000B9 894703                  		mov	[bx+3],	ax	; [bx+status]
  8000                                  					; mark operation complete
  8001 000000BC 5B                      		pop	bx
  8002 000000BD 07                      		pop	es
  8003 000000BE 1F                      		pop	ds
  8004 000000BF 5D                      		pop	bp
  8005 000000C0 5F                      		pop	di
  8006 000000C1 5A                      		pop	dx
  8007 000000C2 59                      		pop	cx
  8008 000000C3 58                      		pop	ax
  8009 000000C4 5E                      		pop	si
  8010 000000C5 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; get rid of fake return address
  8011                                  	
  8012                                  		; fall through into bc_retf
  8013                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------	
  8014                                  bc_retf:
  8015 000000C8 CB                      		retf
  8016                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8017                                  
  8018                                  command_error:				
  8019 000000C9 E80900                  		call	bc_cmderr
  8020 000000CC EBE2                    		jmp	short already_got_ah_status
  8021                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8022                                  ; 01/05/2019
  8023                                  
  8024                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8025                                  ; The following piece of hack is for supporting CP/M compatibility
  8026                                  ; Basically at offset 5 we have a far call into 0:c0. But this does not call
  8027                                  ; 0:c0 directly instead it call f01d:fef0, because it needs to support 'lhld 6'
  8028                                  ; The following hack has to reside at ffff:d0 (= f01d:fef0) if BIOS is loaded
  8029                                  ; high.
  8030                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8031                                  
  8032                                  		;db 7 dup(0)
  8033                                  
  8034                                  		; 15/10/2022
  8035                                  
  8036 000000CE 0000                    		dw 0		; pad to bring offset to 0D0h
  8037                                  
  8038 000000D0 00<rep 5h>              off_d0: 	times 5 db 0	; 5 bytes from 0:c0 will be copied onto here
  8039                                  				;  which is the CP/M call 5 entry point
  8040                                  		
  8041                                  
  8042                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8043                                  
  8044                                  ;	exit - all routines return through this path
  8045                                  
  8046                                  bc_cmderr:				
  8047 000000D5 B003                    		mov	al, 3		; 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  8048                                  					; unknown command error
  8049                                  
  8050                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8051                                  
  8052                                  ;	now zero the count field by subtracting its current value,
  8053                                  ;	  which is still in cx, from itself.
  8054                                  
  8055                                  ;	subtract the number of i/o's NOT YET COMPLETED from total
  8056                                  ;	  in order to return the number actually complete
  8057                                  
  8058                                  bc_err_cnt:	
  8059                                  		;les	bx, ds:ptrsav
  8060                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8061 000000D7 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8062 000000DB 26294F12                		sub	[es:bx+18], cx	; [es:bx+count]
  8063                                  					; # of successful i/o's
  8064 000000DF B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; mark error return
  8065 000000E1 F9                      		stc			; indicate abnormal end
  8066 000000E2 C3                      		retn
  8067                                  
  8068                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8069                                  
  8070                                  ;Bios_Code ends
  8071                                  
  8072                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8073                                  ; MSCHAR.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
  8074                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8075                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  8076                                  ; 10/01/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8077                                  
  8078                                  ; 30/04/2019
  8079                                  
  8080                                  ;title	mschar - character and clock devices
  8081                                  
  8082                                  ;MODE_CTRLBRK	equ	0FFh
  8083                                  
  8084                                  ; BIOSCODE:00E4h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  8085                                  
  8086                                  ;************************************************************************
  8087                                  ;*									*
  8088                                  ;*	device driver dispatch tables					*
  8089                                  ;*									*
  8090                                  ;*	each table starts with a byte which lists the number of		*
  8091                                  ;*	legal functions, followed by that number of words. Each		*
  8092                                  ;*	word represents an offset of a routine in Bios_Code which	*
  8093                                  ;*	handles the function. The functions are terminated with		*
  8094                                  ;*	a near return. If carry is reset, a 'done' code is returned	*
  8095                                  ;*	to the caller. If carry is set, the ah/al registers are		*
  8096                                  ;*	returned as abnormal completion status. Notice that ds		*
  8097                                  ;*	is assumed to point to the Bios_Data segment throughout.	*
  8098                                  ;*									*
  8099                                  ;************************************************************************
  8100                                  
  8101                                  		; 13/12/2022
  8102                                  		;db 0
  8103                                  
  8104                                  		; 13/12/202
  8105 000000E3 0B                      con_table:	db ((con_table_end - con_table)-1)/2 ; 11
  8106                                  					; 2C7h:0E4h = 70h:2654h
  8107 000000E4 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8108                                  					; 00 init
  8109 000000E6 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 01
  8110 000000E8 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 02
  8111 000000EA [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr ; 0D5h	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  8112                                  					; 03
  8113 000000EC [5B01]                  		dw con_read  ; 15Ch	; con_read at 2C7h:15Ch	= 70h:26CCh
  8114                                  					; 04
  8115 000000EE [9E01]                  		dw con_rdnd  ; 19Fh	; con_rdnd at 2C7h:19Fh	= 70h:270Fh
  8116                                  					; 05
  8117 000000F0 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 06
  8118 000000F2 [0702]                  		dw con_flush ; 209h	; con_flush at 2C7h:209h = 70h:2779h
  8119                                  					; 07
  8120 000000F4 [FB01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; con_writ at 2C7h:1FDh	= 70h:276Dh
  8121                                  					; 08
  8122 000000F6 [FB01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; 09
  8123 000000F8 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 0A
  8124                                  con_table_end:
  8125 000000FA 1A                      prn_table:	db ((prn_table_end - prn_table)-1)/2 ; 26			
  8126                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  8127 000000FB [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec
  8128 000000FD [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8129 000000FF [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8130 00000101 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; bc_cmderr
  8131 00000103 [1802]                  		dw prn_input  ;	21Ah	; prn_input
  8132                                  					; 04 indicate zero chars read
  8133 00000105 [C601]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8134                                  					; 05 read non-destructive
  8135 00000107 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8136 00000109 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8137 0000010B [1D02]                  		dw prn_writ   ;	21Fh	; prn_writ
  8138 0000010D [1D02]                  		dw prn_writ   ; 21Fh	; 09
  8139 0000010F [4E02]                  		dw prn_stat   ; 251h	; prn_stat
  8140 00000111 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0B
  8141 00000113 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0C
  8142 00000115 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0D
  8143 00000117 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0E
  8144 00000119 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0F
  8145 0000011B [8802]                  		dw prn_tilbusy ; 28Bh	; prn_tilbusy
  8146 0000011D [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 11
  8147 0000011F [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 12
  8148 00000121 [B602]                  		dw prn_genioctl ; 2BAh	; prn_genioctl
  8149 00000123 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 14
  8150 00000125 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 15
  8151 00000127 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 16
  8152 00000129 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 17
  8153 0000012B [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 18
  8154 0000012D [EB02]                  		dw prn_ioctl_query ; 2F0h ; prn_ioctl_query
  8155                                  prn_table_end:
  8156 0000012F 0B                      aux_table:	db ((aux_table_end - aux_table)-1)/2 ; 11			
  8157                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h
  8158 00000130 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00 - init
  8159 00000132 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8160 00000134 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8161 00000136 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8162 00000138 [0603]                  		dw aux_read   ; 30Dh	; aux_read ; 04	- read
  8163 0000013A [2D03]                  		dw aux_rdnd   ; 335h	; aux_rdnd - 05	- read non-destructive
  8164 0000013C [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8165 0000013E [6303]                  		dw aux_flsh   ;	36Ch	; aux_flsh
  8166 00000140 [6A03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; aux_writ
  8167 00000142 [6A03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; 09
  8168 00000144 [4D03]                  		dw aux_wrst   ;	355h	; aux_wrst
  8169                                  aux_table_end:
  8170 00000146 0A                      tim_table	db ((tim_table_end - tim_table)-1)/2 ; 10
  8171                                  					; 2C7h:147h = 70h:26B7h
  8172 00000147 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00
  8173 00000149 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8174 0000014B [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8175 0000014D [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8176 0000014F [2904]                  		dw tim_read   ;	435h	; tim_read
  8177 00000151 [C601]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8178 00000153 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8179 00000155 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8180 00000157 [D003]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; tim_writ
  8181 00000159 [D003]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; 09
  8182                                  tim_table_end:
  8183                                  
  8184                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8185                                  
  8186                                  ;************************************************************************
  8187                                  ;*									*
  8188                                  ;*	con_read - read cx bytes from keyboard into buffer at es:di	*
  8189                                  ;*									*
  8190                                  ;************************************************************************
  8191                                  
  8192                                  con_read:				; 2C7h:15Ch = 70h:26CCh
  8193                                  		;jcxz	short con_exit	; read cx bytes	from keyboard into buffer
  8194 0000015B E306                    		jcxz	con_exit	; 19/10/2022
  8195                                  con_loop:				
  8196 0000015D E80500                  		call	chrin		; get char in al
  8197 00000160 AA                      		stosb			; store	char at	es:di
  8198 00000161 E2FA                    		loop	con_loop
  8199                                  con_exit:				
  8200 00000163 F8                      		clc
  8201 00000164 C3                      		retn
  8202                                  
  8203                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8204                                  
  8205                                  ;************************************************************************
  8206                                  ;*									*
  8207                                  ;*	chrin - input single char from keyboard into al			*
  8208                                  ;*									*
  8209                                  ;*	  we are going to issue extended keyboard function, if		*
  8210                                  ;*	  supported. the returning value of the extended keystroke	*
  8211                                  ;*	  of the extended keyboard function uses 0E0h in al		*
  8212                                  ;*	  instead of 00h as in the conventional keyboard function.	*
  8213                                  ;*	  this creates a conflict when the user entered real		*
  8214                                  ;*	  greek alpha charater (= 0E0h) to  distinguish the extended	*
  8215                                  ;*	  keystroke and the greek alpha. this case will be handled	*
  8216                                  ;*	  in the following manner:					*
  8217                                  ;*									*
  8218                                  ;*	      ah = 16h							*
  8219                                  ;*	      int 16h							*
  8220                                  ;*	      if al == 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8221                                  ;*	      else if al == 0E0h, then					*
  8222                                  ;*	      if ah <> 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8223                                  ;*		else greek_alpha character.				*
  8224                                  ;*									*
  8225                                  ;*	also, for compatibility reason, if an extended code is		*
  8226                                  ;*	  detected, then we are going to change the value in al		*
  8227                                  ;*	  from 0E0h to 00h.						*
  8228                                  ;*									*
  8229                                  ;************************************************************************
  8230                                  
  8231                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8232                                  chrin:		
  8233 00000165 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; set by msinit. 0 or 10h
  8234 00000169 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8235 0000016B 8606[0C00]              		xchg	al, [altah]	; get character	& zero altah
  8236 0000016F 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8237 00000171 752A                    		jnz	short keyret
  8238 00000173 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8239 00000175 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8240 00000177 74EC                    		jz	short chrin
  8241 00000179 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8242 0000017C 7504                    		jnz	short alt_ext_chk
  8243 0000017E B010                    		mov	al, 10h
  8244 00000180 EB1B                    		jmp	short keyret
  8245                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8246                                  
  8247                                  ;  if operation was extended function (i.e. keyrd_func != 0) then
  8248                                  ;    if character read was 0E0h then
  8249                                  ;      if extended byte was zero (i.e. ah == 0) then
  8250                                  ;	 goto keyret
  8251                                  ;      else
  8252                                  ;	 set al to zero
  8253                                  ;	 goto alt_save
  8254                                  ;      endif
  8255                                  ;    endif
  8256                                  ;  endif
  8257                                  
  8258                                  alt_ext_chk:
  8259 00000182 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0
  8260 00000187 740C                    		jz	short not_ext
  8261 00000189 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h
  8262 0000018B 7508                    		jnz	short not_ext
  8263 0000018D 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  8264 0000018F 740C                    		jz	short keyret
  8265 00000191 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8266 00000193 EB04                    		jmp	short alt_save
  8267                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8268                                  
  8269                                  not_ext:				
  8270 00000195 08C0                    		or	al, al		; special case?
  8271 00000197 7504                    		jnz	short keyret
  8272                                  alt_save:				
  8273 00000199 8826[0C00]              		mov	[altah], ah	; store	special	key
  8274                                  keyret:					
  8275 0000019D C3                      		retn
  8276                                  
  8277                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8278                                  
  8279                                  ;************************************************************************
  8280                                  ;*									*
  8281                                  ;*	con_rdnd - keyboard non destructive read, no wait		*
  8282                                  ;*									*
  8283                                  ;*	pc-convertible-type machine: if bit 10 is set by the dos	*
  8284                                  ;*	in the status word of the request packet, and there is no	*
  8285                                  ;*	character in the input buffer, the driver issues a system	*
  8286                                  ;*	wait request to the rom. on return from the rom, it returns	*
  8287                                  ;*	a 'char-not-found' to the dos.					*
  8288                                  ;*									*
  8289                                  ;************************************************************************
  8290                                  
  8291                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8292                                  con_rdnd:				
  8293 0000019E A0[0C00]                		mov	al, [altah]
  8294 000001A1 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8295 000001A3 754C                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8296 000001A5 8A26[E604]              		mov	ah, [keysts_func]
  8297 000001A9 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8298 000001AB 751D                    		jnz	short gotchr
  8299 000001AD 803E[7900]00            		cmp	byte [fhavek09], 0
  8300 000001B2 7412                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8301 000001B4 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8302                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8303 000001B8 26F6470404              		test	byte [es:bx+4], 04h
  8304                                  		;test	word [es:bx+3], 400h ; [es:bx+status]
  8305 000001BD 7407                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8306 000001BF B80041                  		mov	ax, 4100h
  8307 000001C2 30DB                    		xor	bl, bl
  8308 000001C4 CD15                    		int	15h		; SYSTEM - WAIT	ON EXTERNAL EVENT (CONVERTIBLE)
  8309                                  					; AL = condition type, BH = condition compare or mask value
  8310                                  					; BL = timeout value times 55 milliseconds, 00h	means no timeout
  8311                                  					; DX = I/O port	address	if AL bit 4 set
  8312                                  z_bus_exit:				
  8313 000001C6 F9                      		stc			; 2C7h:1C8h = 70h:2738h
  8314 000001C7 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; indicate busy	status
  8315 000001C9 C3                      		retn
  8316                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8317                                  
  8318                                  gotchr:					
  8319 000001CA 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8320 000001CC 7508                    		jnz	short notbrk	; check	for null after break
  8321 000001CE 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; issue keyboard read function
  8322 000001D2 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8323 000001D4 EBC8                    		jmp	short con_rdnd	; get a	real status
  8324                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8325                                  
  8326                                  notbrk:					
  8327 000001D6 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8328 000001D9 7504                    		jnz	short rd_ext_chk
  8329 000001DB B010                    		mov	al, 10h		; ('P' & 1Fh) ; return control p
  8330 000001DD EB12                    		jmp	short rdexit
  8331                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8332                                  
  8333                                  rd_ext_chk:				
  8334 000001DF 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0 ; extended keyboard function?
  8335 000001E4 740B                    		jz	short rdexit
  8336 000001E6 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h	; extended key value or	greek alpha?
  8337 000001E8 7507                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8338 000001EA 80FC00                  		cmp	ah, 0		; scan code exist?
  8339 000001ED 7402                    		jz	short rdexit	; yes. greek alpha char.
  8340 000001EF B000                    		mov	al, 0		; no. extended key stroke.
  8341                                  					; change it for	compatibility
  8342                                  rdexit:					
  8343 000001F1 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8344 000001F5 2688470D                		mov	[es:bx+13], al	; [es:bx+media]
  8345                                  					; return keyboard character here
  8346                                  bc_exvec:				
  8347 000001F9 F8                      		clc			; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8348                                  					; indicate normal termination
  8349 000001FA C3                      		retn
  8350                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8351                                  
  8352                                  ;************************************************************************
  8353                                  ;*									*
  8354                                  ;*	con_write - console write routine				*
  8355                                  ;*									*
  8356                                  ;*	entry:	es:di -> buffer						*
  8357                                  ;*		cx    =  count						*
  8358                                  ;*									*
  8359                                  ;************************************************************************
  8360                                  
  8361                                  con_writ:
  8362                                  		;jcxz	short bc_exvec
  8363 000001FB E3FC                    		jcxz	bc_exvec	; 19/10/2022
  8364                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8365                                  		;jcxz	cc_ret
  8366                                  con_lp:					
  8367 000001FD 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]
  8368 00000200 47                      		inc	di
  8369 00000201 CD29                    		int	29h		; DOS 2+ internal - FAST PUTCHAR
  8370                                  					; AL = character to display
  8371 00000203 E2F8                    		loop	con_lp
  8372                                  cc_ret:					
  8373 00000205 F8                      		clc
  8374 00000206 C3                      		retn
  8375                                  
  8376                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8377                                  
  8378                                  ;************************************************************************
  8379                                  ;*									*
  8380                                  ;*	con_flush - flush out keyboard queue				*
  8381                                  ;*									*
  8382                                  ;************************************************************************
  8383                                  
  8384                                  con_flush:
  8385 00000207 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0	; clear	out holding buffer
  8386                                  flloop:					; while	(charavail()) charread();	
  8387 0000020C B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8388 0000020E CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - CHECK BUFFER, DO NOT CLEAR
  8389                                  					; Return: ZF clear if character	in buffer
  8390                                  					; AH = scan code, AL = character
  8391                                  					; ZF set if no character in buffer
  8392 00000210 74F3                    		jz	short cc_ret
  8393 00000212 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8394 00000214 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
  8395                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
  8396 00000216 EBF4                    		jmp	short flloop
  8397                                  
  8398                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8399                                  
  8400                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8401                                  
  8402                                  ;************************************************************************
  8403                                  ;*									*
  8404                                  ;*	some equates for rom bios printer i/o				*
  8405                                  ;*									*
  8406                                  ;************************************************************************
  8407                                  
  8408                                  ; ibm rom status bits (i don't trust them, neither should you)
  8409                                  ; warning!!! the ibm rom does not return just one bit. it returns a
  8410                                  ; whole slew of bits, only one of which is correct.
  8411                                  
  8412                                  ;notbusystatus	equ 10000000b		; not busy
  8413                                  ;nopaperstatus	equ 00100000b		; no more paper
  8414                                  ;prnselected	equ 00010000b		; printer selected
  8415                                  ;ioerrstatus	equ 00001000b		; some kinda error
  8416                                  ;timeoutstatus	equ 00000001b		; time out.
  8417                                  ;
  8418                                  ;noprinter	equ 00110000b		; no printer attached
  8419                                  
  8420                                  ; 18/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8421                                  ;error_I24_out_of_paper	equ 9 ; MSDOS 6.0, ERR.INC, 1991
  8422                                  
  8423                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8424                                  
  8425                                  ;************************************************************************
  8426                                  ;*									*
  8427                                  ;*	prn_input - return with no error but zero chars read		*
  8428                                  ;*									*
  8429                                  ;*	enter with cx = number of characters requested			*
  8430                                  ;*									*
  8431                                  ;************************************************************************
  8432                                  
  8433                                  prn_input:				; 2C7h:21Ah = 70h:278Ah
  8434 00000218 E8BCFE                  		call	bc_err_cnt	; reset	count to zero
  8435                                  					; (sub reqpkt.count,cx)
  8436                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8437                                  prn_done:
  8438 0000021B F8                      		clc			; but return with carry	reset for no error
  8439 0000021C C3                      		retn
  8440                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8441                                  
  8442                                  ;************************************************************************
  8443                                  ;*									*
  8444                                  ;*	prn_writ - write cx bytes from es:di to printer device		*
  8445                                  ;*									*
  8446                                  ;*	auxnum has printer number					*
  8447                                  ;*									*
  8448                                  ;************************************************************************
  8449                                  
  8450                                  prn_writ:				; 2C7h:21Fh = 70h:278Fh
  8451                                  		;jcxz	short prn_done	; no chars to output
  8452 0000021D E3FC                    		jcxz	prn_done	; 19/10/2022
  8453                                  prn_loop:				
  8454 0000021F BB0200                  		mov	bx, 2		; retry	count
  8455                                  prn_out:				
  8456 00000222 E83600                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8457 00000225 751D                    		jnz	short TestPrnError
  8458 00000227 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to print
  8459 0000022A 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8460 0000022C E82E00                  		call	prnop		; print	to printer
  8461 0000022F 7419                    		jz	short prn_con	; no error - continue
  8462 00000231 80FCFF                  		cmp	ah, 0FFh	; MODE_CTRLBRK
  8463 00000234 7509                    		jnz	short _prnwf
  8464 00000236 B00C                    		mov	al, 0Ch		; error_I24_gen_failure
  8465 00000238 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0
  8466 0000023D EB08                    		jmp	short pmessg
  8467                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8468                                  
  8469                                  _prnwf:					
  8470 0000023F F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; timeoutstatus
  8471 00000242 7406                    		jz	short prn_con
  8472                                  TestPrnError:				
  8473 00000244 4B                      		dec	bx		; retry	until count is exhausted.
  8474 00000245 75DB                    		jnz	short prn_out
  8475                                  pmessg:					
  8476 00000247 E98DFE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8477                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8478                                  
  8479                                  prn_con:
