  8481 0000024B E2D2                    		loop	prn_loop
  8482                                  ;prn_done:				
  8483                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8484                                  prn_done2:
  8485                                  		;clc
  8486                                  		; cf=0
  8487 0000024D C3                      		retn
  8488                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8489                                  
  8490                                  ;************************************************************************
  8491                                  ;*									*
  8492                                  ;*	prn_stat - device driver entry to return printer status		*
  8493                                  ;*									*
  8494                                  ;************************************************************************
  8495                                  
  8496                                  prn_stat:				; 2C7h:251h = 70h:27C1h
  8497 0000024E E80A00                  		call	prnstat		; device in dx
  8498 00000251 75F4                    		jnz	short pmessg
  8499 00000253 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; notbusystatus
  8500                                  		;jnz	short prn_done
  8501                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8502 00000256 75F5                    		jnz	short prn_done2 ; cf=0
  8503 00000258 E96BFF                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  8504                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8505                                  
  8506                                  ;************************************************************************
  8507                                  ;*									*
  8508                                  ;*	prnstat - utility function to call ROM BIOS to check		*
  8509                                  ;*		 printer status. Return meaningful error code		*
  8510                                  ;*									*
  8511                                  ;************************************************************************
  8512                                  
  8513                                  prnstat:				
  8514 0000025B B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; set command for get status
  8515                                  					; PRINTER - GET	STATUS
  8516                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  8517                                  					; Return: AH = status
  8518                                  
  8519                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8520                                  
  8521                                  ;************************************************************************
  8522                                  ;*									*
  8523                                  ;*	prnop - call ROM BIOS printer function in ah			*
  8524                                  ;*		return zero true if no error				*
  8525                                  ;*		return zero false if error, al = error code		*
  8526                                  ;*									*
  8527                                  ;************************************************************************
  8528                                  
  8529                                  prnop:	
  8530 0000025D 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; get printer number
  8531 00000261 CD17                    		int	17h
  8532                                  
  8533                                  	; This check was added to see if this is a case of no
  8534                                  	; printer being installed. This tests checks to be sure
  8535                                  	; the error is noprinter (30h)
  8536                                  
  8537 00000263 50                      		push	ax
  8538 00000264 80E430                  		and	ah, 30h
  8539 00000267 80FC30                  		cmp	ah, 30h		; noprinter
  8540 0000026A 58                      		pop	ax
  8541 0000026B 7506                    		jnz	short NextTest
  8542 0000026D 80E4DF                  		and	ah, 0DFh	; ~nopaperstatus
  8543 00000270 80CC08                  		or	ah, 8		; ioerrstatus
  8544                                  
  8545                                  ; examine the status bits to see if an error occurred. unfortunately, several
  8546                                  ; of the bits are set so we have to pick and choose. we must be extremely
  8547                                  ; careful about breaking basic.
  8548                                  
  8549                                  NextTest:				
  8550 00000273 F6C428                  		test	ah, 28h		; (ioerrstatus+nopaperstatus)
  8551                                  					; i/o error?
  8552 00000276 740A                    		jz	short checknotready ; no, try not ready
  8553                                  
  8554                                  ; at this point, we know we have an error. the converse is not true
  8555                                  
  8556 00000278 B009                    		mov	al, 9		; error_I24_out_of_paper
  8557                                  					; first, assume	out of paper
  8558 0000027A F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; out of paper set?
  8559 0000027D 7502                    		jnz	short ret1	; yes, error is	set
  8560 0000027F FEC0                    		inc	al		; return al=10 (i/o error)
  8561                                  ret1:					
  8562 00000281 C3                      		retn
  8563                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8564                                  
  8565                                  checknotready:				
  8566 00000282 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; assume not-ready
  8567 00000284 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1
  8568 00000287 C3                      		retn
  8569                                  
  8570                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8571                                  
  8572                                  ;************************************************************************
  8573                                  ;*									*
  8574                                  ;*	prn_tilbusy - output until busy. Used by print spooler.		*
  8575                                  ;*		     this entry point should never block waiting for	*
  8576                                  ;*		     device to come ready.				*
  8577                                  ;*									*
  8578                                  ;*	inputs:	cx = count, es:di -> buffer				*
  8579                                  ;*	outputs: set the number of bytes transferred in the		*
  8580                                  ;*		 device driver request packet				*
  8581                                  ;*									*
  8582                                  ;************************************************************************
  8583                                  
  8584                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8585                                  prn_tilbusy:				; 2C7h:28Bh = 70h:27FBh
  8586 00000288 89FE                    		mov	si, di		; everything is	set for	lodsb
  8587                                  prn_tilbloop:				
  8588 0000028A 51                      		push	cx
  8589 0000028B 53                      		push	bx
  8590 0000028C 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8591 0000028E 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8592 00000292 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8593                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	wait count times to come ready
  8594 00000294 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8595 00000298 5B                      		pop	bx
  8596                                  prn_getstat:				
  8597 00000299 E8BFFF                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8598 0000029C 7514                    		jnz	short prn_bperr	; error
  8599 0000029E F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; ready	yet?
  8600 000002A1 E1F6                    		loope	prn_getstat	; no, go for more
  8601 000002A3 59                      		pop	cx		; get original count
  8602 000002A4 740D                    		jz	short prn_berr	; still	not ready => done
  8603 000002A6 26                      		es
  8604 000002A7 AC                      		lodsb
  8605                                  		;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ; es
  8606                                  					; lodsb
  8607 000002A8 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8608 000002AA E8B0FF                  		call	prnop
  8609 000002AD 7504                    		jnz	short prn_berr	; error
  8610 000002AF E2D9                    		loop	prn_tilbloop
  8611                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8612                                  		; cf=0 (prnop)
  8613                                  		;clc			; normal no-error return
  8614 000002B1 C3                      		retn			;   from device driver
  8615                                  
  8616                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8617                                  
  8618                                  prn_bperr:				
  8619 000002B2 59                      		pop	cx		; restore transfer count from stack
  8620                                  prn_berr:				
  8621 000002B3 E921FE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8622                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8623                                  
  8624                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8625                                  
  8626                                  ;************************************************************************
  8627                                  ;*									*
  8628                                  ;*	prn_genioctl - get/set printer retry count			*
  8629                                  ;*									*
  8630                                  ;************************************************************************
  8631                                  
  8632                                  ; IOCTL.INC (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  8633                                  ; 11/01/2019
  8634                                  
  8635                                  ;********************************;*
  8636                                  ; CHARACTER DEVICES (PRINTERS)	 ;*
  8637                                  ;********************************;*
  8638                                  
  8639                                  ;;RAWIO SUB-FUNCTIONS
  8640                                  ;;get_retry_count equ 65h
  8641                                  ;;set_retry_count equ 45h
  8642                                  
  8643                                  ;;struc A_RETRYCOUNT
  8644                                  ;;.rc_count: resw 1
  8645                                  ;;endstruc
  8646                                  
  8647                                  ;ioc_pc equ 5
  8648                                  
  8649                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8650                                  
  8651                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8652                                  prn_genioctl:				; 2C7h:2BAh = 70h:282Ah
  8653 000002B6 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
  8654 000002BA 26807D0D05              		cmp	byte [es:di+13], 5 ; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
  8655                                  					; ioc_pc
  8656 000002BF 7403                    		jz	short prnfunc_ok
  8657                                  
  8658                                  prnfuncerr:				
  8659 000002C1 E911FE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
  8660                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8661                                  
  8662                                  prnfunc_ok:				
  8663 000002C4 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
  8664 000002C8 26C47D13                		les	di, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
  8665 000002CC 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8666                                  		;mov	bl, ds:printdev	; get index into retry counts
  8667 000002CE 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8668 000002D2 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8669                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	pull out retry count for device
  8670 000002D4 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8671 000002D8 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; get_retry_count
  8672 000002DA 7407                    		jz	short prngetcount
  8673 000002DC 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; set_retry_count
  8674 000002DE 75E1                    		jnz	short prnfuncerr
  8675 000002E0 268B0D                  		mov	cx, [es:di]
  8676                                  prngetcount:				
  8677                                  		;mov	ds:wait_count[bx], cx
  8678 000002E3 898F[E804]              		mov	[wait_count+bx], cx
  8679 000002E7 26890D                  		mov	[es:di], cx	; [es:di+A_RETRYCOUNT.RC_COUNT]
  8680                                  					; return current retry count
  8681                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8682                                  		; cf=0
  8683                                  		;clc
  8684 000002EA C3                      		retn
  8685                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8686                                  
  8687                                  ;************************************************************************
  8688                                  ;*									*
  8689                                  ;*  prn_ioctl_query							*
  8690                                  ;*									*
  8691                                  ;*  Added for 5.00							*
  8692                                  ;************************************************************************
  8693                                  
  8694                                  prn_ioctl_query:			; 2C7h:2F0h = 70h:2860h

  8697                                  					; ioc_pc

  8701 000002FC 7404                    		jz	short IOCtlSupported

  8714 00000303 E9CFFD                  		jmp	bc_cmderr ; (bc_cmderr sets cf to 1)
  8715                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8716                                  
  8717                                  ;************************************************************************
  8718                                  ;*									*
  8719                                  ;*	aux port driver code -- "aux" == "com1"				*
  8720                                  ;*									*
  8721                                  ;*	the device driver entry/dispatch code sets up auxnum to		*
  8722                                  ;*	give the com port number to use (0=com1, 1=com2, 2=com3...)	*
  8723                                  ;*									*
  8724                                  ;************************************************************************
  8725                                  
  8726                                  ;	values in ah, requesting function of int 14h in rom bios
  8727                                  
  8728                                  ;auxfunc_send	 equ	1	;transmit
  8729                                  ;auxfunc_receive equ	2	;read
  8730                                  ;auxfunc_status	 equ	3	;request status
  8731                                  
  8732                                  ;	error flags, reported by int 14h, reported in ah:
  8733                                  
  8734                                  ;flag_data_ready equ	01h	;data ready
  8735                                  ;flag_overrun	 equ	02h	;overrun error
  8736                                  ;flag_parity	 equ	04h	;parity error
  8737                                  ;flag_frame	 equ	08h	;framing error
  8738                                  ;flag_break	 equ	10h	;break detect
  8739                                  ;flag_tranhol_emp equ	20h	;transmit holding register empty
  8740                                  ;flag_timeout	 equ	80h	;timeout
  8741                                  
  8742                                  ;	these flags reported in al:
  8743                                  
  8744                                  ;flag_cts	 equ	10h	;clear to send
  8745                                  ;flag_dsr	 equ	20h	;data set ready
  8746                                  ;flag_rec_sig	 equ	80h	;receive line signal detect
  8747                                  
  8748                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8749                                  
  8750                                  ;************************************************************************
  8751                                  ;*									*
  8752                                  ;*	aux_read - read cx bytes from [auxnum] aux port to buffer	*
  8753                                  ;*		   at es:di						*
  8754                                  ;*									*
  8755                                  ;************************************************************************
  8756                                  
  8757                                  aux_read:				; 2C7h:30Dh = 70h:287Dh
  8758                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2
  8759 00000306 E311                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  8760 00000308 E87700                  		call	getbx		; put address of auxbuf	in bx
  8761 0000030B 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8762 0000030D 8607                    		xchg	al, [bx]
  8763 0000030F 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8764 00000311 7503                    		jnz	short aux2
  8765                                  aux1:					
  8766 00000313 E80500                  		call	auxin		; get character	from port
  8767                                  					; won't return if error
  8768                                  aux2:					
  8769 00000316 AA                      		stosb
  8770 00000317 E2FA                    		loop	aux1		; if more characters, go around	again
  8771                                  exvec2:					
  8772 00000319 F8                      		clc			; all done, successful exit
  8773                                  auxin_retn:	; 18/12/2022
  8774 0000031A C3                      		retn
  8775                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8776                                  
  8777                                  ;************************************************************************
  8778                                  ;*									*
  8779                                  ;*	auxin - call rom bios to read character from aux port		*
  8780                                  ;*		if error occurs, map the error and return one		*
  8781                                  ;*		level up to device driver exit code, setting		*
  8782                                  ;*		the number of bytes transferred appropriately		*
  8783                                  ;*									*
  8784                                  ;************************************************************************
  8785                                  
  8786                                  auxin:					
  8787 0000031B B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; auxfunc_receive
  8788 0000031D E83C00                  		call	auxop
  8789 00000320 F6C40E                  		test	ah, 0Eh		; flag_frame|flag_parity|flag_overrun
  8790                                  		;jnz	short arbad	; skip if any error bits set
  8791                                  		;retn
  8792                                  		; 25/06/2023 (BugFix)
  8793 00000323 74F5                    		jz	short auxin_retn
  8794                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8795                                  
  8796                                  arbad:					
  8797 00000325 58                      		pop	ax		; remove return	address	(near call)
  8798 00000326 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8799 00000328 0CB0                    		or	al, 0B0h	; flag_rec_sig|	flag_dsr|flag_cts
  8800 0000032A E9AAFD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8801                                  
  8802                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8803                                  
  8804                                  ;************************************************************************
  8805                                  ;*									*
  8806                                  ;*	aux_rdnd - non-destructive aux port read			*
  8807                                  ;*									*
  8808                                  ;************************************************************************
  8809                                  
  8810                                  aux_rdnd:				; 2C7h:335h = 70h:28A5h
  8811 0000032D E85200                  		call	getbx
  8812 00000330 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; have bx point	to auxbuf
  8813 00000332 08C0                    		or	al, al		; if al	is non-zero (char in buffer)
  8814 00000334 7511                    		jnz	short auxdrx	; then return character
  8815 00000336 E82100                  		call	auxstat		; if not, get status of	aux device
  8816 00000339 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; flag_data_ready - test data ready
  8817 0000033C 740C                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8818 0000033E A820                    		test	al, 20h		; flag_dsr - test data set ready
  8819 00000340 7408                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8820 00000342 E8D6FF                  		call	auxin		; else aux is ready, get character
  8821 00000345 8807                    		mov	[bx], al
  8822                                  auxdrx:					
  8823 00000347 E9A7FE                  		jmp	rdexit		; return busy status
  8824                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8825                                  
  8826                                  auxbus:					
  8827 0000034A E979FE                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  8828                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8829                                  
  8830                                  ;************************************************************************
  8831                                  ;*									*
  8832                                  ;*	aux_wrst - return aux port write status				*
  8833                                  ;*									*
  8834                                  ;************************************************************************
  8835                                  
  8836                                  aux_wrst:				; 2C7h:355h = 70h:28C5h
  8837 0000034D E80A00                  		call	auxstat		; get status of	aux in ax
  8838 00000350 A820                    		test	al, 20h		; test data set	ready
  8839 00000352 74F6                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8840 00000354 F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; flag_tranhol_emp - test transmit hold	reg empty
  8841 00000357 74F1                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8842                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8843                                  		; cf=0	; (test instruction resets cf)
  8844                                  		;clc
  8845 00000359 C3                      		retn
  8846                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8847                                  
  8848                                  ;************************************************************************
  8849                                  ;*									*
  8850                                  ;*	auxstat - call rom bios to determine aux port status		*
  8851                                  ;*									*
  8852                                  ;*	exit:	ax = status						*
  8853                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  8854                                  ;*									*
  8855                                  ;************************************************************************
  8856                                  
  8857                                  auxstat:				
  8858 0000035A B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; auxfunc_status
  8859                                  
  8860                                  		; fall into auxop
  8861                                  
  8862                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8863                                  
  8864                                  ;************************************************************************
  8865                                  ;*									*
  8866                                  ;*	auxop - perform rom-biox aux port interrupt			*
  8867                                  ;*									*
  8868                                  ;*	entry:	ah = int 14h function number				*
  8869                                  ;*	exit:	ax = results						*
  8870                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  8871                                  ;*									*
  8872                                  ;************************************************************************
  8873                                  
  8874                                  auxop:		; proc near		
  8875 0000035C 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; ah=function code
  8876                                  					; 0=init, 1=send, 2=receive, 3=status
  8877                                  					; get port number
  8878 00000360 CD14                    		int	14h		; SERIAL I/O - GET USART STATUS
  8879                                  					; DX = port number (0-3)
  8880                                  					; Return: AX = port status code
  8881 00000362 C3                      		retn
  8882                                  
  8883                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8884                                  
  8885                                  ;************************************************************************
  8886                                  ;*									*
  8887                                  ;*	aux_flsh - flush aux input buffer - set contents of		*
  8888                                  ;*		   auxbuf [auxnum] to zero				*
  8889                                  ;*									*
  8890                                  ;*	cas - shouldn't this code call the rom bios input function	*
  8891                                  ;*	      repeatedly until it isn't ready?  to flush out any	*
  8892                                  ;*	      pending serial input queue if there's a tsr like MODE	*
  8893                                  ;*	      which is providing interrupt-buffering of aux port?	*
  8894                                  ;*									*
  8895                                  ;************************************************************************
  8896                                  
  8897                                  aux_flsh:				; 2C7h:36Ch = 70h:28DCh
  8898 00000363 E81C00                  		call	getbx		; flush	aux input buffer
  8899 00000366 C60700                  		mov	byte [bx], 0	; get bx to point to auxbuf
  8900                                  					; zero out buffer
  8901                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  8902                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8903                                  		; cf=0 ('add' instruction in 'getbx')
  8904 00000369 C3                      		retn
  8905                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8906                                  
  8907                                  ;************************************************************************
  8908                                  ;*									*
  8909                                  ;*	aux_writ - write to aux device					*
  8910                                  ;*									*
  8911                                  ;************************************************************************
  8912                                  
  8913                                  aux_writ:				; 2C7h:374h = 70h:28E4h
  8914                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2	; write	to aux device (if cx > 0)
  8915 0000036A E3AD                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  8916                                  aux_loop:				
  8917 0000036C 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to be written
  8918                                  					; move di pointer to next character
  8919 0000036F 47                      		inc	di
  8920 00000370 B401                    		mov	ah, 1		; auxfunc_send - indicates a write
  8921 00000372 E8E7FF                  		call	auxop		; send character over aux port
  8922 00000375 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; check	for error
  8923 00000378 7405                    		jz	short awok	; then no error
  8924 0000037A B00A                    		mov	al, 10		; else indicate	write fault
  8925 0000037C E958FD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt	; call error routines
  8926                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8927                                  
  8928                                  awok:					
  8929 0000037F E2EB                    		loop	aux_loop	; if cx	is non-zero,
  8930                                  					; still	more character to print
  8931                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  8932                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8933                                  		; cf=0 (test instruction above)	
  8934 00000381 C3                      		retn
  8935                                  
  8936                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8937                                  
  8938                                  ;************************************************************************
  8939                                  ;*									*
  8940                                  ;*	getbx - return bx -> single byte input buffer for		*
  8941                                  ;*		selected aux port ([auxnum])				*
  8942                                  ;*									*
  8943                                  ;************************************************************************
  8944                                  
  8945                                  getbx:	
  8946 00000382 8B1E[2100]              		mov	bx, [auxnum]	; return bx -> single byte input buffer
  8947                                  					; for selected aux port	([auxnum])
  8948                                  		;add	bx, offset auxbuf
  8949 00000386 81C3[1600]              		add	bx, auxbuf	; 19/10/2022
  8950                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8951                                  		; cf=0 (if [uaxnum] is valid number) 
  8952 0000038A C3                      		retn
  8953                                  
  8954                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8955                                  
  8956                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8957                                  
  8958                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  8959                                  ;								:
  8960                                  ;		    clock device driver 			:
  8961                                  ;								:
  8962                                  ;								:
  8963                                  ;   this file contains the clock device driver. 		:
  8964                                  ;								:
  8965                                  ;   the routines in this files are:				:
  8966                                  ;								:
  8967                                  ;	routine 		function			:
  8968                                  ;	------- 		--------			:
  8969                                  ;	tim_writ		set the current time		:
  8970                                  ;	tim_read		read the current time		:
  8971                                  ;	time_to_ticks		convert time to corresponding	:
  8972                                  ;				  number of clock ticks 	:
  8973                                  ;								:
  8974                                  ; the clock ticks at the rate of:				:
  8975                                  ;								:
  8976                                  ;	1193180/65536 ticks/second (about 18.2 ticks per second):
  8977                                  ; see each routine for information on the use.			:
  8978                                  ;								:
  8979                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  8980                                  
  8981                                  ; convert time to ticks
  8982                                  ; input : time in cx and dx
  8983                                  ; ticks returned in cx:dx
  8984                                  
  8985                                  ;19/07/2019
  8986                                  ;09/03/2019
  8987                                  
  8988                                  time_to_ticks:				; 0070h:2906h =	02C7h:0396h
  8989                                  
  8990                                  ; first convert from hour,min,sec,hund. to
  8991                                  ; total number of 100th of seconds
  8992                                  
  8993 0000038B B03C                    		mov	al, 60
  8994 0000038D F6E5                    		mul	ch		; hours	to minutes
  8995 0000038F B500                    		mov	ch, 0
  8996 00000391 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; total	minutes
  8997 00000393 B97017                  		mov	cx, 6000	; 60*100
  8998 00000396 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; get out of the way of	the multiply
  8999 00000398 F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to 1/100 sec
  9000 0000039A 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
  9001 0000039C B064                    		mov	al, 100
  9002 0000039E F6E7                    		mul	bh		; convert seconds to 1/100 sec
  9003 000003A0 01C1                    		add	cx, ax		; combine seconds with hours and min
  9004 000003A2 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0		; ripple carry
  9005 000003A5 B700                    		mov	bh, 0
  9006 000003A7 01D9                    		add	cx, bx		; combine 1/100	sec
  9007 000003A9 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  9008                                  
  9009                                  	; dx:cx is time in 1/100 sec
  9010                                  
  9011 000003AC 92                      		xchg	ax, dx
  9012 000003AD 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; now time is in cx:ax
  9013 000003AE BB0BE9                  		mov	bx, 59659
  9014 000003B1 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply low half
  9015 000003B3 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx
  9016 000003B5 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; cx->ax, ax->dx, dx->cx
  9017 000003B6 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply high	half
  9018 000003B8 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; combine overlapping products
  9019 000003BA 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  9020 000003BD 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; ax:dx=time*59659
  9021 000003BE BB0500                  		mov	bx, 5
  9022 000003C1 F6F3                    		div	bl		; divide high half by 5
  9023 000003C3 88C1                    		mov	cl, al
  9024 000003C5 B500                    		mov	ch, 0
  9025 000003C7 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; remainder of divide-by-5
  9026 000003C9 98                      		cbw
  9027 000003CA 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; use it to extend low half
  9028 000003CB F7F3                    		div	bx		; divide low half by 5
  9029 000003CD 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax		; cx:dx	is now number of ticks in time
  9030 000003CF CB                      		retf			; far return
  9031                                  
  9032                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9033                                  
  9034                                  ; 17/10/2022
  9035                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9036                                  
  9037                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
  9038                                  ;
  9039                                  ; tim_writ sets the current time
  9040                                  ;
  9041                                  ; on entry es:[di] has the current time:
  9042                                  ;
  9043                                  ;	number of days since 1-1-80	(word)
  9044                                  ;	minutes (0-59)			(byte)
  9045                                  ;	hours (0-23)			(byte)
  9046                                  ;	hundredths of seconds (0-99)	(byte)
  9047                                  ;	seconds (0-59)			(byte)
  9048                                  ;
  9049                                  ; each number has been checked for the correct range.
  9050                                  ;
  9051                                  ;	NOTE: Any changes in this routine probably require corresponding
  9052                                  ;	changes in the version that is built with the power manager driver.
  9053                                  ;	See ptime.asm.
  9054                                  ;
  9055                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
  9056                                  
  9057                                  tim_writ:				; 2C7h:3DBh = 70h:294Bh
  9058 000003D0 268B05                  		mov	ax, [es:di]
  9059 000003D3 50                      		push	ax		; daycnt. we need to set this at the very
  9060                                  					; end to avoid tick windows.
  9061 000003D4 803E[F304]00            		cmp	byte [havecmosclock], 0
  9062                                  		;cmp	ds:havecmosclock, 0
  9063 000003D9 7426                    		jz	short no_cmos_1
  9064 000003DB 268A4503                		mov	al, [es:di+3]	; near indirect	calls
  9065                                  					; get binary hours
  9066                                  					; convert to bcd
  9067 000003DF FF1E[0205]              		call	far [bintobcd]
  9068                                  		;call	ds:bintobcd	; call far [bintobcd]
  9069 000003E3 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; ch = bcd hours
  9070 000003E5 268A4502                		mov	al, [es:di+2]	; get binary minutes
  9071 000003E9 FF1E[0205]              		call	far [bintobcd]
  9072                                  		;call	ds:bintobcd	; convert to bcd
  9073 000003ED 88C1                    		mov	cl, al		; cl = bcd minutes
  9074 000003EF 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; get binary seconds
  9075 000003F3 FF1E[0205]              		call	far [bintobcd]
  9076                                  		;call	ds:bintobcd
  9077 000003F7 88C6                    		mov	dh, al		; dh = bcd seconds
  9078 000003F9 B200                    		mov	dl, 0		; dl = 0 (st) or 1 (dst)
  9079 000003FB FA                      		cli
  9080 000003FC B403                    		mov	ah, 3
  9081 000003FE CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET REAL TIME	CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  9082                                  					; CH = hours in	BCD, CL	= minutes in BCD
  9083                                  					;  DH =	seconds	in BCD,DL = 01h	if daylight savings, 00h if standard time
  9084                                  					; Return: CMOS clock set
  9085 00000400 FB                      		sti
  9086                                  no_cmos_1:				
  9087 00000401 268B4D02                		mov	cx, [es:di+2]
  9088 00000405 268B5504                		mov	dx, [es:di+4]
  9089                                  		; 17/10/2022
  9090 00000409 FF1E[E206]              		call	far [ttticks]
  9091                                  		;call	dword ptr ds:ttticks ; call far	[ttticks]
  9092                                  					; convert time to ticks
  9093                                  					; cx:dx	now has	time in	ticks
  9094 0000040D FA                      		cli			; turn off timer
  9095 0000040E B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  9096 00000410 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET TIME OF DAY
  9097                                  					; CX:DX	= clock	count
  9098                                  					; Return: time of day set
  9099                                  		;pop	ds:daycnt
  9100 00000412 8F06[F004]              		pop	word [daycnt]
  9101 00000416 FB                      		sti
  9102                                  		;cmp	ds:havecmosclock, 0
  9103 00000417 803E[F304]00            		cmp	byte [havecmosclock], 0
  9104 0000041C 740A                    		jz	short no_cmos_2
  9105 0000041E FF1E[0605]              		call	far [daycnttoday]
  9106                                  		;call	ds:daycnttoday	; call far [daycnttoday]
  9107                                  					; convert to bcd format
  9108 00000422 FA                      		cli
  9109 00000423 B405                    		mov	ah, 5
  9110 00000425 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET DATE IN REAL TIME	CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  9111                                  					; DL = day in BCD, DH =	month in BCD, CL = year	in BCD
  9112                                  					; CH = century (19h or 20h)
  9113                                  					; Return: CMOS clock set
  9114 00000427 FB                      		sti
  9115                                  no_cmos_2:
  9116                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9117                                  		; cf=0				
  9118                                  		;clc
  9119 00000428 C3                      		retn
  9120                                  
  9121                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9122                                  
  9123                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9124                                  
  9125                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9126                                  ; gettime reads date and time
  9127                                  ; and returns the following information:
  9128                                  ;
  9129                                  ;	es:[di]  =count of days since 1-1-80
  9130                                  ;	es:[di+2]=hours
  9131                                  ;	es:[di+3]=minutes
  9132                                  ;	es:[di+4]=seconds
  9133                                  ;	es:[di+5]=hundredths of seconds
  9134                                  ;
  9135                                  ;	NOTE:  Any changes in this routine probably require corresponding
  9136                                  ;	changes in the version that is built with the power manager driver.
  9137                                  ;	See ptime.asm.
  9138                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9139                                  
  9140                                  tim_read:				; 2C7h:435h = 70h:29A5h
  9141 00000429 E84E00                  		call	GetTickCnt
  9142 0000042C 8B36[F004]              		mov	si, [daycnt]
  9143                                  
  9144                                  ; we now need to convert the time in tick to the time in 100th of
  9145                                  ; seconds. the relation between tick and seconds is:
  9146                                  ;
  9147                                  ;		 65,536 seconds
  9148                                  ;	       ----------------
  9149                                  ;		1,193,180 tick
  9150                                  ;
  9151                                  ; to get to 100th of second we need to multiply by 100. the equation is:
  9152                                  ;
  9153                                  ;	ticks from clock  * 65,536 * 100
  9154                                  ;      --------------------------------- = time in 100th of seconds
  9155                                  ;		1,193,180
  9156                                  ;
  9157                                  ; fortunately this formula simplifies to:
  9158                                  ;
  9159                                  ;	ticks from clock * 5 * 65,536
  9160                                  ;      --------------------------------- = time in 100th of seconds
  9161                                  ;		59,659
  9162                                  ;
  9163                                  ; the calculation is done by first multipling tick by 5. next we divide by
  9164                                  ; 59,659. in this division we multiply by 65,536 by shifting the dividend
  9165                                  ; my 16 bits to the left.
  9166                                  ;
  9167                                  ; start with ticks in cx:dx
  9168                                  ; multiply by 5
  9169                                  
  9170 00000430 89C8                    		mov	ax, cx
  9171 00000432 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; start	with ticks in cx:dx
  9172                                  					; multiply by 5
  9173 00000434 D1E2                    		shl	dx, 1
  9174 00000436 D1D1                    		rcl	cx, 1		; times	2
  9175 00000438 D1E2                    		shl	dx, 1
  9176 0000043A D1D1                    		rcl	cx, 1		; times	4
  9177 0000043C 01DA                    		add	dx, bx
  9178 0000043E 11C8                    		adc	ax, cx		; times	5
  9179 00000440 92                      		xchg	ax, dx
  9180                                  
  9181                                  ; now have ticks * 5 in	dx:ax
  9182                                  ; we now need to multiply by 65536 and divide by 59659 d.
  9183                                  
  9184 00000441 B90BE9                  		mov	cx, 59659	; get divisor
  9185 00000444 F7F1                    		div	cx		; dx now has remainder
  9186                                  					; ax has high word of final quotient
  9187 00000446 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax		; put high word	in safe	place
  9188 00000448 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax		; this is the multiply by 65536
  9189 0000044A F7F1                    		div	cx		; bx:ax	now has	time in	100th of seconds
  9190                                  
  9191                                  ; rounding based on the	remainder may be added here
  9192                                  ; the result in	bx:ax is time in 1/100 second.
  9193                                  
  9194 0000044C 89DA                    		mov	dx, bx		
  9195 0000044E B9C800                  		mov	cx, 200		;extract 1/100's
  9196                                  
  9197                                  ; division by 200 is necessary to ensure no overflow--max result
  9198                                  ; is number of seconds in a day/2 = 43200.
  9199                                  
  9200 00000451 F7F1                    		div	cx
  9201 00000453 80FA64                  		cmp	dl, 100		; remainder over 100?
  9202 00000456 7203                    		jb	short noadj
  9203 00000458 80EA64                  		sub	dl, 100		; keep 1/100's less than 100
  9204                                  noadj:					
  9205 0000045B F5                      		cmc			; if we	subtracted 100,	carry is now set
  9206 0000045C 88D3                    		mov	bl, dl		; save 1/100's
  9207                                  
  9208                                  ; to compensate	for dividing by	200 instead of 100, we now multiply
  9209                                  ; by two, shifting a one in if the remainder had exceeded 100.
  9210                                  
  9211 0000045E D1D0                    		rcl	ax, 1		
  9212 00000460 B200                    		mov	dl, 0
  9213 00000462 D1D2                    		rcl	dx, 1
  9214 00000464 B93C00                  		mov	cx, 60		; divide out seconds
  9215 00000467 F7F1                    		div	cx
  9216 00000469 88D7                    		mov	bh, dl		; save the seconds
  9217 0000046B F6F1                    		div	cl		; break	into hours and minutes
  9218 0000046D 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah
  9219                                  
  9220                                  ; time is now in ax:bx (hours, minutes, seconds, 1/100 sec)
  9221                                  
  9222 0000046F 50                      		push	ax
  9223 00000470 89F0                    		mov	ax, si		; daycnt
  9224 00000472 AB                      		stosw
  9225 00000473 58                      		pop	ax
  9226 00000474 AB                      		stosw
  9227 00000475 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  9228 00000477 AB                      		stosw
  9229 00000478 F8                      		clc
  9230 00000479 C3                      		retn
  9231                                  
  9232                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9233                                  
  9234                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9235                                  
  9236                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9237                                  ;
  9238                                  ; procedure : GetTickCnt
  9239                                  ;
  9240                                  ;		Returns the tick count in CX:DX. Takes care of DayCnt in case
  9241                                  ;		of rollover [except when power management driver is in use]. 
  9242                                  ;		Uses the following logic for updating Daycnt
  9243                                  ;
  9244                                  ;		if ( rollover ) {
  9245                                  ;			if ( t_switch )
  9246                                  ;				daycnt++ ;
  9247                                  ;			else
  9248                                  ;				daycnt += rollover ;
  9249                                  ;		}
  9250                                  ;
  9251                                  ; USES : AX
  9252                                  ;
  9253                                  ; RETURNS : CX:DX - tick count
  9254                                  ; MODIFIES : daycnt
  9255                                  ;
  9256                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9257                                  
  9258                                  		; 17/10/2022
  9259                                  GetTickCnt:	
  9260 0000047A 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  9261 0000047C CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- GET TIME OF DAY
  9262                                  					; Return: CX:DX	= clock	count
  9263                                  					; AL = 00h if clock was	read or	written	(via AH=0,1) since the previous
  9264                                  					; midnight
  9265                                  					; Otherwise, AL	> 0
  9266 0000047E 803E[F204]00            		cmp	byte [t_switch], 0 ; use old method ? (>0 is yes)
  9267 00000483 7507                    		jnz	short inc_case	; old method assumes  that Int 1Ah returns rollover flag
  9268 00000485 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; new method assumes that Int 1Ah returns roll over count
  9269                                  					; and not flag
  9270 00000487 0106[F004]              		add	[daycnt], ax
  9271 0000048B C3                      		retn
  9272                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9273                                  
  9274                                  inc_case:				
  9275 0000048C 08C0                    		or	al, al
  9276 0000048E 7404                    		jz	short no_rollover
  9277 00000490 FF06[F004]              		inc	word [daycnt]
  9278                                  no_rollover:				
  9279 00000494 C3                      		retn
  9280                                  
  9281                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------

  9283                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9284                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  9285                                  ; 09/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  9286                                  
  9287                                  ; MSDISK.ASM - MSDOS 3.3 - 02/02/1988
  9288                                  ; 26/05/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  9289                                  ; 23/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0
  9290                                  
  9291                                  ;error_unknown_media equ	7	; for use in BUILD BPB call
  9292                                  
  9293                                  ;struc BPB_TYPE
  9294                                  ;.SECSIZE:	resw 1
  9295                                  ;.SECALL:	resb 1
  9296                                  ;.RESNUM:	resw 1
  9297                                  ;.FATNUM:	resb 1
  9298                                  ;.DIRNUM:	resw 1
  9299                                  ;.SECNUM:	resw 1
  9300                                  ;.FATID:	resb 1
  9301                                  ;.FATSIZE:	resw 1
  9302                                  ;.SLIM:		resw 1
  9303                                  ;.HLIM:		resw 1
  9304                                  ;.HIDDEN:	resw 1
  9305                                  ;.size:
  9306                                  ;endstruc
  9307                                  
  9308                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------
  9309                                  ;	disk interface routines
  9310                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------
  9311                                  
  9312                                  ; device attribute bits:
  9313                                  ;	bit 6 - get/set map for logical drives and generic ioctl.
  9314                                  
  9315                                  ;MAXERR		equ	5
  9316                                  ;MAX_HD_FMT_ERR	equ	2
  9317                                  
  9318                                  ;LSTDRV	equ 504h
  9319                                  
  9320                                  ; some floppies do not have changeline. as a result, media-check would
  9321                                  ; normally return i-don't-know, the dos would continually reread the fat and
  9322                                  ; discard cached data. we optimize this by implementing a logical door-latch:
  9323                                  ; it is physically impossible to change a disk in under 2 seconds. we retain
  9324                                  ; the time of the last successful disk operation and compare it with the current
  9325                                  ; time during media-check. if < 2 seconds and at least 1 timer tick has passed,
  9326                                  ; the we say no change. if > 2 seconds then we say i-don't-know. finally, 
  9327                                  ; since we cannot trust the timer to be always available, we record the number 
  9328                                  ; of media checks that have occurred when no apparent time has elapsed. while
  9329                                  ; this number is < a given threshold, we say no change. when it exceeds that
  9330                                  ; threshold, we say i-don't-know and reset the counter to 0. when we store 
  9331                                  ; the time of last successful access, if we see that time has passed too,
  9332                                  ; we reset the counter.
  9333                                  
  9334                                  accessmax	equ	5
  9335                                  
  9336                                  ; due to various bogosities, we need to continually adjust what the head
  9337                                  ; settle time is.  the following algorithm is used:
  9338                                  ;
  9339                                  ;   get the current head settle value.
  9340                                  ;   if it is 0, then
  9341                                  ;	set slow = 15
  9342                                  ;   else
  9343                                  ;	set slow = value
  9344                                  ;   ...
  9345                                  ;*********************************************
  9346                                  ;************ old algorithm ******************
  9347                                  ;*   if we are seeking and writing then
  9348                                  ;*	 use slow
  9349                                  ;*   else
  9350                                  ;*	 use fast
  9351                                  ;*********************************************
  9352                                  ;*********** ibm's requested logic ***********
  9353                                  ;   if we are seeking and writing and not on an at then
  9354                                  ;	use slow
  9355                                  ;   else
  9356                                  ;	use fast
  9357                                  ;   ...
  9358                                  ;   restore current head settle value
  9359                                  ;
  9360                                  ;
  9361                                  ;---------------------------------------
  9362                                  multrk_on	equ	10000000b	;user spcified mutitrack=on, or system turns
  9363                                  					; it on after handling config.sys file as a
  9364                                  					; default value, if multrk_flag = multrk_off1.
  9365                                  multrk_off1	equ	00000000b	;initial value. no "multitrack=" command entered.
  9366                                  multrk_off2	equ	00000001b	;user specified multitrack=off.
  9367                                  
  9368                                  ; close data segment, open Bios_Code segment
  9369                                  
  9370                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9371                                  
  9372                                  ; BIOSCODE:04A2h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  9373                                  
  9374                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------
  9375                                  ;	command jump table
  9376                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------
  9377                                  
  9378 00000495 00                      		db 0
  9379                                  
  9380                                  ; 11/12/2022
  9381                                  %if 0
  9382                                  
  9383                                  dsktbl:		db 26			; 2C7h:4A2h = 70h:2A12h

  9446                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9447                                  
  9448                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9449                                  ; setdrive scans through the data structure of bdss, and returns a pointer to
  9450                                  ; the one that belongs to the drive specified. carry is set if none exists
  9451                                  ; for the drive. Pointer is returned in es:[di]
  9452                                  ;
  9453                                  ;  AL contains the logical drive number.
  9454                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9455                                  
  9456                                  SetDrive:	
  9457                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds ; Point es:di to first bds	
  9458 000004CB C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; 19/10/2022
  9459                                  X_Scan_Loop:				
  9460 000004CF 26384505                		cmp	[es:di+5], al	
  9461 000004D3 7409                    		jz	short X_SetDrv
  9462 000004D5 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link] ; Go	to next	bds
  9463 000004D8 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
  9464 000004DB 75F2                    		jnz	short X_Scan_Loop
  9465 000004DD F9                      		stc
  9466                                  X_SetDrv:				
  9467 000004DE C3                      		retn
  9468                                  
  9469                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9470                                  
  9471                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9472                                  
  9473                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------
  9474                                  ; if id is f9, have a 96tpi disk else
  9475                                  ; if bit 2 is 0 then media is not removable and could not have changed
  9476                                  ;  otherwise if within 2 secs of last disk operation media could not
  9477                                  ;    have changed, otherwise dont know if media has changed
  9478                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------
  9479                                  
  9480                                  media_chk:				; 2C7h:4EBh = 70h:2A5Bh
  9481 000004DF E8E9FF                  		call	SetDrive
  9482 000004E2 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1
  9483 000004E5 26F6452401              		test	byte [es:di+24h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags+1]
  9484                                  					; fchanged_by_format
  9485 000004EA 7416                    		jz	short WeAreNotFakingIt
  9486                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9487 000004EC 26806524FE              		and	byte [es:di+24h], 0FEh ; ~fchanged_by_format
  9488                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FEFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
  9489                                  					; ~fchanged_by_format ;	reset flag
  9490 000004F1 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh ; -1
  9491                                  					; Ensure that we ask the rom if media has changed
  9492 000004F6 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
  9493                                  					; fnon_removable
  9494 000004FB 740C                    		jz	short wehaveafloppy
  9495 000004FD BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; Indicate media changed
  9496 00000500 EB2C                    		jmp	short Media_Done ; Media_Done
  9497                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9498                                  
  9499                                  WeAreNotFakingIt:
  9500                                  		;test	byte [es:di+BDS.flags], fnon_removable			
  9501 00000502 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
  9502 00000507 7525                    		jnz	short Media_Done
  9503                                  wehaveafloppy:				
  9504 00000509 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; Presume "I don't know"
  9505                                  
  9506                                  		; If we have a floppy with changeline support, we ask the ROM
  9507                                  		; to determine if media has changed. We do not perform the
  9508                                  		; 2 second check for these drives.
  9509                                  
  9510 0000050B 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0	; Do we	have changeline	support?
  9511 00000510 740A                    		jz	short mChk_NoChangeLine	; Brif not
  9512 00000512 E87812                  		call	mediacheck	;  Call	into removable routine
  9513 00000515 7236                    		jb	short err_exitj
  9514 00000517 E8C813                  		call	haschange
  9515 0000051A 7512                    		jnz	short Media_Done
  9516                                  mChk_NoChangeLine:
  9517                                  		; If we come here, we have a floppy with no changeline support
  9518                                  			
  9519 0000051C BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; Presume no change
  9520 0000051F A0[1E01]                		mov	al, [tim_drv]	; Last drive accessed
  9521 00000522 263A4504                		cmp	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
  9522                                  					; Is drive of last access the same?

  9533                                  Media_Done:

  9558                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9559                                  
  9560                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9561                                  ; perform a check on the time passed since the last access for this physical
  9562                                  ; drive.
  9563                                  ; we are accessing the same drive. if the time of last successful access was
  9564                                  ; less than 2 seconds ago, then we may presume that the disk was not changed.
  9565                                  ; returns in si:
  9566                                  ;	0 - if time of last access was >= 2 seconds
  9567                                  ;	1 - if time was < 2 seconds (i.e no media change assumed)
  9568                                  ; registers affected ax,cx,dx, flags.
  9569                                  ;
  9570                                  ;	assume es:di -> bds, ds->Bios_Data
  9571                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9572                                  
  9573                                  		; 19/10/2022
  9574                                  Check_Time_Of_Access:
  9575 00000553 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; presume no change.
  9576 00000556 E821FF                  		call	GetTickCnt	; cx:dx	is the elapsed time
  9577 00000559 268B4547                		mov	ax, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
  9578                                  					; get stored time
  9579 0000055D 29C2                    		sub	dx, ax
  9580 0000055F 268B4549                		mov	ax, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
  9581 00000563 19C1                    		sbb	cx, ax
  9582 00000565 751A                    		jnz	short timecheck_unk ; cx<>0 => >1 hour
  9583 00000567 09D2                    		or	dx, dx		; time must pass
  9584 00000569 7511                    		jnz	short timepassed ; yes, examine max value
  9585 0000056B FE06[1D01]              		inc	byte [accesscount]
  9586 0000056F 803E[1D01]05            		cmp	byte [accesscount], 5 
  9587                                  					; if count is less than threshold, ok
  9588 00000574 720C                    		jb	short timecheck_ret
  9589 00000576 FE0E[1D01]              		dec	byte [accesscount] ; don't let the count wrap
  9590 0000057A EB05                    		jmp	short timecheck_unk ; "i don't know" if media changed
  9591                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9592                                  
  9593                                  timepassed:				
  9594 0000057C 83FA24                  		cmp	dx, 36		; 18*2 ; 18.2 tics per second.
  9595                                  					; min elapsed time? (2 seconds)
  9596 0000057F 7601                    		jbe	short timecheck_ret ; yes, presume no change
  9597                                  
  9598                                  		; everything indicates that we do not know what has happened.
  9599                                  timecheck_unk:				
  9600 00000581 4E                      		dec	si		; presume i don't know
  9601                                  timecheck_ret:				
  9602 00000582 C3                      		retn
  9603

  9636 000005A4 C606[0A05]00            		mov	byte [set_id_flag], 0

  9679                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------
  9680                                  ; clear ids in bds table. only applied for floppies.
  9681                                  ;input:  es:di -> bds table

  9683                                  ;output: volid set to "NO NAME    "
  9684                                  ;	 vol_serial set to 0.

  9686                                  ;	   depending on the flag fatsize in bds.

  9731                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9732                                  
  9733                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9734                                  ;	getbp - return bpb from the drive specified by the bds.
  9735                                  ;	    if the return_fake_bpb flag is set, then it does nothing.
  9736                                  ;	    note that we never come here for fixed disks.
  9737                                  ;	    for all other cases,
  9738                                  ;	      - it reads boot sector to pull out the bpb
  9739                                  ;	      - if no valid bpb is found, it then reads the fat sector,
  9740                                  ;		to get the fat id byte to build the bpb from there.
  9741                                  ;
  9742                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds.
  9743                                  ;
  9744                                  ;   outputs:	fills in bpb in current bds if valid bpb or fat id on disk.
  9745                                  ;		carry set, and al=7 if invalid disk.
  9746                                  ;		carry set and error code in al if other error.
  9747                                  ;		if failed to recognize the boot record, then will set the
  9748                                  ;		set_id_flag to 0.
  9749                                  ;		this routine will only work for a floppy diskette.
  9750                                  ;		     for a fixed disk, it will just return.
  9751                                  ;
  9752                                  ;	****** Note: getbp is a clone of getbp which uses the newer
  9753                                  ;	  segment definitions. It should be migrated towards.
  9754                                  ;	   now es:di has the bds, ds: has Bios_Data
  9755                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9756                                  
  9757                                  GetBp:		; if returning fake bpb then return bpb as is.
  9758                                  		;test	byte [es:di+BDS.flags], return_fake_bpb|fnon_removable		
  9759 000005F7 26F6452305              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 5
  9760 000005FC 7403                    		jz	short getbp1	; getbp1
  9761 000005FE E99A00                  		jmp	getret_exit
  9762                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9763                                  
  9764                                  getbp1:					
  9765 00000601 51                      		push	cx
  9766 00000602 52                      		push	dx
  9767 00000603 53                      		push	bx
  9768                                  
  9769                                  		; attempt to read in boot sector and determine bpb.
  9770                                  		; we assume that the 2.x and greater dos disks all
  9771                                  		; have a valid boot sector.
  9772                                  
  9773 00000604 E8A900                  		call	readbootsec
  9774 00000607 7209                    		jb	short getbp_err_ret_brdg ; carry set if there was error.
  9775 00000609 09DB                    		or	bx, bx		; bx is	0 if boot sector is valid.
  9776 0000060B 7508                    		jnz	short dofatbpb
  9777 0000060D E8EE00                  		call	movbpb		; move bpb into	registers
  9778 00000610 EB57                    		jmp	short Has1
  9779                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9780                                  
  9781                                  getbp_err_ret_brdg:			
  9782 00000612 E98700                  		jmp	getbp_err_ret
  9783                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9784                                  
  9785                                  		; we have a 1.x diskette. In this case read in the fat ID byte
  9786                                  		; and fill in bpb from there.
  9787                                  dofatbpb:
