  9922                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9923                                  
  9924                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  9925                                  
  9926                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------
  9927                                  ; read in the boot sector. set carry if error in reading sector.
  9928                                  ; bx is set to 1 if the boot sector is invalid, otherwise it is 0.
  9929                                  ;
  9930                                  ;	assumes es:di -> bds, ds-> Bios_Data
  9931                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------
  9932                                  
  9933                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  9934                                  
  9935                                  readbootsec:	
  9936 000006B0 B600                    		mov	dh, 0		; head 0
  9937 000006B2 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1		; cylinder 0, sector 1
  9938 000006B5 E8BF00                  		call	read_sector
  9939 000006B8 7243                    		jb	short err_ret
  9940 000006BA 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx		; assume valid boot sector
  9941                                  
  9942                                  		; put a sanity check for the boot sector in here to detect
  9943                                  		; boot sectors that do not have valid bpbs. we examine the
  9944                                  		; first two bytes - they must contain a long jump (69h) or a
  9945                                  		; short jump (EBh) followed by a nop (90h), or a short jump
  9946                                  		; (E9h). if this test is passed, we further check by examining
  9947                                  		; the signature at the end of the boot sector for the word
  9948                                  		; AA55h. if the signature is not present, we examine the media
  9949                                  		; descriptor byte to see if it is valid. for dos 3.3, this
  9950                                  		; logic is modified a little bit. we are not going to check
  9951                                  		; signature. instead we are going to sanity check the media
  9952                                  		; byte in bpb regardless of the validity of signature. this is
  9953                                  		; to save the already developed commercial products that have
  9954                                  		; good jump instruction and signature but with the false bpb
  9955                                  		; informations
  9956                                  
  9957                                  ; that will crash the diskette drive operation. (for example, symphony diskette).
  9958                                  
  9959                                  		; 02/09/2023
  9960                                  		; 19/10/2022
  9961                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector], 69h ; is it a direct jump?
  9962                                  		;jz	short check_bpb_mediabyte ; don't need to find a nop
  9963                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector], 0E9h ; dos 2.0 jump?
  9964                                  		;jz	short check_bpb_mediabyte ; no need for	nop
  9965                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector], 0EBh ; how about a short jump?
  9966                                  		;jnz	short invalidbootsec
  9967                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+2], 90h ; is next one a nop?
  9968                                  		;jnz	short invalidbootsec
  9969                                  
  9970                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
  9971 000006BC A0[4E01]                		mov	al, [disksector]
  9972 000006BF 3C69                    		cmp	al, 69h		; is it a direct jump?
  9973 000006C1 740F                    		je	short check_bpb_mediabyte
  9974                                  					; don't need to find a nop
  9975 000006C3 3CE9                    		cmp	al, 0E9h	; dos 2.0 jump?
  9976 000006C5 740B                    		je	short check_bpb_mediabyte
  9977                                  					; no need for nop
  9978 000006C7 3CEB                    		cmp	al, 0EBh	; how about a short jump?
  9979 000006C9 7530                    		jne	short invalidbootsec
  9980 000006CB 803E[5001]90            		cmp	byte [disksector+2], 90h ; is next one a nop?
  9981 000006D0 7529                    		jne	short invalidbootsec
  9982                                  
  9983                                  ; 15/10/5022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  9984                                  ;
  9985                                  ;; 10/03/2019
  9986                                  ;; (MSDOS 3.3, MSDISK.ASM, 1988)
  9987                                  ;;
  9988                                  ;; Don't have to perform the following signature check since
  9989                                  ;; we need to check the media byte even with the good signatured diskette.
  9990                                  ;;
  9991                                  ;;check_signature:
  9992                                  ;;		cmp	word [cs:disksector+1FEh],0AA55h ; see if non-ibm
  9993                                  ;;							 ; disk or 1.x media.
  9994                                  ;;		jz	short checksinglesided ; go see if single sided medium.
  9995                                  ;;					       ; may need some special handling
  9996                                  
  9997                                  ; check for non-ibm disks which do not have the signature AA55h at the
  9998                                  ; end of the boot sector, but still have a valid boot sector. this is done
  9999                                  ; by examining the media descriptor in the boot sector.
 10000                                  
 10001                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10002                                  check_bpb_mediabyte:			
 10003 000006D2 A0[6301]                		mov	al, [disksector+15h]
 10004                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 10005 000006D5 50                      		push	ax ; 02/09/2023
 10006 000006D6 24F0                    		and	al, 0F0h
 10007 000006D8 3CF0                    		cmp	al, 0F0h	; allow	for strange media
 10008 000006DA 58                      		pop	ax ; 02/09/2023
 10009 000006DB 751E                    		jnz	short invalidbootsec
 10010                                  
 10011                                  ; there were some (apparently a lot of them) diskettes that had been formatted
 10012                                  ; under dos 3.1 and earlier versions which have invalid bpbs in their boot
 10013                                  ; sectors. these are specifically diskettes that were formatted in drives
 10014                                  ; with one head, or whose side 0 was bad. these contain bpbs in the boot
 10015                                  ; sector that have the sec/clus field set to 2 instead of 1, as is standard
 10016                                  ; in dos. in order to support them, we have to introduce a "hack" that will
 10017                                  ; help our build bpb routine to recognise these specific cases, and to
 10018                                  ; set up out copy of the bpb accordingly.
 10019                                  ; we do this by checking to see if the boot sector is off a diskette that
 10020                                  ; is single-sided and is a pre-dos 3.20 diskette. if it is, we set the
 10021                                  ; sec/clus field to 1. if not, we carry on as normal.
 10022                                  
 10023                                  checksinglesided:
 10024                                  		;mov	al, [disksector+15h]
 10025                                  		; 02/09/2023
 10026                                  		; al = [disksector+15h]
 10027 000006DD 3CF0                    		cmp	al, 0F0h
 10028 000006DF 741B                    		jz	short gooddsk
 10029 000006E1 A801                    		test	al, 1
 10030 000006E3 7517                    		jnz	short gooddsk
 10031 000006E5 813E[5601]332E          		cmp	word [disksector+8], 2E33h ; "3."
 10032 000006EB 7507                    		jnz	short mustbeearlier
 10033 000006ED 803E[5801]32            		cmp	byte [disksector+0Ah], 32h ; "2"
 10034 000006F2 7308                    		jnb	short gooddsk
 10035                                  
 10036                                  ; we must have a pre-3.20 diskette. set the sec/clus field to 1
 10037                                  
 10038                                  mustbeearlier:				
 10039 000006F4 C606[5B01]01            		mov	byte [disksector+0Dh], 1
 10040                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERCLUSTER]
 10041 000006F9 EB01                    		jmp	short gooddsk
 10042                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10043                                  
 10044                                  invalidbootsec:				
 10045 000006FB 43                      		inc	bx		; indicate that boot sector invalid
 10046                                  		; 10/12/2022

 10049 000006FC F8                      		clc

 10051 000006FD C3                      		retn

 10060                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10061                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10062                                  ; 'movbpb' moves the bpb read from the boot sector into registers for use by
 10063                                  ; getbp routine at has1
 10064                                  ;
 10065                                  ; if the set_id_flag is 1, and if an extended boot record, then set volume
 10066                                  ; serial number, volume label, file system id in bds according to
 10067                                  ; the boot record.  after that, this routine will set the set_id_flag to 2
 10068                                  ; to signal that volume label is set already from the extended boot record
 10069                                  ; (so, don't set it again by calling "set_volume_id" routine which uses
 10070                                  ; the volume label in the root directory.)
 10071                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10072                                  
 10073                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 10074                                  
 10075                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10076                                  movbpb:	
 10077 000006FE 8A36[5B01]              		mov	dh, [disksector+0Dh]
 10078                                  					; disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERCLUSTER]
 10079                                  					; sectors per unit
 10080 00000702 8A3E[5F01]              		mov	bh, [disksector+11h]
 10081                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.ROOTENTRIES]
 10082                                  					; number of directory entries
 10083 00000706 8B0E[6101]              		mov	cx, [disksector+13h]
 10084                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.TOTALSECTORS]
 10085                                  					; size of drive
 10086 0000070A 8A26[6301]              		mov	ah, [disksector+15h]
 10087                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 10088                                  					; media	descriptor
 10089 0000070E A0[6401]                		mov	al, [disksector+16h];
 10090                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERFAT]
 10091                                  					; number of fat	sectors
 10092 00000711 8A1E[6601]              		mov	bl, [disksector+18h]
 10093                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERTRACK]
 10094                                  					; sectors per track
 10095 00000715 8A16[6801]              		mov	dl, [disksector+1Ah]
 10096                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.HEADS]
 10097                                  					; number of heads
 10098 00000719 803E[0A05]01            		cmp	byte [set_id_flag], 1 ; called by get_bpb?
 10099 0000071E 75DC                    		jnz	short movbpb_ret
 10100 00000720 E81200                  		call	mov_media_ids
 10101 00000723 7205                    		jb	short movbpb_conv ; conventional boot record?
 10102 00000725 C606[0A05]02            		mov	byte [set_id_flag], 2 ; signals that volume id is set
 10103                                  movbpb_conv:				
 10104 0000072A 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1
 10105 0000072F 75CB                    		jnz	short movbpb_ret

 10107                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10108                                  		; cf = 0
 10109                                  ;movbpb_ret:				
 10110                                  		;clc
 10111 00000734 C3                      		retn

 10113                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10114                                  
 10115                                  ;copy the boot_serial number, volume id, and filesystem id from the
 10116                                  ;***extended boot record*** in ds:disksector to the bds table pointed
 10117                                  ;by es:di.
 10118                                  
 10119                                  ;in.) es:di -> bds
 10120                                  ;     ds:disksector = valid extended boot record.
 10121                                  ;out.) vol_serial, bds_volid and bds_system_id in bds are set according to
 10122                                  ;      the boot record information.
 10123                                  ;     carry flag set if not an extended bpb.
 10124                                  ;     all registers saved except the flag.
 10125                                  
 10126                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10127                                  mov_media_ids:		
 10128 00000735 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 10129                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 10130                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 10131 0000073A 752C                    		jnz	short mmi_not_ext
 10132 0000073C 51                      		push	cx
 10133 0000073D 8B0E[7501]              		mov	cx, [disksector+27h]
 10134                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 10135 00000741 26894D57                		mov	[es:di+57h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.vol_serial]
 10136 00000745 8B0E[7701]              		mov	cx, [disksector+29h]
 10137                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 10138 00000749 26894D59                		mov	[es:di+59h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 10139 0000074D 57                      		push	di
 10140 0000074E 56                      		push	si
 10141 0000074F B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 10142 00000752 BE[7901]                		mov	si, disksector+2Bh
 10143                                  		;mov	si, (offset disksector+2Bh) ;
 10144                                  					; disksector+EXT_BOOT.VOL_LABEL
 10145 00000755 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 10146 00000758 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 10147                                  		;mov	cx, 8		; size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 10148                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10149 0000075A B108                    		mov	cl, 8 ; cx = 8
 10150 0000075C BE[8401]                		mov	si, disksector+36h
 10151                                  		;mov	si, (offset disksector+36h) ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SYSTEM_ID
 10152 0000075F 83C705                  		add	di, 5		; (BDS.filesys_id-BDS.volid)-size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 10153 00000762 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 10154 00000764 5E                      		pop	si
 10155 00000765 5F                      		pop	di
 10156 00000766 59                      		pop	cx
 10157                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10158                                  		; cf = 0
 10159                                  		;clc		; this clc is not required (16/06/2019 - Erdogan Tan)
 10160                                  				; (20/09/2022)

 10169                                  
 10170                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10171                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 10172                                  ; read in the fat sector and get the media byte from it.
 10173                                  ; input : es:di -> bds
 10174                                  ; output:
 10175                                  ;	  carry set if an error occurs, ax contains error code.
 10176                                  ;	  otherwise, ah contains media byte on exit
 10177                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 10178                                  
 10179                                  readfat:	
 10180                                  		;mov	dh, 0
 10181                                  		; 10/12/2022

 10183 0000076C B90200                  		mov	cx, 2		; head 0
 10184                                  					; cylinder 0, sector 2

 10186 00000772 7202                    		jb	short bad_fat_ret
 10187 00000774 8A27                    		mov	ah, [bx]	; media	byte

 10191                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10192                                  
 10193                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10194                                  
 10195                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10196                                  ; read a single sector into the temp buffer.
 10197                                  ; perform three retries in case of error.
 10198                                  ;   inputs:	es:[di].bds_drivenum has physical drive to use
 10199                                  ;		cx has sector and cylinder
 10200                                  ;		dh has head
 10201                                  ;		es:di has bds
 10202                                  ;		ds has Bios_Data
 10203                                  ;
 10204                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 10205                                  ;		    Bios_Data:bx point to sector
 10206                                  ;		       (note: some callers assume location of buffer)
 10207                                  ;
 10208                                  ;		carry set
 10209                                  ;		    ax has rom error code
 10210                                  ;
 10211                                  ; register bp is preserved.
 10212                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10213                                  
 10214                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 10215                                  
 10216                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10217                                  read_sector:	
 10218 00000777 55                      		push	bp
 10219 00000778 BD0300                  		mov	bp, 3		; make 3 attempts
 10220 0000077B 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 10221 0000077F BB[4E01]                		mov	bx, disksector	; get es:bx to point to	buffer
 10222                                  rd_ret:					
 10223 00000782 06                      		push	es
 10224 00000783 1E                      		push	ds
 10225 00000784 07                      		pop	es
 10226 00000785 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
 10227 00000788 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
 10228                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
 10229                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
 10230                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
 10231 0000078A 07                      		pop	es
 10232 0000078B 734A                    		jnb	short okret2
 10233                                  rd_rty:					
 10234 0000078D E87404                  		call	again		; reset	disk, decrement	bp, preserve ax
 10235 00000790 7442                    		jz	short err_rd_ret
 10236 00000792 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 10237                                  		;test	byte ptr [es:di+23h], 1	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10238                                  					; fnon_removable
 10239 00000797 75E9                    		jnz	short rd_ret
 10240 00000799 803E[3806]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 10241 0000079E 7510                    		jnz	short rd_skip1_dpt
 10242 000007A0 50                      		push	ax
 10243 000007A1 1E                      		push	ds		; for retry, set the head settle time to 0Fh
 10244 000007A2 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 10245                                  		;mov	al, [si+9]	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 10246                                  		;mov	byte [si+9], 15 ; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 10247                                  		;			; NORMSETTLE
 10248                                  		; 12/12/2022
 10249 000007A6 B00F                    		mov	al, 15
 10250 000007A8 864409                  		xchg	al, [si+9]
 10251                                  		; 
 10252 000007AB 1F                      		pop	ds
 10253 000007AC A2[2A01]                		mov	[save_head_sttl], al
 10254 000007AF 58                      		pop	ax
 10255                                  rd_skip1_dpt:				
 10256 000007B0 06                      		push	es
 10257 000007B1 1E                      		push	ds
 10258 000007B2 07                      		pop	es
 10259 000007B3 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
 10260 000007B6 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
 10261                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
 10262                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
 10263                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
 10264 000007B8 07                      		pop	es
 10265 000007B9 9C                      		pushf
 10266 000007BA 803E[3806]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 10267 000007BF 750E                    		jnz	short rd_skip2_dpt

 10269 000007C2 A0[2A01]                		mov	al, [save_head_sttl]
 10270 000007C5 1E                      		push	ds

 10272 000007CA 884409                  		mov	[si+9],	al	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 10273 000007CD 1F                      		pop	ds
 10274 000007CE 58                      		pop	ax
 10275                                  rd_skip2_dpt:

 10281                                  err_rd_ret:

 10287                                  ; track accessed in that drive.

 10394                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------
 10395                                  ; miscellaneous odd jump routines. 
 10396                                  ; moved out of mainline for speed.
 10397                                  
 10398                                  ; if we have a system where we have virtual drives, we need 
 10399                                  ; to prompt the user to place the correct disk in the drive.
 10400                                  ;
 10401                                  ;	assume es:di -> bds, ds:->Bios_Data

 10403                                  
 10404                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10405                                  checksingle:		
 10406 00000839 50                      		push	ax
 10407 0000083A 53                      		push	bx
 10408 0000083B 268B5D23                		mov	bx, [es:di+23h]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10409                                  
 10410                                  ; if hard drive, cannot change disk.
 10411                                  ; if current owner of physical drive, no need to change diskette.
 10412                                  
 10413 0000083F F6C321                  		test	bl, 21h		; fnon_removable|fi_own_physical
 10414 00000842 7573                    		jnz	short singleret
 10415 00000844 F6C310                  		test	bl, 10h		; fi_am_mult
 10416                                  					; is there a drive sharing this	physical drive?
 10417 00000847 746E                    		jz	short singleret
 10418                                  
 10419                                  
 10420                                  ; look for the previous owner of this physical drive
 10421                                  ; and reset its ownership flag.
 10422                                  
 10423 00000849 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 10424                                  					; get physical drive number
 10425 0000084D 06                      		push	es		; preserve pointer to current bds
 10426 0000084E 57                      		push	di
 10427 0000084F C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; get first bds
 10428                                  scan_list:				
 10429 00000853 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al
 10430 00000857 7553                    		jnz	short scan_skip	; Not our drive. Try next bds.
 10431 00000859 B320                    		mov	bl, 20h	; ' '   ; fi_own_physical ; test ownership flag
 10432 0000085B 26845D23                		test	[es:di+23h], bl
 10433 0000085F 744B                    		jz	short scan_skip	; he doesn't own it either. continue
 10434 00000861 26305D23                		xor	[es:di+23h], bl	; reset	ownership flag
 10435 00000865 5F                      		pop	di		; restore pointer to current bds
 10436 00000866 07                      		pop	es
 10437 00000867 26085D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bl	; ; set	ownership flag
 10438                                  
 10439                                  ; we examine the fsetowner flag. if it is set, then we are using the code in
 10440                                  ; checksingle to just set the owner of a drive. we must not issue the prompt
 10441                                  ; in this case.
 10442 0000086B 803E[7A00]01            		cmp	byte [fsetowner], 1
 10443 00000870 7517                    		jnz	short not_fsetowner
 10444                                  		;cmp	byte ptr es:[di+4], 0 ;	are we handling	drive number 0 ?
 10445 00000872 26807D0400              		cmp	byte [es:di+4], 0
 10446 00000877 753E                    		jnz	short singleret
 10447 00000879 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]
 10448                                  		;mov	al, es:[di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 10449                                  					; get the DOS drive letter
 10450 0000087D 06                      		push	es
 10451 0000087E 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]

 10456 00000887 EB2E                    		jmp	short singleret

 10458                                  
 10459                                  ; to support "backward" compatibility with ibm's "single drive status byte"
 10460                                  ; we now check to see if we are in a single drive system and the application
 10461                                  ; has "cleverly" diddled the sdsb
 10462                                  
 10463                                  not_fsetowner:

 10470 00000898 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]

 10474 000008A1 07                      		pop	es

 10478                                  ignore_sdsb:

 10482                                  
 10483                                  scan_skip:

 10486                                  					; go to	next bds

 10515                                  
 10516                                  ; 15/10/52022
 10517                                  
 10518                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10519                                  ;	disk i/o handler
 10520                                  ;
 10521                                  ;	al = drive number (0-6)
 10522                                  ;	ah = media descriptor
 10523                                  ;	cx = sector count
 10524                                  ;	dx = first sector (low)
 10525                                  ;	[start_sec_h] = first sector (high)  32 bit calculation.
 10526                                  ;	ds = cs
 10527                                  ;	es:di = transfer address
 10528                                  ;	[rflag]=operation (2=read, 3=write)
 10529                                  ;	[verify]=1 for verify after write
 10530                                  ;
 10531                                  ;	if successful carry flag = 0
 10532                                  ;	  else cf=1 and al contains error code
 10533                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10534                                  
 10535                                  diskrd:	
 10536                                  		;mov	ds:rflag, 2	; romread
 10537                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10538 000008C2 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2 ; romread
 10539                                  
 10540                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10541                                  
 10542                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10543                                  diskio:
 10544 000008C7 89FB                    		mov	bx, di		; es:bx	= transfer address
 10545 000008C9 8C06[3705]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es	; save transfer	segment
 10546 000008CD E8FBFB                  		call	SetDrive
 10547 000008D0 268A4510                		mov	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 10548 000008D4 A2[1F01]                		mov	[medbyt], al
 10549                                  		;jcxz	short ioret
 10550 000008D7 E3E8                    		jcxz	ioret
 10551                                  
 10552                                  ; see if the media is formatted or not by checking the flags field in
 10553                                  ; in the bds. if it is unformatted we cannot allow i/o, so we should
 10554                                  ; go to the error exit at label unformatteddrive.
 10555                                  
 10556 000008D9 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+24h], 2
 10557                                  		;test	byte ptr es:[di+24h], 2	; [es:di+BDS.flags+1]
 10558                                  					; unformatted_media
 10559 000008DE 75DE                    		jnz	short unformatteddrive
 10560 000008E0 890E[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], cx	; save sector count
 10561 000008E4 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; save sp
 10562                                  
 10563                                  ; ensure that we are trying to access valid sectors on the drive
 10564                                  
 10565 000008E8 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 10566 000008EA 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 10567 000008EC 01CA                    		add	dx, cx
 10568                                  		;adc	si, 0
 10569                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 10570 000008EE D1D6                    		rcl	si, 1
 10571 000008F0 26837D0E00              		cmp	word [es:di+0Eh], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs16]
 10572                                  					; 32 bit sector ?
 10573 000008F5 740C                    		jz	short sanity32
 10574                                  		;cmp	si, 0
 10575                                  		; 02/09/2023
 10576 000008F7 09F6                    		or	si, si
 10577 000008F9 75BF                    		jnz	short baddrive
 10578 000008FB 263B550E                		cmp	dx, [es:di+0Eh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs16]
 10579 000008FF 77B9                    		ja	short baddrive
 10580 00000901 EB12                    		jmp	short sanityok
 10581                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10582                                  
 10583                                  sanity32:				
 10584 00000903 0336[2B05]              		add	si, [start_sec_h]
 10585 00000907 263B751D                		cmp	si, [es:di+1Dh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs32+2]
 10586 0000090B 7208                    		jb	short sanityok
 10587 0000090D 77AB                    		ja	short baddrive
 10588 0000090F 263B551B                		cmp	dx, [es:di+1Bh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs32]
 10589 00000913 77A5                    		ja	short baddrive
 10590                                  
 10591                                  sanityok:				
 10592 00000915 8B16[2B05]              		mov	dx, [start_sec_h]
 10593 00000919 26034517                		add	ax, [es:di+17h]	; [es:di+BDS.hiddensecs]
 10594 0000091D 26135519                		adc	dx, [es:di+19h]	; [es:di+BDS.hiddensecs+2]
 10595                                  
 10596                                  ; now dx;ax have the physical first sector.
 10597                                  ; since the following procedures is going to destroy ax, let's
 10598                                  ; save it temporarily to saved_word.
 10599                                  
 10600 00000921 A3[2D05]                		mov	[saved_word], ax ; save the sector number (low)
 10601                                  
 10602                                  ; set up pointer to disk base table in [dpt]. we cannot assume that iosetup
 10603                                  ; will do it because we will skip the set up stuff with hard disks.
 10604                                  
 10605 00000924 06                      		push	es
 10606                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]
 10607                                  		; 02/09/2023
 10608 00000925 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 10609 00000927 8EC6                    		mov	es, si
 10610 00000929 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 10611                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 10612                                  					; current disk parm table
 10613 0000092E 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 10614 00000932 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es
 10615 00000936 07                      		pop	es
 10616 00000937 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10617                                  					; fnon_removable
 10618 0000093C 7510                    		jnz	short skip_setup
 10619 0000093E E8F8FE                  		call	checksingle
 10620                                  
 10621                                  ; check to see if we have previously noted a change line. the routine

 11048                                  		;jmp	retry
 11049                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11050 00000B74 E9F9FE                  		jmp	_retry
 11051                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11052                                  
 11053                                  write_fault_err:			
 11054 00000B77 BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1		; just retry only once
 11055                                  					; for write fault error.
 11056 00000B7A EBF7                    		jmp	short dskerr1
 11057                                  
 11058                                  		; fall into harderr
 11059                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11060                                  
 11061                                  ; entry point for routines that call maperror themselves
 11062                                  
 11063                                  harderr:				
 11064 00000B7C E84D00                  		call	maperror
 11065                                  harderr2:				
 11066 00000B7F C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 11067                                  					; force a media check through rom
 11068 00000B84 8B0E[2201]              		mov	cx, [seccnt]	; get count of sectors to go
 11069 00000B88 8B26[3501]              		mov	sp, [spsav]	; recover entry	stack pointer
 11070                                  
 11071                                  ; since we are performing a non-local goto, restore the disk parameters
 11072                                  
 11073                                  		;jmp	diddleback
 11074                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11075 00000B8C E958FE                  		jmp	diddle_back
 11076                                  
 11077                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11078                                  
 11079                                  ; change settle value from settlecurrent to whatever is appropriate
 11080                                  ; note that this routine is never called for a fixed disk.
 11081                                  
 11082                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11083                                  normspeed:
 11084 00000B8F 803E[3806]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 11085 00000B94 751E                    		jnz	short fastspeed
 11086 00000B96 06                      		push	es
 11087 00000B97 50                      		push	ax
 11088 00000B98 A0[2801]                		mov	al, [settleslow]
 11089 00000B9B C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]	; current disk parm table
 11090 00000B9F 26884409                		mov	[es:si+9], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11091 00000BA3 58                      		pop	ax
 11092 00000BA4 07                      		pop	es
 11093 00000BA5 E80C00                  		call	fastspeed
 11094 00000BA8 06                      		push	es
 11095 00000BA9 C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]
 11096 00000BAD 26C6440901              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 1 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11097                                  					; 1 is fast settle value
 11098 00000BB2 07                      		pop	es
 11099 00000BB3 C3                      		retn
 11100                                  
 11101                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11102                                  
 11103                                  ; if the drive has been marked as too big (i.e. starting sector of the
 11104                                  ; partition is > 16 bits, then always return drive not ready.
 11105                                  
 11106                                  fastspeed:		
 11107 00000BB4 26F6451F80              		test	byte [es:di+1Fh], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.fatsiz]
 11108                                  					; ftoobig
 11109 00000BB9 750D                    		jnz	short notready
 11110 00000BBB 06                      		push	es
 11111 00000BBC 8E06[3705]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 11112 00000BC0 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 11113 00000BC2 8C06[3705]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es
 11114 00000BC6 07                      		pop	es
 11115 00000BC7 C3                      		retn
 11116                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11117                                  
 11118                                  notready:				
 11119 00000BC8 F9                      		stc
 11120 00000BC9 B480                    		mov	ah, 80h
 11121 00000BCB C3                      		retn
 11122                                  
 11123                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11124                                  
 11125                                  ; map error returned by rom in ah into corresponding code to be returned to
 11126                                  ; dos in al. trashes di. guaranteed to set carry.
 11127                                  
 11128                                  maperror:	
 11129 00000BCC 51                      		push	cx
 11130 00000BCD 06                      		push	es
 11131 00000BCE 1E                      		push	ds		; set es=Bios_Data
 11132 00000BCF 07                      		pop	es
 11133 00000BD0 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; put error code in al
 11134 00000BD2 A2[4401]                		mov	[lsterr], al	; terminate list with error code
 11135 00000BD5 B90900                  		mov	cx, 9		; numerr (= errout-errin)
 11136                                  					; number of possible error conditions
 11137 00000BD8 BF[3C01]                		mov	di, errin	; point to error conditions
 11138 00000BDB F2AE                    		repne scasb
 11139                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11140 00000BDD 8A4508                  		mov	al, [di+8]	; [di+numerr-1]
 11141                                  					; get translation
 11142                                  		; 19/10/2022 - Temporary ! 
 11143                                  		;db	8Ah, 85h, 8, 0	; mov al, [di+8]
 11144 00000BE0 07                      		pop	es
 11145 00000BE1 59                      		pop	cx
 11146 00000BE2 F9                      		stc			; flag error condition
 11147 00000BE3 C3                      		retn
 11148                                  
 11149                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11150                                  
 11151                                  ; set the time of last access for this drive.
 11152                                  ; this is done only for removable media. es:di -> bds
 11153                                  
 11154                                  set_tim:		
 11155 00000BE4 50                      		push	ax
 11156 00000BE5 E892F8                  		call	GetTickCnt	; Does INT 1A ah=0 & updates daycnt
 11157                                  
 11158                                  ; we have the new time. if we see that the time has passed,
 11159                                  ; then we reset the threshold counter...
 11160                                  
 11161 00000BE8 263B5547                		cmp	dx, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11162 00000BEC 7506                    		jnz	short setaccess
 11163 00000BEE 263B4D49                		cmp	cx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11164                                  		;jz	short done_set
 11165                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11166 00000BF2 740E                    		je	short done_set2
 11167                                  setaccess:				
 11168 00000BF4 C606[1D01]00            		mov	byte [accesscount], 0
 11169 00000BF9 26895547                		mov	[es:di+47h], dx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11170 00000BFD 26894D49                		mov	[es:di+49h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11171                                  done_set:				
 11172 00000C01 F8                      		clc
 11173                                  done_set2:		; 12/12/2022
 11174 00000C02 58                      		pop	ax
 11175 00000C03 C3                      		retn
 11176                                  
 11177                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11178                                  
 11179                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 11180                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 11181                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 11182                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count
 11183                                  ; on exit    flags indicate result of decrementing retry count
 11184                                  
 11185                                  again:	
 11186 00000C04 E86304                  		call	ResetDisk
 11187 00000C07 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 11188 00000C0A 7402                    		jz	short dont_dec_retry_count ; If	it is a	media change error
 11189                                  					; do not decrement retry count.
 11190 00000C0C 4D                      		dec	bp		; decrement retry count
 11191 00000C0D C3                      		retn
 11192                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11193                                  
 11194                                  dont_dec_retry_count:			
 11195 00000C0E 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 11196 00000C10 C3                      		retn

 11301                                  
 11302                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11303                                  ; Do_Generic_IOCtl: perform generic ioctl request
 11304                                  ;
 11305                                  ;    input: AL contains logical drive
 11306                                  ;
 11307                                  ;	functions are dispatched through a call. On return, carry indicates
 11308                                  ;	error code in al. Note::bES:b& ds undefined on return from
 11309                                  ;	subfunctions.
 11310                                  ;
 11311                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11312                                  
 11313                                  ; 11/03/2019
 11314                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11315                                  do_generic_ioctl:			; 2C7h:0C6Bh = 70h:31DBh
 11316 00000C41 E887F8                  		call	SetDrive	; ES:DI	Points to bds for drive
 11317 00000C44 06                      		push	es
 11318 00000C45 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	Points to request header
 11319 00000C49 26807F0D08              		cmp	byte [es:bx+0Dh], 8 ; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 11320                                  					; RAWIO
 11321 00000C4E 268A470E                		mov	al, [es:bx+0Eh]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 11322 00000C52 07                      		pop	es
 11323 00000C53 7525                    		jnz	short IoctlFuncErr
 11324                                  
 11325                                  		; cas note: Could do the above two blocks in reverse order.
 11326                                  		; Would have to preserve al for SetDrive
 11327                                  
 11328                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11329 00000C55 BE[120C]                		mov	si, IoReadJumpTable
 11330                                  		;mov	si, 0C3Ch	; IoReadJumpTable
 11331                                  					; at 2C7h:0C3Ch	= 70h:31ACh
 11332 00000C58 A820                    		test	al, 20h		; GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; test of req. function
 11333 00000C5A 7503                    		jnz	short NotGenericWrite ; function is a read.
 11334                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11335 00000C5C BE[250C]                		mov	si, IoWriteJumpTable
 11336                                  		;mov	si, 0C4Fh	; IoWriteJumpTable
 11337                                  					; at 2C7h:0C4Fh	= 70h:31BFh
 11338                                  NotGenericWrite:			
 11339 00000C5F 24DF                    		and	al, 0DFh	; ~GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; get rid of read/write bit
 11340 00000C61 2C40                    		sub	al, 40h		; offset for base function
 11341 00000C63 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
 11342 00000C66 7712                    		ja	short IoctlFuncErr
 11343 00000C68 98                      		cbw
 11344 00000C69 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11345 00000C6B 46                      		inc	si
 11346 00000C6C 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 11347 00000C6E 2EFF14                  		call	near [cs:si]
 11348                                  		;call	word ptr cs:[si]
 11349 00000C71 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11350                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11351                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11352 00000C76 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Return this status in	case of	carry
 11353 00000C78 C3                      		retn			; Pass carry flag through to exit code
 11354                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11355                                  
 11356                                  		; Cmd_Error_Proc is called as a procedure and also use
 11357                                  		; as a fall through from above
 11358                                  Cmd_Error_Proc:				; 2C7h:0CA3h = 70h:3213h
 11359 00000C79 5A                      		pop	dx
 11360                                  
 11361                                  IoctlFuncErr:				
 11362 00000C7A E958F4                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
 11363                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11364                                  
 11365                                  ; 16/10/2022

 11367                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11368                                  ;**	GetDeviceParameters:
 11369                                  ;
 11370                                  ;	GetDeviceParameters implements the generic ioctl function:
 11371                                  ;	majorcode=RAWIO, minorcode=GetDeviceParameters (60h)
 11372                                  ;
 11373                                  ;	ENTRY	(ES:di) = BDS for drive
 11374                                  ;		PtrSav = long pointer to request header
 11375                                  ;	EXIT	??? BUGBUG
 11376                                  ;	USES	??? BUGBUG
 11377                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11378                                  
 11379                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11380                                  GetDeviceParameters:
 11381                                  		; Copy info from bds to the device parameters packet
 11382                                  
 11383 00000C7D C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 11384 00000C81 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 11385                                  					; (DS:BX) = return buffer
 11386 00000C84 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+34]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 11387 00000C88 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 11388 00000C8B 268B4523                		mov	ax, [es:di+35]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11389 00000C8F 83E003                  		and	ax, 3		; fnon_removable+fchangeline
 11390                                  					; Mask off other bits
 11391 00000C92 894702                  		mov	[bx+2],	ax	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES]
 11392 00000C95 268B4525                		mov	ax, [es:di+37]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 11393 00000C99 894704                  		mov	[bx+4],	ax	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 11394 00000C9C 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; Set media type to default
 11395 00000C9E 884706                  		mov	[bx+6],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_MEDIATYPE]
 11396                                  					
 11397                                  		; copy recommended bpb
 11398 00000CA1 8D7527                  		lea	si, [di+39]	; [di+BDS.rbytespersec]	= [di+BDS.R_BPB]
 11399 00000CA4 F60701                  		test	byte [bx], 1	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 11400                                  					; BUILD_DEVICE_BPB
 11401 00000CA7 7412                    		jz	short UseBpbPresent
 11402 00000CA9 1E                      		push	ds		; Save request packet segment
 11403 00000CAA 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11404                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11405                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11406                                  					; Point back to Bios_Data
 11407 00000CAF E887FB                  		call	checksingle
 11408 00000CB2 E842F9                  		call	GetBp		; Build	the bpb	from scratch
 11409 00000CB5 1F                      		pop	ds		; Restore request packet segment
 11410 00000CB6 720F                    		jb	short GetParmRet
 11411 00000CB8 8D7506                  		lea	si, [di+6]	; [di+BDS.bytespersec] = [di+BSD.DP_BPB]
 11412                                  					; Use this subfield of bds instead
 11413                                  UseBpbPresent:				
 11414 00000CBB 8D7F07                  		lea	di, [bx+7]	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB]
 11415                                  					; This is where	the result goes
 11416 00000CBE B91900                  		mov	cx, 25		; A_BPB.size - 6
 11417                                  					; For now use 'small' bpb
 11418 00000CC1 1E                      		push	ds		; reverse segments for copy
 11419 00000CC2 06                      		push	es
 11420 00000CC3 1F                      		pop	ds
 11421 00000CC4 07                      		pop	es
 11422 00000CC5 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 11423                                  		
 11424                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11425                                  		; cf=0 (test instruction -above- resets cf) 	
 11426                                  		;clc
 11427                                  GetParmRet:				
 11428 00000CC7 C3                      		retn
 11429                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11430                                  
 11431                                  ; 17/10/2022
 11432                                  ; 16/10/2022
 11433                                  
 11434                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11435                                  ; SetDeviceParameters:
 11436                                  ;
 11437                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 11438                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11439                                  
 11440                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11441                                  SetDeviceParameters:			; 2C7h:0CF3h = 70h:3263h
 11442 00000CC8 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 11443 00000CCC C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 11444 00000CCF 26814D234001            		or	word [es:di+23h], 140h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11445                                  					; fchanged_by_format|fchanged
 11446 00000CD5 F60702                  		test	byte [bx], 2	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 11447                                  					; ONLY_SET_TRACKLAYOUT
 11448 00000CD8 7579                    		jnz	short setTrackTable
 11449 00000CDA 8A4701                  		mov	al, [bx+1]	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 11450 00000CDD 26884522                		mov	[es:di+34], al	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 11451 00000CE1 8B4704                  		mov	ax, [bx+4]	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 11452 00000CE4 26894525                		mov	[es:di+37], ax	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 11453 00000CE8 8B4702                  		mov	ax, [bx+2]	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES]
 11454 00000CEB 1E                      		push	ds
 11455                                  		; 17/10/2022
 11456 00000CEC 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11457                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11458                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11459                                  		;cmp	byte [fhave96], 0
 11460 00000CF1 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0
 11461 00000CF6 1F                      		pop	ds
 11462 00000CF7 7502                    		jnz	short HaveChange ; we have changeline support
 11463                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11464 00000CF9 24FD                    		and	al, 0FDh
 11465                                  		;and	ax, 0FFFDh	; ~fchangeline
 11466                                  
 11467                                  		; Ignore all bits except non_removable and changeline
 11468                                  HaveChange:

 11600                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11601                                  ; FormatTrack:
 11602                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 11603                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 11604                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 11605                                  ;
 11606                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 11607                                  ;
 11608                                  ; output:
 11609                                  ;	for status call:
 11610                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 11611                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 11612                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 11613                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 11614                                  ;		3 - no media present
 11615                                  ;	carry cleared.
 11616                                  ;
 11617                                  ;	for format track:
 11618                                  ;		carry set if error
 11619                                  ;
 11620                                  ; ==========================================================================

 11889                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 11890                                  
 11891                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11892                                  ;
 11893                                  ; TrackIo:
 11894                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 11895                                  ;
 11896                                  ;   input:
 11897                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 11898                                  ;		  3 = write
 11899                                  ;		  4 = verify
 11900                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 11901                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 11902                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 11903                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 11904                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 11905                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 11906                                  ;
 11907                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11908                                  
 11909                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 11910                                  		
 11911                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11912                                  TrackIo:	
 11913                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to
 11914 00000EF3 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; SpSav	and return if error
 11915 00000EF7 E83FF9                  		call	checksingle	; Ensure correct disk is in drv
 11916 00000EFA 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 11917                                  					; See if we have already set	disk
 11918 00000EFF 7407                    		jz	short Dptalreadyset ; base table
 11919 00000F01 50                      		push	ax		; set up tables	and variables for i/o
 11920 00000F02 51                      		push	cx
 11921 00000F03 E88FFA                  		call	iosetup
 11922 00000F06 59                      		pop	cx
 11923 00000F07 58                      		pop	ax
 11924                                  Dptalreadyset:				; Point si at the table entry of the			
 11925 00000F08 BE[3B05]                		mov	si, tracktable	; first sector to be io'd
 11926 00000F0B D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11927 00000F0D D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11928 00000F0F 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 11929                                  
 11930                                  		; WE WANT:
 11931                                  		; CX to	be the number of times we have to loop
 11932                                  		; DX to	be the number of sectors we read on each iteration
 11933                                  		
 11934 00000F11 BA0100                  		mov	dx, 1
 11935                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11936 00000F14 26F6452308              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 8
 11937                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 8 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11938                                  					; good_tracklayout
 11939 00000F19 7402                    		jz	short ionextsector
 11940                                  		
 11941 00000F1B 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx		; HEY! We can read all secs in one blow
 11942                                  ionextsector:				
 11943 00000F1D 51                      		push	cx
 11944 00000F1E 52                      		push	dx
 11945 00000F1F 46                      		inc	si
 11946 00000F20 46                      		inc	si		; Skip over the	cylinder and head in
 11947                                  					; the track table
 11948 00000F21 AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector ID	from track table
 11949 00000F22 A2[3101]                		mov	[cursec], al
 11950                                  
 11951                                  		; assumptions for a fixed disk multi-track disk	i/o
 11952                                  		; 1). In the input CX (# of sectors to go) to TrackIo,
 11953                                  		;     only CL is valid.
 11954                                  		; 2). Sector size should be set	to 512 bytes.
 11955                                  		; 3). Good track layout
 11956                                  		
 11957                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11958 00000F25 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 11959                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11960                                  					; fnon_removable ; Fixed disk?
 11961 00000F2A 7414                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No
 11962                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11963 00000F2C F606[2F05]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h
 11964                                  		;test	word [multrk_flag], 80h ; MULTI_TRK_ON
 11965                                  						; Allow multi-track operation?
 11966 00000F31 740D                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No,don't do that.
 11967 00000F33 8916[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], dx
 11968 00000F37 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 11969 00000F39 E816FB                  		call	Disk
 11970 00000F3C 5A                      		pop	dx
 11971 00000F3D 59                      		pop	cx
 11972 00000F3E F8                      		clc
 11973 00000F3F C3                      		retn
 11974                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11975                                  
 11976                                  IoRemovable:				
 11977 00000F40 AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector size index	from track
 11978                                  					; table	and save it
 11979 00000F41 50                      		push	ax
 11980 00000F42 56                      		push	si
 11981 00000F43 1E                      		push	ds		; Save Bios_Data
 11982 00000F44 50                      		push	ax
 11983 00000F45 8A26[2C01]              		mov	ah, [eot]	; Preserve whatever might be in	ah
 11984                                  					; Fetch	EOT while ds-> Bios_Data
 11985 00000F49 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 11986 00000F4D 884403                  		mov	[si+3],	al	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_SECTOR_SIZ]
 11987 00000F50 886404                  		mov	[si+4],	ah	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 11988 00000F53 58                      		pop	ax
 11989 00000F54 1F                      		pop	ds
 11990 00000F55 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 11991 00000F57 A3[2201]                		mov	[seccnt], ax
 11992 00000F5A E8F5FA                  		call	Disk
 11993 00000F5D 5E                      		pop	si		; Advance buffer pointer by adding
 11994                                  					; sector size
 11995 00000F5E 58                      		pop	ax
 11996                                  
 11997                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 11998                                  		;call	SectorSizeIndexToSectorSize
 11999 00000F5F 88C1                    		mov	cl, al
 12000 00000F61 B88000                  		mov	ax, 128
 12001 00000F64 D3E0                    		shl	ax, cl
 12002                                  
 12003 00000F66 01C3                    		add	bx, ax
 12004 00000F68 5A                      		pop	dx
 12005 00000F69 59                      		pop	cx
 12006 00000F6A E2B1                    		loop	ionextsector
 12007 00000F6C 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12008                                  		;jz	short NoNeedDone
 12009                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12010 00000F71 7404                    		je	short NoNeedDone2
 12011 00000F73 E867FA                  		call	done		; set time of last access, and reset
 12012                                  					; entries in Dpt.
 12013                                  NoNeedDone:
 12014 00000F76 F8                      		clc
 12015                                  NoNeedDone2:
 12016 00000F77 C3                      		retn

 12020                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12021                                  ;
 12022                                  ; The sector size in bytes needs to be converted to an index value for the ibm
 12023                                  ; rom. (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024). It is assumed that only these values
 12024                                  ; are permissible.
 12025                                  ;
 12026                                  ; On Input   AX contains sector size in bytes
 12027                                  ; On Output  AL Contains index
 12028                                  ; All other registers preserved
 12029                                  ;
 12030                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 12035                                  ;					; examine upper	byte only
 12036                                  ;		ja	short OneK
 12037                                  ;		mov	al, ah		; value	in AH is the index!
 12038                                  ;		retn
 12039

 12042                                  ;OneK:

 12044                                  ;		retn

 12060                                  ;
 12061                                  ; SetDASD
 12062                                  ;
 12063                                  ; Set up the rom for formatting.
 12064                                  ; we have to tell the rom bios what type of disk is in the drive.

 12066                                  ; On Input   - ES:di - Points to bds

 12070                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12071                                  SetDasd:	
 12072 00000F78 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1 ;
 12073                                  					; See if we've previously set dasd type
 12074 00000F7D 740C                    		jz	short DoSetDasd
 12075                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12076 00000F7F 26F6452380              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 80h
 12077                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12078                                  					; set_dasd_true
 12079 00000F84 7447                    		jz	short DasdHasBeenSet
 12080                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12081 00000F86 268065237F              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 7Fh
 12082                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FF7Fh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12083                                  					; ~set_dasd_true
 12084                                  DoSetDasd:
 12085 00000F8B C606[3906]00            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 0 ; Reset it
 12086 00000F90 C606[3B01]50            		mov	byte [gap_patch], 50h ; Format gap for 48tpi disks
 12087 00000F95 B004                    		mov	al, 4
 12088                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12089 00000F97 268A6522                		mov	ah, [es:di+22h] ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12090 00000F9B 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
 12091                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12092                                  					; DEV_3INCH720KB
 12093 00000F9E 7415                    		jz	short DoSet
 12094 00000FA0 80FC01                  		cmp	ah, 1
 12095                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12096                                  					; DEV_5INCH96TPI
 12097                                  		;jz	short GotBig
 12098 00000FA3 B001                    		mov	al, 1
 12099                                  		;jmp	short DoSet
 12100                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12101 00000FA5 750E                    		jnz	short DoSet
 12102                                  
 12103                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12104                                  
 12105                                  GotBig:
 12106                                  		;mov	al, 2		; 160/320k in a	1.2 meg	drive
 12107                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12108 00000FA7 40                      		inc	ax  ; mov al, 2
 12109 00000FA8 803E[3706]00            		cmp	byte [mediatype], 0
 12110 00000FAD 7506                    		jnz	short DoSet
 12111                                  		;mov	al, 3		; 1.2meg in a 1.2meg drive
 12112                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12113                                  		;inc	al  ; al = 3
 12114                                  		; 18/12/2022
 12115 00000FAF 40                      		inc	ax  ; al = 3
 12116 00000FB0 C606[3B01]54            		mov	byte [gap_patch], 54h
 12117                                  DoSet:
 12118 00000FB5 1E                      		push	ds
 12119 00000FB6 56                      		push	si
 12120                                  
 12121                                  		;mov	ds, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vectors
 12122                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12123 00000FB7 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 12124 00000FB9 8EDE                    		mov	ds, si	; 0
 12125                                  
 12126 00000FBB C5367800                		lds	si, [DSKADR]
 12127                                  		;lds	si, [78h]	; [DSKADR]  (Int 1Eh)
 12128                                  		;;lds	si, ds:78h
 12129                                  
 12130 00000FBF C644090F                		mov	byte [si+9], 0Fh ;
 12131                                  					; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12132 00000FC3 5E                      		pop	si

 12134 00000FC5 B417                    		mov	ah, 17h
 12135 00000FC7 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]
 12136 00000FCB CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	SET TYPE (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS
 12137                                  					; AL = disk type AL = 03h - high-capacity disk in high-capacity	drive
 12138                                  DasdHasBeenSet:
 12139 00000FCD 268A6513                		mov	ah, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12140 00000FD1 8826[3701]              		mov	[formt_eot], ah
 12141 00000FD5 C3                      		retn
