 12143                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12144                                  
 12145                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12146                                  
 12147                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12148                                  ;
 12149                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 12150                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 12151                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 12152                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 12153                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 12154                                  ;
 12155                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 12156                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 12157                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 12158                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 12159                                  ;
 12160                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 12161                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 12162                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 12163                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 12164                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 12165                                  ;
 12166                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12167                                  
 12168                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12169                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 12170 00000FD6 51                      		push	cx
 12171 00000FD7 52                      		push	dx
 12172                                  
 12173                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 12174                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 12175                                  
 12176 00000FD8 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12177 00000FDD 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 12178 00000FDF 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 12179 00000FE1 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12180 00000FE6 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 12181 00000FE8 EB7D                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 12182                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12183                                  
 12184                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:			
 12185 00000FEA 06                      		push	es
 12186 00000FEB 56                      		push	si
 12187                                  
 12188                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12189                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point to interrupt vectors
 12190 00000FEC 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 12191 00000FEE 8EC6                    		mov	es, si
 12192                                  
 12193 00000FF0 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12194                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 12195                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table
 12196 00000FF5 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 12197 00000FF9 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 12198                                  
 12199                                  		; Initialize the head settle time to 0Fh. See the offsets
 12200                                  		; given in dskprm.inc.
 12201                                  
 12202 00000FFD 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12203 00001002 5E                      		pop	si
 12204 00001003 07                      		pop	es
 12205                                  SkipSaveDskAdr:				
 12206 00001004 268B4D25                		mov	cx, [es:di+25h]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 12207 00001008 49                      		dec	cx
 12208 00001009 80E503                  		and	ch, 3
 12209 0000100C D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12210 0000100E D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12211 00001010 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl
 12212 00001012 260A4D13                		or	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12213 00001016 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12214 0000101A 06                      		push	es
 12215 0000101B 1E                      		push	ds
 12216 0000101C 56                      		push	si
 12217 0000101D 57                      		push	di
 12218 0000101E B418                    		mov	ah, 18h
 12219 00001020 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - SET MEDIA TYPE	FOR FORMAT (AT model 3x9,XT2,XT286,PS)
 12220                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 12221 00001022 7231                    		jb	short FormaStatErr
 12222 00001024 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12223 00001029 7423                    		jz	short skip_disk_base_setting
 12224 0000102B 06                      		push	es		; Save segment returned	by the rom
 12225                                  		
 12226                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12227                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vector segment
 12228 0000102C 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 12229 0000102E 8EC6                    		mov	es, si ; 0
 12230 00001030 06                      		push	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 12231                                  
 12232 00001031 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12233                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR] (Int 1Eh)
 12234                                  					; Get current disk base	table
 12235 00001036 8936[3A06]              		mov	[tempdpt], si
 12236 0000103A 8C06[3C06]              		mov	[tempdpt+2], es ; Save it
 12237                                  
 12238                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12239                                  		;;mov	es, [zeroseg]
 12240                                  		;xor	si, si ; 0
 12241                                  		;mov	es, si
 12242 0000103E 07                      		pop	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 12243                                  
 12244                                  		;mov	es:78h,	di
 12245 0000103F 26893E7800              		mov	[es:DSKADR], di
 12246                                  		;pop	word ptr es:7Ah	; replace with one returned by rom
 12247 00001044 268F067A00              		pop	word [es:DSKADR+2]
 12248 00001049 C606[3806]01            		mov	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12249                                  skip_disk_base_setting:			
 12250 0000104E 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; Legal	combination + rom support code
 12251                                  		;mov	ds:had_format_error, al	; Reset	the flag
 12252 00001050 A2[3906]                		mov	[had_format_error], al
 12253 00001053 EB0E                    		jmp	short PopStatRet
 12254                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12255                                  
 12256                                  FormaStatErr:
 12257                                  		; 10/12/2022

 12261                                  					; Illegal combination =	0Ch
 12262 0000105A 7406                    		jz	short FormatStatIllegalComb
 12263 0000105C 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; DSK_TIMEOUT_ERR

 12267                                  		; 18/12/2022
 12268 00001061 48                      		dec	ax

 12281                                  					; Illegal sect/trk,trk combination.

 12283                                  		;jmp	short PopStatRet

 12285

 12301                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12302                                  
 12303                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12304                                  
 12305                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12306                                  ;
 12307                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 12308                                  ;
 12309                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 12310                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 12311                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 12312                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 12313                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!
 12314                                  ;
 12315                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12316                                  
 12317                                  ResetDisk:
 12318 0000106A 50                      		push	ax
 12319                                  
 12320                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12321 0000106B B80100                  		mov	ax, 1 ; PCDOS 7.1
 12322 0000106E 3806[3806]              		cmp	[media_set_for_format], al ; 1
 12323                                  		;cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12324                                  					; Reset while formatting?
 12325 00001072 7503                    		jnz	short ResetDisk_cont
 12326                                  					; Then verify operation in "fmt & vrfy"
 12327                                  		;mov	byte [had_format_error], 1 ; Might have failed.
 12328 00001074 A2[3906]                		mov	[had_format_error], al ; 1
 12329                                  ResetDisk_cont:
 12330                                  		; 02/09/2023 (ah=0)
 12331                                  		;xor	ah, ah		; So signals that we had a format error
 12332 00001077 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - RESET DISK SYSTEM
 12333                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)
 12334 00001079 C606[7600]FF            		mov	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 12335                                  					; Zap up the speed
 12336 0000107E 58                      		pop	ax
 12337 0000107F C3                      		retn
 12338                                  
 12339                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12340                                  
 12341                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12342                                  
 12343                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12344                                  ;
 12345                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 12346                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 12347                                  ;
 12348                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 12349                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 12350                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 12351                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 12352                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 12353                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 12354                                  ;
 12355                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 12356                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 12357                                  ;
 12358                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12359                                  
 12360                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12361                                  ToRom:

 12363 00001081 56                      		push	si

 12417                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12418                                  ;
 12419                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 12420                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 12421                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 12422                                  ;

 12426                                  ioctl_getown:
 12427 000010D8 E8F0F3                  		call	SetDrive
 12428 000010DB 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12429                                  					; Get physical drive number
 12430 000010DF C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 12431                                  ownloop:				
 12432 000010E3 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12433 000010E7 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 12434                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12435 000010E9 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h

 12437                                  					; fi_own_physical
 12438 000010EE 7514                    		jnz	short exitown
 12439                                  getnextBDS:				
 12440 000010F0 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 12441 000010F3 EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 12442                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12443                                  
 12444                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12445                                  ;
 12446                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 12447                                  ; in al to al.

 12542                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12543                                  ;	get media id
 12544                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12545                                  ;
 12546                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 12547                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12548                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 12549                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 12550                                  ;
 12551                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 12552                                  ;
 12553                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 12554                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 12555                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12556                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 12557                                  ;
 12558                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 12559                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 12560                                  ;
 12561                                  ; LOGIC:
 12562                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 12563                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 12564                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 12565                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 12566                                  ;
 12567                                  ; {
 12568                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 12569                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 12570                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 12571                                  ;	if (no error) then
 12572                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 12573                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 12574                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 12575                                  ;		};
 12576                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 12577                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 12578                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 12579                                  ;		};
 12580                                  ;	else
 12581                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 12582                                  ;
 12583                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12584                                  
 12585                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 12586                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 12587                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 12588                                  
 12589                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12590                                  GetMediaId:
 12591 00001149 E89F00                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 12592 0000114C 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 12593 00001150 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 12594 00001155 E87B00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 12595 00001158 7224                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 12596                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 12597 0000115A 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 12598                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 12599 0000115F 721A                    		jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 12600                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12601 00001161 BE[7401]                		mov	si, disksector+26h
 12602 00001164 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 12603                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 12604                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 12605 00001167 7512                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 12606 00001169 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 12607 0000116D 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12608                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12609 00001171 46                      		inc	si
 12610                                  		; si = disksector+27h 
 12611                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 12612 00001172 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 12613 00001175 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 12614                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 12615                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 12616 00001178 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 12617                                  	
 12618                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12619                                  		; cf = 0
 12620                                  		;clc
 12621                                  
 12622 0000117A C3                      		retn
 12623                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12624                                  
 12625                                  IOCtl_If2:				
 12626 0000117B B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 12627 0000117D F9                      		stc
 12628                                  IOCtl_If1:				
 12629 0000117E C3                      		retn
 12630                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12631                                  
 12632                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12633                                  
 12634                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12635                                  ;  set media id
 12636                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12637                                  
 12638                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 12639                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12640                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 12641                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 12642                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 12643                                  ;	    the bds table.
 12644                                  ;
 12645                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 12646                                  ;
 12647                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 12648                                  ;	    the request packet.
 12649                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 12650                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12651                                  ;
 12652                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 12653                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 12654                                  ;
 12655                                  ; logic:
 12656                                  ;
 12657                                  ; {
 12658                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 12659                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 12660                                  ;	BootIo;
 12661                                  ;	if (no error) then
 12662                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 12663                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 12664                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 12665                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 12666                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 12667                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 12668                                  ;		};
 12669                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 12670                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 12671                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 12672                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 12673                                  ;		};
 12674                                  ;	else
 12675                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 12676                                  ;
 12677                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12678                                  
 12679                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12680                                  SetMediaId:
 12681 0000117F E86900                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 12682 00001182 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 12683                                  					; Logical drive	number
 12684 00001186 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 12685 00001188 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 12686 0000118D 52                      		push	dx
 12687 0000118E E84200                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 12688 00001191 5A                      		pop	dx
 12689 00001192 723E                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 12690                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 12691 00001194 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 12692                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 12693 00001199 7234                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 12694 0000119B 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 12695                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 12696 000011A0 752D                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 12697 000011A2 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 12698 000011A3 57                      		push	di
 12699 000011A4 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 12700 000011A5 07                      		pop	es
 12701 000011A6 BF[7501]                		mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 12702 000011A9 C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 12703 000011AD C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12704 000011B0 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 12705 000011B3 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 12706                                  					; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 12707                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 12708 000011B6 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 12709 000011B8 06                      		push	es		; point	ds back	to Bios_Data
 12710 000011B9 1F                      		pop	ds
 12711 000011BA 5F                      		pop	di		; restore bds pointer
 12712 000011BB 07                      		pop	es
 12713 000011BC E876F5                  		call	mov_media_ids	; update the bds media id info.
 12714 000011BF 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 12715 000011C1 C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 12716 000011C6 E80A00                  		call	BootIo		; write	it back.
 12717 000011C9 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 12718                                  					; make sure chk_media check the driver
 12719                                  					; return with error code from BootIo
 12720 000011CE C3                      		retn
 12721                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12722                                  
 12723                                  IOCtl_If7:				
 12724 000011CF B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 12725 000011D1 F9                      		stc
 12726                                  IOCtl_If6:				
 12727 000011D2 C3                      		retn

 12730                                  
 12731                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12732                                  
 12733                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12734                                  ;	BootIo
 12735                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12736                                  ;
 12737                                  ; function: read/write the boot record into boot sector.
 12738                                  ;
 12739                                  ; input :
 12740                                  ;	    al=logical drive number
 12741                                  ;	    rFlag = operation (read/write)
 12742                                  ;
 12743                                  ; output:   for read operation,the boot record of the drive specified in bds
 12744                                  ;	    be read into the DiskSector buffer.
 12745                                  ;	    for write operation,the DiskSector buffer image will be written
 12746                                  ;	    to the drive specified in bds.
 12747                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 12748                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12749                                  ;	    AX,CX,DX register destroyed.
 12750                                  ;	    if carry set,then al will contain the error code from DiskIO.
 12751                                  ;
 12752                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 12753                                  ;	DiskIO:NEAR
 12754                                  ;
 12755                                  ; logic:
 12756                                  ;
 12757                                  ; {
 12758                                  ;	first_sector = 0;	 /*logical sector 0 is the boot sector */
 12759                                  ;	sectorcount = 1;	 /*read 1 sector only */
 12760                                  ;	buffer = DiskSector;	 /*read it into the DiskSector buffer */
 12761                                  ;	call DiskIO (rFlag,drive_number,first_sector,sectorcount,buffer);
 12762                                  ; }
 12763                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12764                                  
 12765                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12766                                  BootIo:	
 12767 000011D3 06                      		push	es
 12768 000011D4 57                      		push	di
 12769 000011D5 53                      		push	bx
 12770 000011D6 1E                      		push	ds
 12771 000011D7 07                      		pop	es		; Point ES: to Bios_Data
 12772                                  
 12773                                  		; Call DiskIO to read/write the boot sec. The parameters which
 12774                                  		; need to be initialized for this subroutine out here are
 12775                                  		; - Transfer address to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 12776                                  		; - Low sector needs to be initalized to 0. this is a reg. param
 12777                                  		; - Hi sector in [Start_Sec_H] needs to be initialised to 0.
 12778                                  		; - Number of sectors <-- 1
 12779                                  
 12780 000011D8 BF[4E01]                		mov	di, disksector	; es:di -> transfer address
 12781 000011DB 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx		; First	sector (h) -> 0
 12782 000011DD 8916[2B05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx ; Start sector (h) -> 0
 12783 000011E1 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
 12784 000011E4 E8E0F6                  		call	diskio
 12785 000011E7 5B                      		pop	bx
 12786 000011E8 5F                      		pop	di
 12787 000011E9 07                      		pop	es
 12788 000011EA C3                      		retn
 12789                                  
 12790                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12791                                  
 12792                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12793                                  
 12794                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12795                                  ;	ChangeLineChk
 12796                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12797                                  ;
 12798                                  ; when the user calls get/set media id call before dos establishes the media
 12799                                  ; by calling "media_chk",the change line activity of the drive is going to be
 12800                                  ; lost.	this routine will check the change line activity and will save the
 12801                                  ; history in the flags.
 12802                                  ;
 12803                                  ; FUNCTION: check the change line error activity
 12804                                  ;
 12805                                  ; INPUT :  ES:di -> bds table.
 12806                                  ;
 12807                                  ; OUTPUT:   flag in bds table will be updated if change line occurs.
 12808                                  ;
 12809                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 12810                                  ;	Set_Changed_DL
 12811                                  ;
 12812                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12813                                  
 12814                                  ChangeLineChk:	
 12815 000011EB 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12816 000011EF 08D2                    		or	dl, dl		; Fixed	disk?
 12817 000011F1 7821                    		js	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Yes, skip it.
 12818                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12819 000011F3 26F6452304              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 4
 12820                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12821                                  					; return_fake_bpb
 12822 000011F8 751A                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12823 000011FA 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1	; This rom support change line?
 12824 000011FF 7513                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12825 00001201 E8DE06                  		call	haschange	; This drive support change line?
 12826 00001204 740E                    		jz	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Do nothing
 12827                                  
 12828                                  		; Execute the rom disk interrupt to check changeline activity.
 12829                                  
 12830 00001206 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 12831 00001208 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 12832                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 12833                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 12834 0000120A 7308                    		jnb	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12835 0000120C 53                      		push	bx
 12836 0000120D BB4000                  		mov	bx, 40h		; fchanged
 12837                                  					; Update flag in BDS for this
 12838                                  					; physical drive
 12839 00001210 E8A806                  		call	set_changed_dl
 12840 00001213 5B                      		pop	bx
 12841                                  ChangeLnChkRet:				
 12842 00001214 C3                      		retn
 12843                                  
 12844                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12845                                  
 12846                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12847                                  
 12848                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12849                                  ;	GetAccessFlag
 12850                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12851                                  ;
 12852                                  ; FUNCTION: get the status of UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 12853                                  ;
 12854                                  ; INPUT :
 12855                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 12856                                  ;
 12857                                  ; OUTPUT:   a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 if disk i/o not allowed.
 12858                                  ;						 = 1 if disk i/o allowed.
 12859                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12860                                  
 12861                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12862                                  GetAccessFlag:				
 12863 00001215 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 12864 00001219 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12865                                  		;mov	al, 0		; Assume result	is unformatted
 12866                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12867 0000121C 28C0                    		sub	al, al
 12868                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12869 0000121E 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 12870                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12871                                  					; unformatted_media
 12872 00001223 7502                    		jnz	short GafDone	; Done if unformatted
 12873 00001225 FEC0                    		inc	al		; Return true for formatted
 12874                                  
 12875                                  GafDone:				
 12876 00001227 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 12877 0000122A C3                      		retn
 12878                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12879                                  
 12880                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12881                                  
 12882                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12883                                  ;	SetAccessFlag
 12884                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12885                                  ;
 12886                                  ; function: set/reset the UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 12887                                  ;
 12888                                  ; input :
 12889                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 12890                                  ;
 12891                                  ; output:   unformtted_media bit modified according to the user request
 12892                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12893                                  
 12894                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12895                                  SetAccessFlag:				
 12896 0000122B C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	points to request header
 12897 0000122F C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12898                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12899 00001232 26806524FD              		and	byte [es:di+36], 0FDh
 12900                                  		;and	word [es:di+35], 0FDFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12901                                  					; ~unformatted_media
 12902 00001237 807F0100                		cmp	byte [bx+1], 0	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 12903 0000123B 7505                    		jnz	short saf_Done
 12904                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12905 0000123D 26804D2402              		or	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 12906                                  		;or	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12907                                  					; unformatted_media
 12908                                  saf_Done:				
 12909 00001242 C3                      		retn
 12910                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12911                                  
 12912                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12913                                  
 12914                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12915                                  ; Ioctl_Support_Query
 12916                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12917                                  ;
 12918                                  ; New device command which was added in DOS 5.00 to allow a query of a 
 12919                                  ; specific GENERIC IOCtl to see if it is supported. Bit 7 in the
 12920                                  ; device attributes specifies if this function is supported.
 12921                                  ;
 12922                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12923                                  
 12924                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12925                                  ioctl_support_query:
 12926 00001243 06                      		push	es
 12927 00001244 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX Points to request header.
 12928 00001248 268B470D                		mov	ax, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 12929                                  					; AL ==	Major, AH == Minor
 12930 0000124C 3C08                    		cmp	al, 8		; IOC_DC
 12931                                  					; See if major code is 8
 12932 0000124E 7513                    		jnz	short nosupport
 12933 00001250 0E                      		push	cs
 12934 00001251 07                      		pop	es
 12935 00001252 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 12936                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12937 00001255 BF[360C]                		mov	di, IOC_DC_Table
 12938                                  		;mov	di, 0C60h	; IOC_DC_Table
 12939                                  					; at 2C7h:0C60h	= 70h:31D0h
 12940 00001258 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah		; Put minor code in AL
 12941 0000125A F2AE                    		repne scasb		; Scan for minor code in AL
 12942 0000125C 7505                    		jnz	short nosupport	; it was not found
 12943 0000125E B80001                  		mov	ax, 100h
 12944                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12945                                  		; (jump to ioctlsupexit is not required)
 12946                                  		;jmp	short $+2	; ioctlsupexit
 12947                                  					; Signal ioctl is supported
 12948                                  		;;jmp	short ioctlsupexit
 12949                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12950                                  ioctlsupexit:				
 12951 00001261 07                      		pop	es
 12952                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12953                                  		; cf = 0
 12954                                  		;clc
 12955 00001262 C3                      		retn
 12956                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12957                                  nosupport:				
 12958 00001263 07                      		pop	es
 12959 00001264 E96EEE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
 12960                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12961                                  
 12962                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12963                                  
 12964                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12965                                  ;	GetMediaSenseStatus
 12966                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12967                                  ;
 12968                                  ; FUNCTION: Will return the type of diskette media in the specified DOS
 12969                                  ;	    diskette drive and whether the media is the default type
 12970                                  ;	    for that drive. (default type means the max size for that
 12971                                  ;	    drive)
 12972                                  ;
 12973                                  ; INPUT :   ES:DI -> BDS table
 12974                                  ; OUTPUT:   If carry clear
 12975                                  ;	    DS:BX -> Updated IOCtlPacket
 12976                                  ;
 12977                                  ;			 Special Function at offset 0:
 12978                                  ;				0	- Media detected is not default type
 12979                                  ;				1	- Media detected is default type
 12980                                  ;
 12981                                  ;			 Device Type at offset 1:
 12982                                  ;				2       - 720K 3.5" 80 tracks
 12983                                  ;				7	- 1.44M 3.5" 80 tracks
 12984                                  ;				9	- 2.88M 3.5" 80 tracks
 12985                                  ;
 12986                                  ; Error Codes returned in AX if carry set:
 12987                                  ;
 12988                                  ; 8102 - Drive not ready	- No disk is in the drive.
 12989                                  ; 8107 - Unknown media type	- Drive doesn't support this function or
 12990                                  ;				  the media is really unkown, any error
 12991                                  ;				  other than "media not present"
 12992                                  ; 
 12993                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12994                                  
 12995                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12996                                  SenseMediaType:				
 12997 00001267 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header.
 12998 0000126B C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12999                                  		; 10/10/2022
 13000                                  		;mov	word [bx], 0	; Initialize the 2 packet bytes
 13001 0000126E 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 13002 00001270 8917                    		mov	[bx], dx ; 0
 13003                                  		;
 13004 00001272 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13005                                  					; Get int 13h drive number from	BDS
 13006                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13007                                  		;xor	dh, dh		; DX = physical	drive number
 13008 00001276 B420                    		mov	ah, 20h		; Get Media Type function
 13009                                  					; If no	carry media type in AL
 13010 00001278 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - QCACHE	- DISMOUNT
 13011 0000127A 7216                    		jb	short MediaSenseEr ; error code	in AH
 13012 0000127C FE07                    		inc	byte [bx]	; Signal media type is default (bit 1)
 13013                                  DetermineMediaType:			
 13014 0000127E FEC8                    		dec	al
 13015 00001280 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; Chk for 720K ie: (3-1) = 2
 13016 00001282 740A                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 13017 00001284 0404                    		add	al, 4
 13018 00001286 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7		; Chk for 1.44M ie: (4-1+4) = 7
 13019 00001288 7404                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 13020 0000128A 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9		; Chk for 2.88M	ie: (6-1+4) = 9
 13021 0000128C 7510                    		jnz	short UnknownMediaType ; Just didn't recognize media type
 13022                                  GotMediaType:				
 13023 0000128E 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; Save the return value
 13024                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13025                                  		; cf = 0
 13026                                  		;clc			; Signal success
 13027 00001291 C3                      		retn
 13028                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13029                                  
 13030                                  MediaSenseEr:				
 13031 00001292 80FC32                  		cmp	ah, 32h		; See if not default media error
 13032 00001295 74E7                    		jz	short DetermineMediaType ; Not really an error
 13033 00001297 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; Now assume drive not ready
 13034 00001299 80FC31                  		cmp	ah, 31h		; See if media was present
 13035 0000129C 7402                    		jz	short SenseErrExit ; Return drive not ready
 13036                                  UnknownMediaType:			
 13037 0000129E B007                    		mov	al, 7		; Just don't know the media type
 13038                                  SenseErrExit:				
 13039 000012A0 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Signal error return
 13040 000012A2 F9                      		stc
 13041 000012A3 C3                      		retn
 13042                                  
 13043                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13044                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13045                                  		;db    0
 13046                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13047                                  
 13048                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 13049                                  
 13050                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13051                                  ; MSINT13.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 13052                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13053                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 13054                                  
 13055                                  ;	int 2f function 13h allows the user to change the orig13 int_13 vector
 13056                                  ;	after booting. this allows testing and implementation of custom int_13
 13057                                  ;	handlers, without giving up ms-dos error recovery
 13058                                  ;	entry:	ds:dx	== addr. of new int_13 handler
 13059                                  ;		es:bx	== addr. of new int_13 vector used by warm boot (int19)
 13060                                  ;	exit:	orig13	== address of new int_13 handler
 13061                                  ;		ds:dx	== old orig13 value
 13062                                  ;		es:bx	== old old13  value
 13063                                  ;
 13064                                  ; int 2f handler for external block drivers to communicate with the internal
 13065                                  ; block driver in msdisk. the multiplex number chosen is 8. the handler
 13066                                  ; sets up the pointer to the request packet in [ptrsav] and then jumps to
 13067                                  ; dsk_entry, the entry point for all disk requests.
 13068                                  ;
 13069                                  ; on exit from this driver, we will return to the external driver
 13070                                  ; that issued this int 2f, and can then remove the flags from the stack.
 13071                                  ; this scheme allows us to have a small external device driver, and makes
 13072                                  ; the maintainance of the various drivers (driver and msbio) much easier,
 13073                                  ; since we only need to make changes in one place (most of the time).
 13074                                  ;
 13075                                  ;   ax=800h - check for installed handler - reserved
 13076                                  ;   ax=801h - install the bds into the linked list
 13077                                  ;   ax=802h - dos request
 13078                                  ;   ax=803h - return bds table starting pointer in ds:di
 13079                                  ;	   (ems device driver hooks int 13h to handle 16kb dma overrun
 13080                                  ;	    problem. bds table is going to be used to get head/sector
 13081                                  ;	    informations without calling generic ioctl get device parm call.)
 13082                                  
 13083                                  ;BIOSSEGMENT equ 70h
 13084                                  DOSBIOSSEG equ 0070h ; 17/10/2022	
 13085                                  
 13086                                  ;;BIOSCODE:1302h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 13087                                  
 13088                                  i2f_handler:				; here is 02C7h:1302h =	0070h:3872h
 13089 000012A4 80FC13                  		cmp	ah, 13h
 13090 000012A7 7413                    		jz	short int2f_replace_int13
 13091 000012A9 80FC08                  		cmp	ah, 8
 13092 000012AC 7431                    		jz	short mine
 13093                                  
 13094                                  ; Check for WIN386 startup and return the BIOS instance data
 13095                                  
 13096 000012AE 80FC16                  		cmp	ah, 16h		; MultWin386
 13097 000012B1 746C                    		jz	short win386call
 13098 000012B3 80FC4A                  		cmp	ah, 4Ah		; multMULT
 13099 000012B6 7503                    		jnz	short i2f_handler_iret
 13100 000012B8 E99700                  		jmp	handle_multmult
 13101                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13102                                  
 13103                                  i2f_handler_iret:			
 13104 000012BB CF                      		iret
 13105                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13106                                  
 13107                                  int2f_replace_int13:			
 13108 000012BC 50                      		push	ax	; free up a register for caller's ds
 13109 000012BD 8CD8                    		mov	ax, ds	; then we can use ds: -> Bios_Data
 13110                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h] ; 15/10/2022	
 13111                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
 13112                                  					; = [02C7h:0030h] = [0070h:25A0h]
 13113 000012BF 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
 13114                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13115                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13	; save old value of old13 and
 13116                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13+2	; orig13 so that we can
 13117                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13	; return them to caller
 13118                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13+2
 13119                                  		
 13120                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 13121                                  		;push	word [Orig13]
 13122 000012C4 FF36[B600]              		push	word [Orig13+2]
 13123                                  		;push	word [Old13]
 13124 000012C8 FF36[0801]              		push	word [Old13+2]
 13125                                  
 13126                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13, dx	; orig13 := addr. of new int_13
 13127                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13+2, ax
 13128                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13, bx	; old13 := addr. of new boot_13
 13129                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13+2, es
 13130                                  		
 13131                                  		;mov	[Orig13], dx
 13132                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13133 000012CC 8716[B400]              		xchg	dx, [Orig13]
 13134 000012D0 A3[B600]                		mov	[Orig13+2], ax
 13135                                  		;mov	[Old13], bx
 13136                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13137 000012D3 871E[0601]              		xchg	bx, [Old13]
 13138 000012D7 8C06[0801]              		mov	[Old13+2], es
 13139                                  
 13140 000012DB 07                      		pop	es			; es:bx := old old13 vector
 13141                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13142                                  		;pop	bx
 13143 000012DC 1F                      		pop	ds			; ds:dx := old orig13 vector
 13144                                  		;pop	dx ; 02/09/2023
 13145 000012DD 58                      		pop	ax
 13146                                  i2f_iret:
 13147 000012DE CF                      		iret
 13148                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13149                                  
 13150                                  mine:					
 13151 000012DF 3CF8                    		cmp	al, 0F8h 		; iret on reserved functions
 13152 000012E1 73FB                    		jnb	short i2f_iret
 13153 000012E3 08C0                    		or	al, al			; a get installed state request?
 13154 000012E5 7503                    		jnz	short disp_func
 13155 000012E7 B0FF                    		mov	al, 0FFh
 13156                                  		;jmp	short i2f_iret
 13157                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13158 000012E9 CF                      		iret
 13159                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13160                                  
 13161                                  disp_func:				
 13162 000012EA 3C01                    		cmp	al, 1			; request for installing bds?
 13163 000012EC 7418                    		jz	short do_subfun_01
 13164 000012EE 3C03                    		cmp	al, 3			; get bds vector?
 13165 000012F0 7423                    		jz	short do_get_bds_vector
 13166                                  
 13167                                  ; set up pointer to request packet
 13168                                  
 13169 000012F2 1E                      		push	ds
 13170 000012F3 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022	
 13171                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 13172                                  					; = [0070h:25A0h] = [02C7h:0030h]
 13173                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13174                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:ptrsav, bx
 13175                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:ptrsav+2, es
 13176 000012F8 891E[1200]              		mov	[ptrsav], bx
 13177 000012FC 8C06[1400]              		mov	[ptrsav+2], es
 13178 00001300 1F                      		pop	ds
 13179                                  		;jmp	far ptr	i2f_dskentry
 13180                                  		; 17/10/2022
 13181                                  		;jmp	far DOSBIOSSEG:dsk_entry		
 13182 00001301 EA[9608]7000            		jmp	DOSBIOSSEG:i2f_dskentry ; 70h:i2f_dskentry
 13183                                  					; NOTE: jump to a FAR function, not an
 13184                                  					;  IRET type function. Callers of
 13185                                  					;  this int2f subfunction will have
 13186                                  					;  to be careful to do a popf
 13187                                  
 13188                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13189                                  
 13190                                  do_subfun_01:				
 13191 00001306 06                      		push	es
 13192 00001307 1E                      		push	ds
 13193 00001308 1E                      		push	ds
 13194 00001309 07                      		pop	es
 13195                                  		; 17/10/2022
 13196 0000130A 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 13197                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 13198                                  					; point	ds: -> Bios_Data
 13199 0000130F E8BC03                  		call	install_bds
 13200 00001312 1F                      		pop	ds
 13201 00001313 07                      		pop	es
 13202                                  		;jmp	short i2f_iret
 13203                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13204 00001314 CF                      		iret
 13205                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13206                                  
 13207                                  do_get_bds_vector:
 13208                                  		; 17/10/2022
 13209 00001315 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 13210                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 13211 0000131A C53E[1901]              		lds	di, [start_bds]
 13212                                  		;lds	di, ds:start_bds
 13213                                  ;ii2f_iret:	; 10/12/2022
 13214                                  		;jmp	short i2f_iret
 13215                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13216 0000131E CF                      		iret
 13217                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13218                                  
 13219                                  ; 17/10/2022
 13220                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13221                                  
 13222                                  ; WIN386 startup stuff is done here. If starting up we set our WIN386 present
 13223                                  ; flag and return instance data. If exiting, we reset the WIN386 present flag
 13224                                  ; NOTE: We assume that the BIOS int 2fh is at the bottom of the chain.
 13225                                  
 13226                                  win386call:				
 13227 0000131F 1E                      		push	ds
 13228 00001320 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 13229                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 13230                                  					; at 2C7h:30h =	70h:25A0h
 13231 00001325 3C05                    		cmp	al, 5		; Win386_Init
 13232                                  					; is it	win386 initializing?
 13233 00001327 7410                    		jz	short Win386Init
 13234 00001329 3C06                    		cmp	al, 6		; Win386_Exit
 13235                                  					; is it	win386 exiting?
 13236 0000132B 7523                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not, continue int2f chain
 13237                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13238 0000132D F6C201                  		test	dl, 1
 13239                                  		;test	dx, 1		; is it	win386 or win286 dos extender?
 13240 00001330 751E                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not win386, then continue
 13241                                  		;and	ds:IsWin386, 0	; indicate that	win386 is not present  
 13242 00001332 8026[CE08]00            		and	byte [IsWin386], 0 
 13243 00001337 EB17                    		jmp	short win_iret
 13244                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13245                                  
 13246                                  Win386Init:	
 13247                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13248 00001339 F6C201                  		test	dl, 1			
 13249                                  		;test	dx, 1		; is it win386 or win286 dos extender?
 13250 0000133C 7512                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not win386, then continue
 13251                                  		;or	ds:IsWin386, 1	; Indicate WIN386 present
 13252 0000133E 800E[CE08]01            		or	byte [IsWin386], 1
 13253                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:SI_Next, bx	; Hook our structure into chain
 13254                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:SI_Next+2, es
 13255 00001343 891E[9C08]              		mov	[SI_Next], bx
 13256 00001347 8C06[9E08]              		mov	[SI_Next+2], es
 13257                                  		;mov	bx, offset Win386_SI ; point ES:BX to Win386_SI
 13258 0000134B BB[9A08]                		mov	bx, Win386_SI	; 19/10/2022
 13259 0000134E 1E                      		push	ds
 13260 0000134F 07                      		pop	es
 13261                                  win_iret:
 13262 00001350 1F                      		pop	ds
 13263                                  ii2f_iret:	; 10/12/2022
 13264                                  		;jmp	short i2f_iret	; return back up the chain
 13265                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13266 00001351 CF                      		iret
 13267                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13268                                  
 13269                                  handle_multmult:			
 13270 00001352 3C01                    		cmp	al, 1
 13271 00001354 7514                    		jnz	short try_2
 13272 00001356 1E                      		push	ds
 13273 00001357 E84500                  		call	HMAPtr		; get offset of free HMA
 13274                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13275                                  		;xor	bx, bx
 13276                                  		;dec	bx
 13277 0000135A BBFFFF                  		mov	bx, 0FFFFh
 13278 0000135D 8EC3                    		mov	es, bx		; seg of HMA
 13279 0000135F 89FB                    		mov	bx, di
 13280 00001361 F7D3                    		not	bx
 13281 00001363 09DB                    		or	bx, bx
 13282 00001365 7401                    		jz	short try_1
 13283 00001367 43                      		inc	bx
 13284                                  try_1:
 13285 00001368 1F                      		pop	ds
 13286                                  		;jmp	short ii2f_iret
 13287                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13288 00001369 CF                      		iret
 13289                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13290                                  
 13291                                  try_2:					
 13292 0000136A 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; multMULTALLOCHMA
 13293 0000136C 7530                    		jnz	short try_3
 13294 0000136E 1E                      		push	ds
 13295                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13296                                  		;xor	di, di
 13297                                  		;dec	di

 13299 00001372 8EC7                    		mov	es, di
 13300 00001374 E82800                  		call	HMAPtr		; get offset of free HMA
 13301 00001377 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 13302 0000137A 7421                    		jz	short InsuffHMA

 13304 0000137E 39FB                    		cmp	bx, di
 13305 00001380 7605                    		jbe	short try_4
 13306                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13307                                  		;sub	di, di
 13308                                  		;dec	di
 13309 00001382 BFFFFF                  		mov	di, 0FFFFh
 13310                                  		;jmp	short InsuffHMA
 13311                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13312 00001385 1F                      		pop	ds
 13313 00001386 CF                      		iret

 13318 00001387 8B3E[F508]              		mov	di, [FreeHMAPtr]
 13319 0000138B 83C30F                  		add	bx, 15
 13320                                  		;and	bx, 0FFF0h
 13321                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13322 0000138E 80E3F0                  		and	bl, 0F0h
 13323                                  		;add	ds:FreeHMAPtr, bx ; update the free pointer	
 13324 00001391 011E[F508]              		add	[FreeHMAPtr], bx

 13328                                  					; no more HMA if we have wrapped
