 14390                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14391                                  ; include msbio.cl2 (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 14392                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14393                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:17D5h)
 14394                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14395                                  ; 17/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 14396                                  
 14397                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D38h or 02C7h:17C8h
 14398 00001748 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 14399 0000174A 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 14399 00001753 736B6574746520666F-
 14399 0000175C 7220647269766520   
 14400                                  
 14401                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 14402 00001764 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 14402 0000176D 65737320616E79206B-
 14402 00001776 6579207768656E2072-
 14402 0000177F 656164790D0A       
 14403 00001785 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 14404                                  
 14405                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14406                                  
 14407                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14408                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 14409                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 14410                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 14411                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14412                                  
 14413                                  chkopcnt:		
 14414 00001787 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 14415 0000178C C3                      		retn
 14416                                  
 14417                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14418                                  
 14419                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14420                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 14421                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 14422                                  ;
 14423                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14424                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14425                                  
 14426                                  mediacheck:	
 14427 0000178D E8A9F0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 14428 00001790 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14429 00001792 E84D01                  		call	haschange
 14430 00001795 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 14431 00001797 E83C01                  		call	checkromchange
 14432 0000179A 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 14433 0000179C 50                      		push	ax
 14434 0000179D 52                      		push	dx
 14435 0000179E 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14436                                  					; set logical drive number
 14437 000017A2 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 14438 000017A4 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 14439                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 14440                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 14441 000017A6 5A                      		pop	dx
 14442 000017A7 58                      		pop	ax
 14443 000017A8 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 14444 000017AA BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 14445                                  
 14446                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 14447                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 14448                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 14449                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 14450                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 14451                                  ; status.
 14452                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14453 000017AD 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 14454 000017B1 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14455                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 14456                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 14457                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 14458                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 14459 000017B5 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 14460                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 14461                                  
 14462                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 14463                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 14464                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 14465                                  
 14466 000017B7 50                      		push	ax
 14467 000017B8 51                      		push	cx
 14468 000017B9 52                      		push	dx
 14469 000017BA E896ED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 14470 000017BD 5A                      		pop	dx
 14471 000017BE 59                      		pop	cx
 14472 000017BF 58                      		pop	ax
 14473 000017C0 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14474 000017C2 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 14475                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 14476 000017C4 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 14477                                  mediaret:				
 14478 000017C6 C3                      		retn
 14479                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14480                                  
 14481                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 14482                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 14483                                  ; or write.
 14484                                  
 14485                                  mediadovolid:				
 14486 000017C7 E82DEE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 14487 000017CA 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 14488 000017CC E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 14489 000017CF 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 14490 000017D1 E9F8F3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14491                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14492                                  
 14493                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 14494                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 14495                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 14496                                  ; dos.
 14497                                  ;
 14498                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 14499                                  
 14500                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14501                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 14502                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 14503                                  
 14504                                  checklatchio:	
 14505                                  
 14506                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 14507                                  			
 14508 000017D4 E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14509 000017D7 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 14510                                  
 14511                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 14512                                  
 14513 000017D9 E8FA00                  		call	checkromchange
 14514 000017DC 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 14515                                  
 14516                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 14517                                  ; expensive verification.
 14518                                  
 14519 000017DE E816EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 14520 000017E1 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 14521 000017E3 E81600                  		call	check_vid
 14522 000017E6 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 14523 000017E8 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14524 000017EA 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 14525 000017EC E87B00                  		call	returnvid
 14526                                  checklatchret:				
 14527 000017EF E8DAF3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14528                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 14529 000017F2 F9                      		stc
 14530 000017F3 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 14531                                  checkret:				
 14532 000017F4 C3                      		retn
 14533                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14534                                  
 14535                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 14536                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 14537                                  ;
 14538                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14539                                  
 14540                                  checkfatvid:				
 14541 000017F5 E8BD01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 14542 000017F8 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14543 000017FA 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 14544                                  
 14545                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 14546                                  
 14547                                  		; fall into check_vid
 14548                                  
 14549                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14550                                  
 14551                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 14552                                  ;
 14553                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 14554                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 14555                                  ;
 14556                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 14557                                  ;
 14558                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 14559                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 14560                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 14561                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 14562                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 14563                                  ;
 14564                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 14565                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 14566                                  ; routine.)
 14567                                  ;
 14568                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 14569                                  
 14570                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14571                                  check_vid:
 14572                                  
 14573                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 14574                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 14575                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 14576                                  
 14577 000017FC 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 14578                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 14579                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 14580 00001801 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 14581 00001803 E8DC00                  		call	haschange
 14582 00001806 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 14583 00001808 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14584 0000180A 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 14585                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 14586 0000180F 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 14587                                  					; if not fat system
 14588 00001811 E8EE00                  		call	read_volume_id
 14589 00001814 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 14590 00001816 E89201                  		call	check_volume_id
 14591 00001819 BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14592                                  					; definitely changed
 14593 0000181C 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 14594                                  
 14595 0000181E 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 14596                                  vid_no_changed:				
 14597 0000181F E8BA00                  		call	resetchanged
 14598                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14599                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 14600                                  		;clc
 14601                                  checkfatret:				
 14602 00001822 C3                      		retn
 14603                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14604                                  
 14605                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14606                                  changed_drv:
 14607 00001823 F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 14608 00001824 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 14609                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 14610 00001829 C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 14611                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14612                                  
 14613                                  ; extended id check
 14614                                  
 14615                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14616                                  
 14617                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 14618                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 14619                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 14620                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 14621                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 14622                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 14623                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 14624                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 14625                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 14626                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 14627                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 14628                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 14629                                  ;
 14630                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 14631                                  
 14632                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14633                                  do_ext_check_id:			
 14634 0000182A 50                      		push	ax
 14635                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 14636                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 14637 0000182B A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 14638                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14639 0000182E 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 14640 00001830 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 14641 00001834 750C                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14642 00001836 A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 14643 00001839 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 14644 0000183D 7503                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14645                                  		;xor	si, si		; 0
 14646                                  					; don't know
 14647 0000183F 58                      		pop	ax
 14648 00001840 EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 14649                                  					; reset the flag
 14650                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14651                                  
 14652                                  ext_changed:
 14653 00001842 58                      		pop	ax
 14654                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14655 00001843 4E                      		dec	si ; mov si, 0FFFFh ; -1
 14656                                  		;mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14657                                  					; disk changed!
 14658                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14659                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 14660                                  		;clc
 14661 00001844 EBDD                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 14662                                  
 14663                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14664                                  
 14665                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 14666                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 14667                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 14668                                  ;
 14669                                  ; es:di -> bds
 14670                                  
 14671                                  checkio:				
 14672 00001846 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 14673 00001849 75D7                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 14674 0000184B E839FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14675 0000184E 74D2                    		jz	short checkfatret
 14676 00001850 E8A4ED                  		call	GetBp
 14677 00001853 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 14678 00001855 E89DFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 14679 00001858 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 14680 0000185A 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14681 0000185C 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 14682 0000185E 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 14683 0000185F C3                      		retn
 14684                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14685                                  
 14686                                  checkioerr:				
 14687 00001860 E80700                  		call	returnvid
 14688                                  
 14689                                  checkioret:				
 14690 00001863 F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 14691 00001864 E915F3                  		jmp	harderr
 14692                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14693                                  
 14694                                  no_error_map:				
 14695 00001867 E915F3                  		jmp	harderr2
 14696                                  
 14697                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14698                                  
 14699                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 14700                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 14701                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 14702                                  
 14703                                  returnvid:		
 14704 0000186A BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 14705                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 14706 0000186D E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 14707 00001870 B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 14708 00001872 F9                      		stc
 14709 00001873 C3                      		retn
 14710                                  
 14711                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14712                                  
 14713                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 14714                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 14715                                  ;
 14716                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 14717                                  ; **trashes si**
 14718                                  
 14719                                  media_set_vid:				
 14720 00001874 BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 14721                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 14722                                  
 14723                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 14724                                  
 14725                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14726                                  
 14727                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 14728                                  
 14729                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14730                                  vid_into_packet:
 14731 00001877 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 14732 00001878 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 14733 0000187C 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14734 0000187F 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 14735 00001881 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14736 00001884 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 14737 00001887 1F                      		pop	ds
 14738                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 14739 00001888 C3                      		retn
 14740                                  
 14741                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14742                                  
 14743                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14744                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 14745                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 14746                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 14747                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 14748                                  ;
 14749                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 14750                                  ;		ah has media byte
 14751                                  ;
 14752                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 14753                                  ;		    no registers modified
 14754                                  ;		carry set
 14755                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 14756                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 14757                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 14758                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 14759                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 14760                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 14761                                  ;
 14762                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14763                                  
 14764                                  hidensity:
 14765                                  
 14766                                  ; check for correct drive
 14767                                  		
 14768                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14769 00001889 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 14770                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 14771                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 14772 0000188E 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 14773                                  
 14774                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 14775                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 14776                                  
 14777 00001890 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 14778 00001895 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 14779                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 14780                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 14781 00001897 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 14782 0000189A 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 14783                                  
 14784                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 14785                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 14786                                  
 14787                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 14788 0000189C 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+22h]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14789 000018A0 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7
 14790                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14791                                  					; ffOther
 14792 000018A2 7413                    		jz	short Is720K
 14793 000018A4 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9
 14794                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14795                                  					; ff288
 14796 000018A6 740F                    		jz	short Is720K
 14797 000018A8 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 14798 000018AA BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 14799                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 14800                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 14801 000018AD B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 14802                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 14803                                  					; 2 sides
 14804                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14805 000018B0 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop off return address
 14806 000018B1 BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 14807                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 14808                                  					; & head max
 14809                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14810 000018B4 E9B2ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 14811                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14812                                  
 14813                                  Is720K:
 14814                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14815 000018B7 5B                      		pop	bx		; pop off return address	
 14816                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14817 000018B8 E975ED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 14818                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14819                                  
 14820                                  		; 18/12/2022
 14821                                  ;dofloppy:
 14822                                  		;retn
 14823                                  
 14824                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14825                                  
 14826                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14827                                  
 14828                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14829                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 14830                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 14831                                  ;
 14832                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 14833                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 14834                                  ;   outputs:	none
 14835                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 14836                                  ;
 14837                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 14838                                  ;
 14839                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 14840                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14841                                  
 14842                                  set_changed_dl:	
 14843 000018BB 06                      		push	es
 14844 000018BC 57                      		push	di
 14845                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 14846                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14847 000018BD C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 14848                                  
 14849                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 14850                                  
 14851                                  scan_bds:				
 14852 000018C1 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14853 000018C5 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 14854                                  
 14855                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 14856                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 14857                                  
 14858 000018C7 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14859                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 14860                                  get_next_bds:				
 14861 000018CB 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 14862                                  					; go to	next bds
 14863 000018CE 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 14864 000018D1 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 14865 000018D3 5F                      		pop	di
 14866 000018D4 07                      		pop	es
 14867 000018D5 C3                      		retn
 14868                                  
 14869                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14870                                  
 14871                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14872                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 14873                                  ;
 14874                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 14875                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 14876                                  ;		zero reset - change
 14877                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14878                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14879                                  
 14880                                  checkromchange:	
 14881                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 14882                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14883 000018D6 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 14884                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14885                                  					; fchanged
 14886 000018DB C3                      		retn
 14887                                  
 14888                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14889                                  
 14890                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14891                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 14892                                  ;
 14893                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 14894                                  ;   outputs:	none
 14895                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14896                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14897

 14900                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14901 000018DC 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 14902                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14903                                  					; ~fchanged
 14904 000018E1 C3                      		retn
 14905                                  
 14906                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14907                                  
 14908                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14909                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 14910                                  ;
 14911                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 14912                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 14913                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 14914                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14915                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14916                                  
 14917                                  haschange:
 14918                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 14919                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14920 000018E2 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 14921                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14922                                  					; fchangeline
 14923 000018E7 C3                      		retn
 14924                                  
 14925                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14926                                  
 14927                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14928                                  
 14929                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14930                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 14931                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 14932                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 14933                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 14934                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 14935                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14936                                  
 14937                                  ; set_volume_id
 14938                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 14939                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 14940                                  ;
 14941                                  ;   on entry:
 14942                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 14943                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 14944                                  ;
 14945                                  ;   on exit:
 14946                                  ;	carry clear:
 14947                                  ;	   successful call
 14948                                  ;	carry set
 14949                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 14950                                  
 14951                                  set_volume_id:				
 14952 000018E8 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 14953 000018E9 50                      		push	ax
 14954 000018EA E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 14955 000018ED 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 14956 000018EF E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 14957 000018F2 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 14958 000018F4 E8A800                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 14959 000018F7 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 14960                                  setvret:				
 14961                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14962                                  		; cf = 0
 14963                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 14964 000018FA 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 14965 000018FB 5A                      		pop	dx
 14966 000018FC C3                      		retn
 14967                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14968                                  
 14969                                  seterr:					
 14970 000018FD 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 14971 000018FE 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 14972 000018FF C3                      		retn
 14973                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14974 00001900 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 14975                                  
 14976                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14977                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 14978                                  ; 09/12/2022
 14979                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 14980                                  
 14981                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14982                                  
 14983                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14984                                  
 14985                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 14986                                  ;
 14987                                  ;   on entry:
 14988                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 14989                                  ;
 14990                                  ;   on exit:
 14991                                  ;	carry clear
 14992                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 14993                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 14994                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 14995                                  ;
 14996                                  ;	carry set:
 14997                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 14998                                  
 14999                                  read_volume_id:
 15000 00001902 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 15001 00001903 51                      		push	cx
 15002 00001904 53                      		push	bx
 15003 00001905 50                      		push	ax
 15004 00001906 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 15005 00001907 57                      		push	di
 15006 00001908 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 15007 00001909 07                      		pop	es
 15008 0000190A BF[0A09]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15009 0000190D BE[FE08]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15010 00001910 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 15011 00001913 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15012 00001915 5F                      		pop	di
 15013 00001916 07                      		pop	es
 15014 00001917 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 15015                                  					; # of fats
 15016 0000191B 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 15017                                  					; sectors / fat
 15018 0000191F F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 15019 00001921 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 15020                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 15021                                  					;
 15022                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 15023                                  		; 17/10/2022
 15024 00001925 2EA3[0019]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 15025                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 15026                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 15027 00001929 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 15028                                  					; # root dir entries
 15029 0000192D B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 15030 0000192F D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 15031                                  		;mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15032                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1, one byte opcode)
 15033 00001931 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15034                                  next_sec:				
 15035 00001932 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 15036 00001933 2EA1[0019]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15037                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 15038                                  					; get sector #
 15039 00001937 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 15040                                  					; sectors / track
 15041 0000193B 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15042 0000193D F7F1                    		div	cx
 15043                                  
 15044                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 15045                                  
 15046 0000193F 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 15047                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 15048 00001940 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 15049 00001942 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15050 00001944 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 15051                                  					; # heads on this disc
 15052 00001948 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 15053 0000194A 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 15054 0000194C E828EE                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 15055                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 15056 0000194F 723F                    		jb	short readviderr
 15057 00001951 B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 15058 00001954 B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 15059                                  fvid_loop:
 15060                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15061 00001956 382F                    		cmp	[bx], ch ; 0
 15062                                  		;cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 15063 00001958 7433                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 15064 0000195A 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 15065 0000195D 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 15066 0000195F 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 15067 00001962 750F                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 15068                                  ent_loop:				
 15069 00001964 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 15070 00001967 E2ED                    		loop	fvid_loop
 15071 00001969 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 15072 0000196A 2EFF06[0019]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15073                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 15074                                  					; next sector
 15075 0000196F E2C1                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 15076                                  notfound:
 15077                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15078                                  		;xor	si, si
 15079 00001971 EB13                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15080                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15081                                  
 15082                                  found_vid:
 15083                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15084                                  		; cf = 0  ('test' instruction clears cf)  				
 15085 00001973 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15086 00001974 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 15087 00001976 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 15088 00001977 57                      		push	di
 15089 00001978 1E                      		push	ds
 15090 00001979 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 15091 0000197A BF[0A09]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15092 0000197D B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 15093                                  					; length of string minus nul
 15094 00001980 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 15095                                  		;xor	al, al
 15096                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15097 00001982 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; ax = 0
 15098 00001983 AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 15099                                  		;;xor	si, si
 15100                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15101                                  		;xchg	ax, si		; si = 0
 15102 00001984 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 15103 00001985 07                      		pop	es
 15104                                  fvid_ret:
 15105                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15106 00001986 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15107                                  				
 15108 00001988 58                      		pop	ax
 15109                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15110                                  		; cf = 0
 15111                                  		;clc
 15112                                  rvidret:
 15113 00001989 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 15114 0000198A 59                      		pop	cx
 15115 0000198B 5A                      		pop	dx
 15116 0000198C C3                      		retn
 15117                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15118                                  
 15119                                  no_vid:
 15120 0000198D 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15121                                  		;jmp	short notfound	; not found
 15122                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15123 0000198E EBF6                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15124                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15125                                  
 15126                                  readviderr:				
 15127 00001990 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 15128 00001991 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 15129 00001992 EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 15130                                  
 15131                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15132                                  
 15133                                  		; 02/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (IO.SYS optimization)
 15134                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1DCFh 
 15135                                  preset_volid_addr:
 15136 00001994 BE[0A09]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME    "
 15137                                  		;
 15138                                  		; PCDOS 7.1
 15139                                  		;add	di, 125		; BDS.volid
 15140                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ (12 for MSDOS 5.0-6.22 versions)
 15141                                  		; MSDOS 6.21 (MSDOS 5.0 & 6.?)
 15142 00001997 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15143 0000199A B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15144                                  		;
 15145 0000199D FC                      		cld
 15146 0000199E C3                      		retn
 15147                                  
 15148                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15149                                  
 15150                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15151                                  ;
 15152                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 15153                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 15154                                  
 15155                                  transfer_volume_id:
 15156 0000199F 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15157 000019A0 56                      		push	si
 15158 000019A1 51                      		push	cx
 15159                                  		
 15160                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15161                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15162                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15163                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15164                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15165                                  		;cld
 15166                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15167 000019A2 E8EFFF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15168                                  
 15169 000019A5 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15170 000019A7 59                      		pop	cx
 15171 000019A8 5E                      		pop	si
 15172 000019A9 5F                      		pop	di
 15173 000019AA C3                      		retn
 15174                                  
 15175                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15176                                  
 15177                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 15178                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 15179                                  ;
 15180                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 15181                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 15182                                  
 15183                                  check_volume_id:
 15184 000019AB 57                      		push	di
 15185 000019AC 51                      		push	cx
 15186                                  		
 15187                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15188                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15189                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15190                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15191                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15192                                  		;cld
 15193                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15194 000019AD E8E4FF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15195                                  
 15196 000019B0 F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 15197 000019B2 59                      		pop	cx
 15198 000019B3 5F                      		pop	di
 15199 000019B4 C3                      		retn
 15200                                  
 15201                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15202                                  
 15203                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15204                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 15205                                  ;
 15206                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 15207                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 15208                                  ;
 15209                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 15210                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 15211                                  ;
 15212                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 15213                                  
 15214                                  fat_check:		
 15215 000019B5 50                      		push	ax
 15216 000019B6 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 15217 000019B8 A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 15218 000019BB 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 15219                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 15220 000019BF 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 15221 000019C1 4E                      		dec	si
 15222                                  okret1:					
 15223 000019C2 58                      		pop	ax
 15224 000019C3 C3                      		retn
 15225                                  
 15226                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15227                                  
 15228                                  ; BIOSCODE:1A69h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 15229                                  		;times 7 db 0
 15230                                  
 15231                                  ; BIOSCODE:180Bh (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)	
 15232                                  
 15233                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15234                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 15235                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 15236                                  
 15237                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15238                                  
 15239                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15240                                  		;db 0
 15241                                  
 15242                                  number2div	equ ($-BCode_start)
 15243                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 15244                                  
 15245                                  %if number2mod>0 & number2mod<16
 15246 000019C4 00<rep Ch>              		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 15247                                  %endif
 15248                                  
 15249                                  ;align 16
 15250                                  
 15251                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15252                                  BCODE_END	equ $ - BCode_start
 15253                                  ;SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(BCODE_END>>4)
 15254                                  ; 13/12/2022
 15255                                  SYSINITOFFSET	equ BCODE_END
 15256                                  SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(SYSINITOFFSET>>4)
 15257                                  
 15258                                  ;--- End of DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------
