 31377                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 31378                                  ; SYSCONF.ASM (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 31379                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 31380                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31381                                  
 31382                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31383                                  ;
 31384                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 31385                                  ;
 31386                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 31387                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 31388                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 31389                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 31390                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 31391                                  ;
 31392                                  ;	Output : none
 31393                                  ;
 31394                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 31395                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 31396                                  ;
 31397                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31398                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 31399                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 31400                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 31401                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 31402                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31403                                  
 31404                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31405                                  InitDevLoad:
 31406                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31407                                  	; ds = cs
 31408 000027DC 803E[CB1E]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 31409                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 31410                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 31411 000027E1 741F                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 31412                                  
 31413                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31414                                  ;	cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 31415                                  ;	je	short InitForConv
 31416                                  ;
 31417                                  ;; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 31418                                  ;; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 31419                                  ;; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 31420                                  ;; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 31421                                  ;; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 31422                                  ;; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 31423                                  ;
 31424                                  ;	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 31425                                  ;
 31426                                  ;	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 31427                                  ;	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 31428                                  ;	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 31429                                  ;	pushf
 31430                                  ;	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 31431                                  ;	popf
 31432                                  ;
 31433                                  ;	jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 31434                                  ;
 31435                                  ;	jmp	short InitForHi
 31436                                  
 31437                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31438                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 31439                                  InitForConv:
 31440                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31441                                  	; ds = cs
 31442 000027E3 E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 31443                                  					;  current UMB ?
 31444 000027E6 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 31445 000027E8 E84D04                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 31446 000027EB E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 31447 000027EE 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 31448                                  					;  in low memory
 31449                                  InitForHi:
 31450                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31451                                  	; ds = cs
 31452                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 31453                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 31454                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 31455 000027F0 A1[C11E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 31456 000027F3 8B16[BD1E]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 31457 000027F7 0316[BF1E]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 31458 000027FB EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 31459                                  
 31460                                  InitForLo:
 31461                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31462                                  	; ds = cs
 31463                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 31464 000027FD C606[CB1E]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 31465                                  initforlo_x:
 31466                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31467                                  	; ds = cs
 31468                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 31469                                  					;  we are loading low
 31470                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = start of Low memory
 31471                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 31472 00002802 A1[E003]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 31473 00002805 8B16[A302]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 31474                                  idl1:
 31475 00002809 E86C00                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 31476                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31477                                  	; ds = cs
 31478                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 31479                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 31480                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 31481                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 31482 0000280C A3[B01E]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 31483 0000280F 8916[B21E]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 31484 00002813 C706[B41E]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 31485 00002819 A3[B61E]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 31486 0000281C C3                      	retn
 31487                                  
 31488                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31489                                  ;
 31490                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 31491                                  ;
 31492                                  ;	Input : DevUMBAddr, DevUMBSize, DevUMBFree & DevSize
 31493                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 31494                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in
 31495                                  ;		   current UMB
 31496                                  ;
 31497                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31498                                  
 31499                                  SpaceInUMB:
 31500                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31501                                  	; ds = cs
 31502                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBSize]
 31503                                  	;add	ax,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; End of UMB
 31504                                  	;sub	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; - Free = Remaining space
 31505 0000281D A1[BF1E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBSize]
 31506 00002820 0306[BD1E]              	add	ax,[DevUMBAddr]		; End of UMB
 31507 00002824 2B06[C11E]              	sub	ax,[DevUMBFree]		; - Free = Remaining space
 31508                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31509                                  	;or	ax,ax			; Nospace ?
 31510                                  	;jnz	short spcinumb1
 31511                                  	;stc
 31512                                  	;retn
 31513                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31514 00002828 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1
 31515 0000282B 7205                    	jb	short spcinumb2	; cf=1
 31516                                  spcinumb1:
 31517 0000282D 48                      	dec	ax			; space for sub-arena
 31518                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31519                                  	; ds = cs
 31520 0000282E 3B06[AE1E]              	cmp	ax,[DevSize]
 31521                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSize]		; do we have space ?
 31522                                  spcinumb2:
 31523 00002832 C3                      	retn
 31524                                  
 31525                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31526                                  ;
 31527                                  ; procedure : PrepareMark
 31528                                  ;
 31529                                  ;	Input : AX==Address of MCB (not addr of free space), BX==Size
 31530                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 31531                                  ;
 31532                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31533                                  
 31534                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31535                                  ;
 31536                                  ;PrepareMark:
 31537                                  ;	push	ds
 31538                                  ;	mov	ds,ax
 31539                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 31540                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 31541                                  ;	pop	ds
 31542                                  ;
 31543                                  ;	inc	ax
 31544                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31545                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31546                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 31547                                  ;	retn
 31548                                  
 31549                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31550                                  ;
 31551                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 31552                                  ;
 31553                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 31554                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 31555                                  ;		 the device.
 31556                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 31557                                  ;
 31558                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 31559                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 31560                                  ;	UMB.
 31561                                  ;
 31562                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 31563                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 31564                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 31565                                  ;
 31566                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31567                                  
 31568                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31569                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 31570                                  
 31571                                  GetUMBForDev:
 31572                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31573                                  	; ds = cs
 31574 00002833 BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 31575 00002836 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 31576 00002839 CD21                    	int	21h
 31577                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 31578                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 31579                                  
 31580 0000283B 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 31581 0000283D 742C                    	jz	short gufd_err
 31582                                  
 31583 0000283F 4B                      	dec	bx
 31584                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31585                                  	; ds = cs
 31586 00002840 391E[AE1E]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx
 31587                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 31588 00002844 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 31589 00002846 43                      	inc	bx
 31590                                  
 31591 00002847 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 31592 0000284A CD21                    	int	21h
 31593 0000284C 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 31594

 31634                                  ;
 31635                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 31636                                  ;
 31637                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 31638                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 31639                                  ;
 31640                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 31641                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 31642                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 31643                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 31644                                  ;
 31645                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 31646                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 31647                                  ;
 31648                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31649                                  
 31650                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31651                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 31652

 31660 00002884 40                      	inc	ax

 31663                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 31664                                  
 31665 00002889 50                      	push	ax			; save load addr
 31666 0000288A 2EC536[F803]            	lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 31667                                  
 31668 0000288F 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31669 00002891 FC                      	cld
 31670                                  dsm_again:
 31671 00002892 AC                      	lodsb
 31672 00002893 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 31673 00002895 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 31674 00002897 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31675 00002899 EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 31676                                  isit_slash:

 31678 0000289D 7504                    	jne	short isit_null
 31679 0000289F 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31680 000028A1 EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 31681                                  isit_null:

 31683 000028A5 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 31684 000028A7 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 31685                                  
 31686 000028A9 BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 31687 000028AC B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 31688                                  dsm_next_char:
 31689 000028AF AC                      	lodsb
 31690 000028B0 08C0                    	or	al, al
 31691 000028B2 7407                    	jz	short blankout
 31692 000028B4 3C2E                    	cmp	al, '.'
 31693 000028B6 7403                    	je	short blankout
 31694 000028B8 AA                      	stosb

 31696                                  blankout:

 31748 000028F7 D3E8                    	shr	ax,cl
 31749 000028F9 B10C                    	mov	cl,12
 31750 000028FB D3E2                    	shl	dx,cl

 32091                                  ;
 32092                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 32093                                  ;
 32094                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 32095                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 32096                                  ;
 32097                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 32098                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 32099                                  ;
 32100                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 32101                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 32102                                  ;
 32103                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32104                                  
 32105                                  ; 13/05/2019
 32106                                  
 32107                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32108                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 32109                                  GetHexNum:
 32110 000029FB 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 32111 000029FD 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 32112                                  ghn_next:
 32113 000029FF 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 32114 00002A02 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 32115 00002A05 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 32116 00002A07 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah

 32162                                  ; procedure : GetNibble
 32163                                  ;
 32164                                  ;	Convert one nibble (hex digit) in BL into binary
 32165                                  ;
 32166                                  ;	Retruns binary value in BL
 32167                                  ;
 32168                                  ;	Returns carry if BL contains non-hex digit
 32169                                  ;
 32170                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32171

 32173 00002A3F 80FB30                  	cmp	bl,'0'
 32174                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 32175                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32176 00002A42 72FA                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 32177 00002A44 80FB39                  	cmp	bl,'9'
 32178 00002A47 7704                    	ja	short is_it_hex
 32179 00002A49 80EB30                  	sub	bl,'0'		; clc
 32180 00002A4C C3                      	retn
 32181                                  is_it_hex:
 32182 00002A4D 80FB41                  	cmp	bl,'A'

 32186 00002A52 80FB46                  	cmp	bl,'F'
 32187 00002A55 77E6                    	ja	short gnib_err ; 11/12/2022
 32188 00002A57 80EB37                  	sub	bl,'A'- 10	; clc

 32279                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32280                                  ;
 32281                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 32282                                  ;
 32283                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 32284                                  ;
 32285                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 32286                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 32287                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 32288                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 32289                                  ;				NC
 32290                                  ;			  else 
 32291                                  ;				CY
 32292                                  ;
 32293                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 32294                                  ;
 32295                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32296                                  
 32297                                  umb_allocate:
 32298                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32299                                  	; ds = cs
 32300 00002A9C 50                      	push	ax
 32301 00002A9D B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 32302 00002A9F BAFFFF                  	mov	dx,0FFFFh		; try to allocate largest
 32303                                  					;   possible
 32304                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32305 00002AA2 FF1E[C31E]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 32306                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 32307                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 32308                                  					; the largest UMB
 32309 00002AA6 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 32310 00002AA8 740B                    	jz	short ua_err
 32311                                  	
 32312 00002AAA B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 32313                                  
 32314                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32315 00002AAC FF1E[C31E]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 32316                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 32317                                  
 32318 00002AB0 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1			; Q: was the reqst successful
 32319                                  	;jne	short ua_err		; N: error
 32320                                  	; 14/08/2023
 32321 00002AB3 7601                    	jna	short ua_done ; if ax=1 then cf=0, else cf=1 (ax=0)
 32322                                  ua_err:
 32323 00002AB5 F9                      	stc	
 32324                                  
 32325                                  	;clc
 32326                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32327                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32328                                  	; cf=0
 32329                                  	;clc 
 32330                                  ua_done:
 32331 00002AB6 58                      	pop	ax
 32332 00002AB7 C3                      	retn
 32333                                  	; 14/08/2023
 32334                                  ;ua_err:
 32335                                  	;stc
 32336                                  	;jmp	short ua_done

 32338                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32339                                  ;
 32340                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 32341                                  ;
 32342                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 32343                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 32344                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 32345                                  ;			; DS = data
 32346                                  ;
 32347                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 32348                                  ;
 32349                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 32350                                  ;
 32351                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32352                                  
 32353                                  umb_insert:
 32354 00002AB8 1E                      	push	ds
 32355                                  
 32356                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32357                                  	; ds = cs
 32358                                  
 32359                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32360 00002AB9 8E1E[DA1E]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 32361                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 32362 00002ABD 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 32363 00002AC1 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 32364 00002AC3 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32365                                  ui_next:
 32366 00002AC5 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 32367                                  					;    new block
 32368 00002AC7 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 32369                                  					; Q: is current block the
 32370                                  					;    last
 32371 00002AC9 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32372 00002ACF 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 32373                                  					; N: get next block
 32374 00002AD1 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 32375                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 32376 00002AD3 E8E200                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32377 00002AD6 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 32378                                  
 32379                                  ui_insert:
 32380 00002AD8 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 32381 00002ADA 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 32382                                  
 32383 00002ADB 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 32384 00002ADD F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 32385                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 32386 00002ADF C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32387                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 32388 00002AE4 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32389                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 32390 00002AEA 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 32391                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 32392 00002AEE C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32393                                  
 32394                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 32395                                  
 32396 00002AF4 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 32397 00002AF6 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32398 00002AFC 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 32399                                  					; mark as free
 32400 00002B03 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 32401                                  					; start & end of new block
 32402 00002B06 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 32403                                  
 32404                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 32405                                  	
 32406 00002B0B 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 32407 00002B0D 43                      	inc	bx
 32408 00002B0E 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 32409 00002B10 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 32410                                  
 32411                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 32412                                  					; this block
 32413 00002B11 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 32414                                  	
 32415 00002B13 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32416 00002B19 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32417 00002B20 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32418 00002B24 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32419                                  
 32420 00002B2B EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 32421                                  
 32422                                  ui_append:
 32423                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 32424 00002B2D 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 32425 00002B32 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 32426                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 32427                                  					; block for the next arena.
 32428                                  	; 13/05/2019
 32429 00002B38 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32430                                  
 32431 00002B3E 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 32432 00002B40 40                      	inc	ax
 32433 00002B41 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 32434                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 32435 00002B43 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 32436                                  
 32437 00002B45 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 32438                                  
 32439 00002B47 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32440 00002B4D 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32441 00002B54 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32442 00002B58 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 32443                                  
 32444                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 32445 00002B5F 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 32446 00002B61 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 32447 00002B67 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 32448                                  					; mark as free
 32449 00002B6E 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 32450 00002B6F 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 32451                                  ui_done:
 32452                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 32453 00002B74 1F                      	pop	ds
 32454                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 32455                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 32456 00002B75 C3                      	retn
 32457                                  
 32458                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32459                                  
 32460                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32461                                  ;
 32462                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 32463                                  ;
 32464                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 32465                                  ;	iff it's free.  Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 32466                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 32467                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 32468                                  ;
 32469                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 32470                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 32471                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IFF not at end
 32472                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 32473                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 32474                                  ;
 32475                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32476                                  
 32477                                  umb_coalesce:
 32478                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32479                                  	; ds = cs
 32480 00002B76 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 32481                                  
 32482 00002B77 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 32483                                  
 32484                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32485                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32486 00002B79 8E06[DA1E]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 32487 00002B7D 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 32488                                  uc_nextfree:
 32489 00002B82 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32490 00002B84 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 32491                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 32492 00002B86 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 32493 00002B8B 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 32494                                  					; N: get next arena
 32495 00002B8D E82100                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 32496 00002B90 72E2                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 32497 00002B92 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 32498                                  uc_again:
 32499 00002B94 E81A00                  	call	get_next		; ES, AX <- next block
 32500 00002B97 72DB                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 32501                                  uc_check:
 32502 00002B99 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 32503 00002B9E 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 32504                                  					; Y: coalesce
 32505 00002BA0 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 32506 00002BA5 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 32507                                  	;add	[3],cx
 32508 00002BA6 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 32509 00002BAA 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 32510 00002BAD 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 32511 00002BAF EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 32512                                  
 32513                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32514                                  ;uc_done:
 32515                                  	;retn
 32516                                  
 32517                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32518                                  ;
 32519                                  ;**	get_next - Find Next item in Arena
 32520                                  ;
 32521                                  ;	ENTRY	dS - pointer to block head
 32522                                  ;	EXIT	AX,ES - pointers to next head
 32523                                  ;		'C' set if arena damaged
 32524                                  ;
 32525                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32526                                  
 32527                                  	; 01/11/2022
 32528                                  get_next:
 32529 00002BB1 803E00005A              	cmp	byte [0],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32530 00002BB6 740A                    	je	short gn_err
 32531                                  _get_next_:
 32532 00002BB8 8CD8                    	mov     ax,ds                   ; ax=current block
 32533 00002BBA 03060300                	add     ax,[ARENA.SIZE]		; ax=ax + current block length
 32534 00002BBE 40                      	inc     ax                      ; remember that header!
 32535 00002BBF 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32536                                  	;clc
 32537                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32538                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32539                                  	; cf=0
 32540                                  	;clc
 32541 00002BC1 C3                      	retn
 32542                                  gn_err:
 32543 00002BC2 F9                      	stc
 32544                                  	; 11/12/2022	
 32545                                  lfu_err:	 ; cf=1
 32546 00002BC3 C3                      	retn
 32547                                  
 32548                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32549                                  ;
 32550                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB
 32551                                  ;
 32552                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32553                                  
 32554                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32555                                  	; (SYSINIT:2F81h)
 32556                                  LinkFirstUMB:
 32557                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32558                                  	; ds = cs
 32559 00002BC4 E8D5FE                  	call	umb_allocate
 32560 00002BC7 72FA                    	jc	short lfu_err  ; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 32561                                  
 32562                                  ; bx = segment of allocated UMB
 32563                                  ; dx = size of UMB
 32564                                  
 32565                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32566                                  	; ds = cs
 32567                                  
 32568 00002BC9 CD12                    	int	12h			; ax = size of memory
 32569 00002BCB B106                    	mov	cl,6
 32570 00002BCD D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; ax = size in paragraphs
 32571                                  
 32572 00002BCF 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx = size in paras
 32573 00002BD1 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = - size of unused block
 32574                                  
 32575 00002BD3 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 32576                                  
 32577 00002BD5 83E901                  	sub	cx,1			; cx = first umb_arena
 32578 00002BD8 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; es = first umb_arena
 32579                                  	
 32580 00002BDA 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32581 00002BE0 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32582                                  					
 32583 00002BE7 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32584 00002BEB 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32585                                  
 32586                                  ; put in the arena for the first UMB
 32587                                  
 32588 00002BF2 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es has first free umb seg
 32589 00002BF4 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32590 00002BFA 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0	
 32591                                  					; mark as free 
 32592 00002C01 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 32593 00002C02 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 32594                                  
 32595                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32596                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32597 00002C07 8E06[DA1E]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData] ; ds = cs
 32598 00002C0B BF8C00                  	mov	di,UMB_ARENA ; 8Ch

 32642                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 32643                                  ;
 32644                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 32645                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool

 32654 00002C3D 7421                    	je	short su_exit
 32655 00002C3F 06                      	push	es
 32656 00002C40 53                      	push	bx
 32657                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32658                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 32659                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 32660                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 32661 00002C41 8B1E[C11E]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 32662 00002C45 2B1E[BD1E]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 32663 00002C49 8E06[BD1E]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 32664                                  	
 32665 00002C4D B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 32666 00002C50 CD21                    	int	21h
 32667                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 32668                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 32669                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 32670 00002C52 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32671 00002C54 48                      	dec	ax
 32672 00002C55 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32673 00002C57 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 32674 00002C5E 5B                      	pop	bx

 32701                                  ulu_next:

 32705 00002C7F 7404                    	je	short ulu_found

 32716                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 32717                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 32718                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 32719                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32720                                  
 32721                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 32722                                  ;
 32723                                  ; Summary:
 32724                                  ;
 32725                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 32726                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 32727                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 32728                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 32729                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 32730                                  ;
 32731                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 32732                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 32733                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 32734                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 32735                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 32736                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 32737                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 32738                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 32739                                  ;
 32740                                  ; Example:
 32741                                  ;
 32742                                  ;   [menu]
 32743                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 32744                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 32745                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 32746                                  ;
 32747                                  ;   [network]
 32748                                  ;   include misc
 32749                                  ;   device=foo
 32750                                  ;
 32751                                  ;   [misc]
 32752                                  ;   device=bar
 32753                                  ;   include alternate
 32754                                  ;
 32755                                  ;   [alternate]
 32756                                  ;   device=tar
 32757                                  ;
 32758                                  ;
 32759                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 32760                                  ;
 32761                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 32762                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 32763                                  ;
 32764                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 32765                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 32766                                  ;   following order:
 32767                                  ;
 32768                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 32769                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 32770                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 32771                                  ;
 32772                                  
 32773                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 32774                                  
 32775                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 32776                                  
 32777                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 32778                                  
 32779                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 32780                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 32781                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 32782                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 32783                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 32784                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128
 32785                                  
 32786                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32787                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32788                                  
 32789                                  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3E78h
 32790                                  
 32791                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32792                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3054h
 32793                                  
 32794 00002C8D 00                      insert_blank:	db 	0

 32908                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32909                                  ;
 32910                                  ; procedure : parseline
 32911                                  ;
 32912                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 32913                                  ;
 32914                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32915                                  
 32916                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32917                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 32918                                  
 32919                                  parseline:
 32920                                  	push	ds
 32921                                  
 32922                                  	push	cs
 32923                                  	pop	ds
 32924                                  
 32925                                  nextswtch:
 32926                                  	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 32927                                  	je	short done_line
 32928                                  	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 32929                                  	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 32930                                  
 32931                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 32932                                  
 32933                                  	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 32934                                  	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 32935                                  	cmp	al,'/'
 32936                                  	je	short getparm
 32937                                  	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 32938                                  	jmp	short exitpl
 32939                                  
 32940                                  getparm:
 32941                                  	call	check_switch
 32942                                  	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 32943                                  	jc	short swterr
 32944                                  getnext:
 32945                                  	call	getchr
 32946                                  	jc	short done_line
 32947                                  	jmp	short nextswtch
 32948                                  swterr:
 32949                                  	jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 32950                                  
 32951                                  done_line:
 32952                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32953                                  	test	byte [switches],flagdrive ; 8
 32954                                  	;test	word [switches],flagdrive ; 8 ; see if drive specified
 32955                                  	jnz	short okay
 32956                                  	stc				; mark error no-drive-specified
 32957                                  	jmp	short exitpl
 32958                                  
 32959                                  okay:
 32960                                  	mov	ax,[switches]
 32961                                  	and	ax,0003h	    ; get flag bits for changeline and non-rem
 32962                                  	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],ax
 32963                                  	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_TRACKTABLEENTRIES],0
 32964                                  	;clc			    ; everything is fine
 32965                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32966                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32967                                  	; cf=0
 32968                                  	;clc
 32969                                  	call	setdeviceparameters
 32970                                  exitpl:
 32971                                  	pop	ds
 32972                                  	retn
 32973                                  put_back:
 32974                                  	inc	word [count]		; one more char to scan
 32975                                  	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 32976                                  	jmp	short done_line
 32977                                  
 32978                                  %endif
 32979                                  
 32980                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32981                                  ;
 32982                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 32983                                  ;
 32984                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 32985                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 32986                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 32987                                  ; error.
 32988                                  ;
 32989                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32990                                  
 32991                                  check_switch:
 32992 00002CE1 E81BFA                  	call	getchr
 32993                                  	;jc	short err_check
 32994 00002CE4 724E                    	jc	short err_chk
 32995 00002CE6 24DF                            and     al,0DFh                 ; convert it to upper case
 32996 00002CE8 3C41                    	cmp	al,'A'
 32997                                  	;jb	short err_check
 32998 00002CEA 7248                    	jb	short err_chk ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32999 00002CEC 3C5A                    	cmp	al,'Z'
 33000 00002CEE 7743                    	ja	short err_check
 33001                                  
 33002 00002CF0 06                      	push	es
 33003                                  
 33004 00002CF1 0E                      	push	cs
 33005 00002CF2 07                      	pop	es
 33006                                  
 33007 00002CF3 8A0E[EA36]              	mov	cl,[switchlist]		; get number of valid switches
 33008 00002CF7 B500                    	mov	ch,0
 33009 00002CF9 BF[EB36]                	mov	di,1+switchlist		; point to string of valid switches
 33010 00002CFC F2AE                    	repne	scasb
 33011                                  
 33012 00002CFE 07                      	pop	es
 33013 00002CFF 7532                    	jnz	short err_check
 33014                                  
 33015 00002D01 B80100                  	mov	ax,1
 33016 00002D04 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; set bit to indicate switch
 33017 00002D06 8B1E[5736]              	mov	bx,[switches]		; get switches so far
 33018 00002D0A 09C3                    	or	bx,ax			; save this with other switches
 33019 00002D0C 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 33020                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33021 00002D0E A8F8                    	test	al,switchnum ; 0F8h
 33022                                  	;test	ax,switchnum ; 0F8h	; test against switches that require number to follow
 33023 00002D10 741E                    	jz	short done_swtch
 33024                                  
 33025 00002D12 E8EAF9                  	call	getchr
 33026 00002D15 721A                    	jc	short err_swtch
 33027                                  
 33028 00002D17 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 33029 00002D19 7516                    	jne	short err_swtch
 33030                                  
 33031 00002D1B E8E1F9                  	call	getchr
 33032 00002D1E 53                      	push	bx			; preserve switches
 33033                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33034                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],' '	; allow space separators
 33035                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33036                                  	; ds = cs
 33037 00002D1F C606[2A03]20            	mov	byte [sepchr],' '
 33038 00002D24 E8D803                  	call	getnum
 33039                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 33040                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33041 00002D27 C606[2A03]00            	mov	byte [sepchr],0
 33042 00002D2C 5B                      	pop	bx			; restore switches
 33043                                  
 33044                                  ; because getnum does not consider carriage-return or line-feed as ok, we do
 33045                                  ; not check for carry set here. if there is an error, it will be detected
 33046                                  ; further on (hopefully).
 33047                                  
 33048 00002D2D E80500                  	call	process_num
 33049                                  
 33050                                  done_swtch:
 33051                                  	;clc
 33052                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33053                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33054                                  	; cf=0
 33055                                  	;clc
 33056 00002D30 C3                      	retn
 33057                                  
 33058                                  err_swtch:
 33059 00002D31 31CB                    	xor	bx,cx			; remove this switch from the records
 33060                                  err_check:
 33061 00002D33 F9                      	stc
 33062                                  err_chk:
 33063 00002D34 C3                      	retn
 33064                                  
 33065                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33066                                  ;
 33067                                  ; procedure : process_num
 33068                                  ;
 33069                                  ; this routine takes the switch just input, and the number following (if any),
 33070                                  ; and sets the value in the appropriate variable. if the number input is zero
 33071                                  ; then it does nothing - it assumes the default value that is present in the
 33072                                  ; variable at the beginning. zero is ok for form factor and drive, however.
 33073                                  ;
 33074                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33075                                  
 33076                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33077                                  	; (SYSINIT:3156h)
 33078                                  process_num:
 33079 00002D35 850E[5736]              	test	[switches],cx		; if this switch has been done before,
 33080 00002D39 752B                    	jnz	short done_ret		; ignore this one.
 33081                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33082 00002D3B F6C108                  	test	cl,flagdrive ; 8
 33083                                  	;test	cx,flagdrive ; 8
 33084 00002D3E 7404                    	jz	short try_f
 33085 00002D40 A2[5636]                	mov	byte [drive],al
 33086                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33087                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 33088                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33089                                  	; cf=0
 33090 00002D43 C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 33091                                  try_f:
 33092                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33093 00002D44 F6C180                  	test	cl,flagff ; 80h
 33094                                  	;test	cx,flagff ; 80h
 33095 00002D47 7404                    	jz	short try_t
 33096                                  
 33097                                  ; ensure that we do not get bogus form factors that are not supported
 33098                                  
 33099                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+1],al
 33100 00002D49 A2[2F35]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],al
 33101                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33102                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 33103                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33104                                  	; cf=0
 33105 00002D4C C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 33106                                  try_t:
 33107 00002D4D 09C0                    	or	ax,ax
 33108 00002D4F 7415                    	jz	short done_ret		; if number entered was 0, assume default value
 33109                                  	; 12/12/2022

 33152                                  ; procedure : parseline
 33153                                  ;
 33154                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 33155                                  ;
 33156                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33157                                  
 33158                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33159                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 33160                                  parseline:
 33161                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33162                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 33163                                  
 33164                                  	;push	ds ; *
 33165                                  
 33166                                  	;push	cs ; *
 33167                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 33168                                  
 33169                                  nextswtch:
 33170 00002D67 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 33171 00002D69 741C                    	je	short done_line
 33172 00002D6B 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 33173 00002D6D 7421                    	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 33174                                  
 33175                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 33176                                  
 33177 00002D6F 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 33178 00002D71 760F                    	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 33179 00002D73 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'

 33181 00002D77 F9                      	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 33182                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 33183                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33184                                  swterr:
 33185 00002D78 C3                      	retn
 33186                                  
 33187                                  getparm:
 33188 00002D79 E865FF                  	call	check_switch
 33189 00002D7C 891E[5736]              	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 33190 00002D80 72F6                    	jc	short swterr
 33191                                  getnext:
 33192 00002D82 E87AF9                  	call	getchr
 33193                                  	;jc	short done_line
 33194                                  	;jmp	short nextswtch
 33195                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33196 00002D85 73E0                    	jnc	short nextswtch
 33197                                  ;swterr:
 33198                                  	;jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 33199                                  
 33200                                  done_line:
 33201                                  	; 12/12/2022

 33203                                  	;test	word [switches],flagdrive ; 8 ; see if drive specified
 33204 00002D8C 750C                    	jnz	short okay

 33206                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 33207                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33208 00002D8F C3                      	retn
 33209                                  
 33210                                  ;exitpl:
 33211                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33212                                  	; ds = cs
 33213                                  	;;pop	ds ; *
 33214                                  	;retn
 33215                                  
 33216                                  put_back:

 33218 00002D94 FF0E[D603]              	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 33219 00002D98 EBED                    	jmp	short done_line
 33220

 33240                                  ;
 33241                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 33242                                  ;
 33243                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 33244                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 33245                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 33246                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 33247                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 33248                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 33249                                  ;
 33250                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 33251                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 33252                                  ;
 33253                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 33254                                  ;
 33255                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33256                                  
 33257                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33258                                  
 33259                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33260                                  setdeviceparameters:
 33261                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33262                                  	; ds = cs
 33263                                  	
 33264 00002DA9 06                      	push	es
 33265                                  
 33266 00002DAA 0E                      	push	cs
 33267 00002DAB 07                      	pop	es
 33268                                  
 33269 00002DAC 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 33270 00002DAE 8A1E[2F35]              	mov	bl,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 33271 00002DB2 80FB00                  	cmp	bl,DEV_5INCH ; 0
 33272 00002DB5 7506                    	jne	short got_80
 33273                                  
 33274 00002DB7 C706[3235]2800          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 33275                                  							; 48 tpi=40 cyl
 33276                                  got_80:
 33277 00002DBD D1E3                    	shl	bx,1			; get index into bpb table
 33278 00002DBF 8BB7[D636]              	mov	si,[bpbtable+bx]	; get address of bpb
 33279                                  
 33280                                  	;mov	di,deviceparameters+7	
 33281                                  	; 02/11/2022
 33282 00002DC3 BF[3535]                	mov	di,deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB ; es:di -> bpb
 33283 00002DC6 B91F00                  	mov	cx,A_BPB.size ; 31
 33284 00002DC9 FC                      	cld
 33285                                  	;repe	movsb
 33286                                  	; 02/11/2022
 33287 00002DCA F3A4                    	rep	movsb
 33288                                  
 33289 00002DCC 07                      	pop	es
 33290                                  
 33291                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33292 00002DCD F606[5736]20            	test	byte [switches],flagseclim ; 20h
 33293                                  	;test	word [switches],flagseclim ; 20h
 33294 00002DD2 7406                    	jz	short see_heads
 33295

 33297                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+20],ax

 33299

 33301                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33302 00002DDA F606[5736]40            	test	byte [switches],flagheads ; 40h
 33303                                  	;test	word [switches],flagheads ; 40h
 33304 00002DDF 7406                    	jz	short heads_not_altered
 33305                                  
 33306 00002DE1 A1[5236]                	mov	ax,[hlim]
 33307                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+22],ax	
 33308 00002DE4 A3[4435]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax
 33309                                  
 33310                                  heads_not_altered:
 33311                                  
 33312                                  ; set up correct media descriptor byte and sectors/cluster
 33313                                  ;   sectors/cluster is always 2 except for any one sided disk or 1.44M
 33314                                  
 33315                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+9],2
 33316                                  	; 02/11/2022
 33317                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],2
 33318                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33319 00002DE7 B80200                  	mov	ax,2	
 33320 00002DEA A2[3735]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 2
 33321                                  
 33322 00002DED B3F0                    	mov	bl,0F0h			; get default mediabyte
 33323                                  
 33324                                  ;	preload the mediadescriptor from the bpb into bh for convenient access
 33325                                  
 33326                                  	;mov	bh,[deviceparameters+17]
 33327                                  	; 02/11/2022
 33328 00002DEF 8A3E[3F35]              	mov	bh,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 33329                                  
 33330                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33331                                  	; ax = 2
 33332 00002DF3 3906[4435]              	cmp	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax ; >2 heads?
 33333                                  	;cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],2 ; >2 heads?
 33334 00002DF7 773C                    	ja	short got_correct_mediad ; just use default if heads>2
 33335                                  
 33336 00002DF9 7524                    	jne	short only_one_head	; one head, do one head stuff
 33337                                  
 33338                                  ;	two head drives will use the mediadescriptor from the bpb
 33339                                  
 33340 00002DFB 88FB                    	mov	bl,bh			; get mediadescriptor from bpb
 33341                                  
 33342                                  ;	two sided drives have two special cases to look for. One is
 33343                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses
 33344                                  ;	   a mediaid of 0fch. The other is 1.44M, which uses only
 33345                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 33346                                  
 33347                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 33348                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other
 33349                                  ;	   type of 2 headed drive is all set.
 33350                                  
 33351 00002DFD 833E[4235]12            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],18
 33352 00002E02 7509                    	jne	short not_144m
 33353 00002E04 833E[3235]50            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],80
 33354 00002E09 7502                    	jne	short not_144m
 33355                                  
 33356                                  ;	We've got cyl=80, heads=2, secpertrack=18. Set cluster size to 1.
 33357                                  
 33358 00002E0B EB24                    	jmp	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 33359                                  
 33360                                  ;	check for 320K
 33361                                  
 33362                                  not_144m:
 33363 00002E0D 833E[3235]28            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 33364 00002E12 7521                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 33365 00002E14 833E[4235]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 33366 00002E19 751A                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 33367                                  
 33368 00002E1B B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh
 33369 00002E1D EB16                    	jmp	short got_correct_mediad
 33370                                  
 33371                                  only_one_head:
 33372                                  
 33373                                  ;	if we don't have a 360K drive, then just go use 0f0h as media descr.
 33374                                  
 33375 00002E1F 803E[2F35]00            	cmp	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],DEV_5INCH ; 0
 33376 00002E24 740B                    	je	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 33377                                  
 33378                                  ;	single sided 360K drive uses either 0fch or 0feh, depending on
 33379                                  ;	  whether sectorspertrack is 8 or 9. For our purposes, anything
 33380                                  ;	  besides 8 will be considered 0fch
 33381                                  
 33382 00002E26 B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh			; single sided 9 sector media id
 33383 00002E28 833E[4235]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 33384                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33385 00002E2D 7502                    	jne	short got_one_secperclus_drive ; okay if anything besides 8
 33386                                  
 33387 00002E2F B3FE                    	mov	bl,0FEh			; 160K mediaid
 33388                                  
 33389                                  ;	we've either got a one sided drive, or a 1.44M drive
 33390                                  ;	  either case we'll use 1 sector per cluster instead of 2
 33391                                  
 33392                                  got_one_secperclus_drive:
 33393                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33394                                  	; ax = 2
 33395 00002E31 48                      	dec	ax  ; ax = 1
 33396 00002E32 A2[3735]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 1
 33397                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],1
 33398                                  
 33399                                  got_correct_mediad:
 33400 00002E35 881E[3F35]              	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR],bl
 33401                                  
 33402                                  ;	 Calculate the correct number of Total Sectors on medium
 33403                                  
 33404 00002E39 A1[3235]                	mov	ax,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 33405 00002E3C F726[4435]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS]
 33406 00002E40 F726[4235]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK]
 33407 00002E44 A3[3D35]                	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS],ax
 33408 00002E47 F8                      	clc				; we currently return no errors
 33409                                  
 33410 00002E48 C3                      	retn
 33411                                  
 33412                                  ;	M047 -- end rewritten routine

 33487

 33489                                  ;

 33509 00002E8B 9F                      	lahf

 33511 00002E8E 9E                      	sahf

 33530                                  ;

 33532                                  ;

 33534                                  ;;   set the high bit of the ASCII command code (CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY) that is

 33553                                  no_delim:

 33567                                  _skipline:

 33572                                  gotcom:

 33575                                  ; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33576                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 33577                                  ;

 33850                                  	;mov	al, [es:si]

 33855                                  noget:
 33856 00002FFF 59                      	pop	cx
