 34927                                  ;   NOTES
 34928                                  ;       This differs from "find_block" in that it searches the ENTIRE
 34929                                  ;       config.sys image, not merely the remaining portion, and that it
 34930                                  ;       takes a pointer to block name that is *elsewhere* in the image
 34931                                  ;       (ie, ES) as opposed to some string constant in our own segment (DS).
 34932                                  ;
 34933                                  ;   HISTORY
 34934                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34935                                  ;
 34936                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34937                                  
 34938                                  srch_block:	          ; returns BX -> named block in CONFIG.SYS
 34939                                          push    ax              ;
 34940                                          push    cx              ;
 34941                                          mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 34942                                          push    si              ;
 34943                                          sub     si,si           ;
 34944                                          push    ds              ;
 34945                                          push    es              ;
 34946                                          pop     ds              ;
 34947                                          call    find_block      ;
 34948                                          mov     di,si           ;
 34949                                          mov     bx,cx           ;
 34950                                          pop     ds              ;
 34951                                          pop     si              ;
 34952                                          pop     cx              ;
 34953                                          pop     ax              ;
 34954                                  find_exit: ; 16/04/2019
 34955                                          retn			;
 34956                                  
 34957                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34958                                  ;
 34959                                  ;   find_block:  searches rest of config.sys for block name @DS:DI
 34960                                  ;
 34961                                  ;   INPUT
 34962                                  ;    DS:DI -> block name to find
 34963                                  ;    ES:SI -> remainder of config.sys image
 34964                                  ;       CX == remaining size of config.sys image
 34965                                  ;
 34966                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34967                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found (also, CF set if EOF)
 34968                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the search stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 34969                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 34970                                  ;
 34971                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34972                                  ;       AX
 34973                                  ;
 34974                                  ;   NOTES
 34975                                  ;       This differs from "srch_block" in that it searches only the
 34976                                  ;       remaining portion of the config.sys image and leaves SI and CX
 34977                                  ;       pointing to where the search left off, and that it takes a pointer
 34978                                  ;       to search string in our own segment (DS:DI instead of ES:DI).
 34979                                  ;
 34980                                  ;   HISTORY
 34981                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34982                                  ;
 34983                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34984                                  
 34985                                  find_block:
 34986                                          call    get_char        ; get line code
 34987                                          jc	short find_exit	; end of file
 34988                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY
 34989                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; beginning of a block?
 34990                                          je	short check_line ; no
 34991                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE
 34992                                          jne	short next_line	;
 34993                                          or	byte [cs:config_multi],1
 34994                                          jmp     short next_line ;
 34995                                  check_line:
 34996                                          or      byte [cs:config_multi],1
 34997                                          call    comp_names      ; compare block names
 34998                                          jbe	short find_exit	; end of file, or names matched
 34999                                  next_line:
 35000                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; no, so skip to next line
 35001                                          jmp	short find_block  ;
 35002                                  ;find_exit:
 35003                                  ;	retn
 35004                                  
 35005                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35006                                  ;
 35007                                  ;   comp_names:  compares keyword @DS:DI to position in config.sys @ES:SI
 35008                                  ;
 35009                                  ;   INPUT
 35010                                  ;    DS:DI -> keyword to compare
 35011                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35012                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35013                                  ;
 35014                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35015                                  ;       ZF flag set, if match (also, CF set if EOF)
 35016                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the comparison stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 35017                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35018                                  ;
 35019                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35020                                  ;       AX
 35021                                  ;
 35022                                  ;   NOTES
 35023                                  ;       None
 35024                                  ;
 35025                                  ;   HISTORY
 35026                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35027                                  ;
 35028                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35029                                  
 35030                                  comp_names:
 35031                                          push    di              ;
 35032                                  comp_loop:                      ;
 35033                                          call    get_char        ;
 35034                                          jc	short comp_exit	;
 35035                                          call    any_delim       ; is next character a delimiter?
 35036                                          mov     ah,[di]         ; (get next character we're supposed to match)
 35037                                          je	short comp_almost ; yes, it *could* be a match
 35038                                          inc     di              ;
 35039                                          and     ax,~2020h ; 0DFDFh 
 35040                                  				; BUGBUG -- assumes both names are alphanumeric -JTP
 35041                                          cmp     al,ah           ; match?
 35042                                          je	short comp_loop ; yes, keep looking at the characters
 35043                                          clc                     ; prevent erroneous eof indication: clear carry
 35044                                  comp_exit:                      ;
 35045                                          pop     di              ;
 35046                                          retn			;
 35047                                  comp_almost:                    ;
 35048                                          xchg    al,ah           ; we don't know for sure if it's a match
 35049                                          call    any_delim       ; until we verify that the second string has
 35050                                          xchg    al,ah           ; been exhausted also...
 35051                                          jmp     comp_exit       ; if we are, this call to any_delim will tell...
 35052                                  
 35053                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35054                                  
 35055                                  comp_names_safe:
 35056                                          push    ax
 35057                                          push    cx
 35058                                          push	si
 35059                                          push    ds
 35060                                          push    cs
 35061                                          pop     ds
 35062                                          call    comp_names
 35063                                          pop     ds
 35064                                  	pop	si
 35065                                          pop     cx
 35066                                          pop     ax
 35067                                          retn
 35068                                  
 35069                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35070                                  ;
 35071                                  ;   print_item:  display menu item #BL
 35072                                  ;
 35073                                  ;   INPUT
 35074                                  ;       BL == menu item # to display
 35075                                  ;
 35076                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35077                                  ;       Menu item displayed, with appropriate highlighting if BL == bDefBlock
 35078                                  ;
 35079                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35080                                  ;       None
 35081                                  ;
 35082                                  ;   NOTES
 35083                                  ;       This function saves/restores the current cursor position, so you
 35084                                  ;       needn't worry about it.
 35085                                  ;
 35086                                  ;   HISTORY
 35087                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35088                                  ;
 35089                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35090                                  
 35091                                  print_item:		; prints menu item #BL (1 to N)
 35092                                          push    ax              ;
 35093                                          push    bx              ;
 35094                                          push    cx              ;
 35095                                          push    dx              ;
 35096                                          push    si              ;
 35097                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 35098                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; always page zero
 35099                                          int     10h             ; DH/DL = row/column
 35100                                          push    dx              ; save it
 35101                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 35102                                          mov     dh,bl           ;
 35103                                          add     dh,3            ;
 35104                                          mov     dl,5            ;
 35105                                          int     10h             ; set cursor position for correct row/col
 35106                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 35107                                          add     al,'0'          ; convert menu item # to ASCII digit
 35108                                          mov     ah,[bMenuColor] ; normal attribute
 35109                                          cmp     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; are we printing the current block?
 35110                                          jne	short print_other ; no
 35111                                          or      ah,70h          ; yes, set bgnd color to white
 35112                                          mov     ch,ah           ;
 35113                                          mov     cl,4            ;
 35114                                          rol     ch,cl           ;
 35115                                          cmp     ch,ah           ; are fgnd/bgnd the same?
 35116                                          jne	short print_other ; no
 35117                                          xor     ah,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 35118                                  print_other:                    ;
 35119                                          mov     bh,0            ;
 35120                                          add     bx,bx           ;
 35121                                          mov     di,[aoffBlockDesc+bx]
 35122                                          mov     bl,ah           ; put the attribute in the correct register now
 35123                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; get correct video page #
 35124                                          mov     ah,09h          ; write char/attr
 35125                                          mov     cx,1            ;
 35126                                          int     10h             ;
 35127                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 35128                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35129                                          int     10h             ;
 35130                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+'.'    ;
 35131                                          mov	ax,092Eh
 35132                                  	int     10h             ; display '.'
 35133                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 35134                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35135                                          int     10h             ;
 35136                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+' '    ;
 35137                                          mov	ax,0920h
 35138                                  	int     10h             ; display ' '
 35139                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 35140                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35141                                          int     10h             ;
 35142                                          push    es              ;
 35143                                  print_loop:                     ;
 35144                                          mov     al,[es:di]	; get a character of the description
 35145                                          inc     di              ;
 35146                                          cmp     al,TAB ; 9	; substitute spaces for tabs
 35147                                          jne	short print_nontab ;
 35148                                          mov     al,' '          ;
 35149                                  print_nontab:                   ;
 35150                                          cmp     al,' '          ;
 35151                                          jb	short print_done ; stop at the 1st character < space
 35152                                          cmp     al,'$'          ;
 35153                                          je	short print_done ; also stop on $
 35154                                          mov     ah,09h          ; display function #
 35155                                          int     10h             ;
 35156                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 35157                                          cmp     dl,78           ; far enough?
 35158                                          jae	short print_done ; yes
 35159                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35160                                          int     10h             ;
 35161                                          jmp     print_loop      ;
 35162                                  print_done:                     ;
 35163                                          pop     es              ;
 35164                                          pop     dx              ;
 35165                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35166                                          int     10h             ; restore previous row/col
 35167                                          pop     si              ;
 35168                                          pop     dx              ;
 35169                                          pop     cx              ;
 35170                                          pop     bx              ;
 35171                                          pop     ax              ;
 35172                                          retn			;
 35173                                  
 35174                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35175                                  ;
 35176                                  ;   select_item:  wait for user to select menu item, with time-out
 35177                                  ;
 35178                                  ;   INPUT
 35179                                  ;       None
 35180                                  ;
 35181                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35182                                  ;       BX == menu item # (1-N), or -1 for clean boot
 35183                                  ;       Selected menu item highlighted
 35184                                  ;       Cursor positioned beneath menu, ready for tty-style output now
 35185                                  ;
 35186                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35187                                  ;       None
 35188                                  ;
 35189                                  ;   NOTES
 35190                                  ;       None
 35191                                  ;
 35192                                  ;   HISTORY
 35193                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35194                                  ;
 35195                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35196                                  
 35197                                  select_item:		; returns digit value in BX (trashes AX/CX/DX)
 35198                                          mov     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; BL will be the default block #
 35199                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 35200                                          call    disp_num        ;
 35201                                          call    show_status     ; display current interactive status
 35202                                          cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 35203                                          je	short input_key	; no time-out, just go to input
 35204                                          mov     ah,GET_TIME ; 2Ch
 35205                                          int     21h             ;
 35206                                          mov     bh,dh           ; BH = initial # of seconds
 35207                                  check_time:
 35208                                          mov     al,[secTimeOut] ;
 35209                                          sub     al,[secElapsed] ;
 35210                                          jae	short show_time	;
 35211                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],2  ; disable all further prompting
 35212                                          mov     byte [secElapsed],0
 35213                                          jmp	select_done	; time's up!
 35214                                  show_time:
 35215                                          push    bx              ;
 35216                                          mov     bl,al           ; save # in BL
 35217                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 35218                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 35219                                          int     10h             ;
 35220                                          push    dx              ;
 35221                                  	add	dl,8		; move cursor to the right
 35222                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 35223                                          int     10h             ;
 35224                                          mov     dx,_$TimeOut
 35225                                          call    print           ; print the "Time remaining: " prompt
 35226                                          mov     al,bl           ; recover # from BL
 35227                                          cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 35228                                          mov     cl,10           ;
 35229                                          div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 35230                                          mov     cl,ah           ;
 35231                                          add     al,'0'          ;
 35232                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 35233                                          int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit
 35234                                          mov     al,cl           ;
 35235                                          add     al,'0'          ;
 35236                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 35237                                          int     10h             ; write TTY ones digit
 35238                                          pop     dx
 35239                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position back to where it was
 35240                                          int     10h             ;
 35241                                          pop     bx              ;
 35242                                  input_key:
 35243                                          mov     ah,RAW_CON_IO ; 6
 35244                                          mov     dl,0FFh         ; input request
 35245                                          int     21h             ;
 35246                                          jnz	short got_key	;
 35247                                          cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1; is there a time-out?
 35248                                          je	short input_key	; no, just go back to input
 35249                                          mov     ah,GET_TIME     ;
 35250                                          int     21h             ; DH = seconds
 35251                                          mov     ah,dh           ;
 35252                                          sub     dh,bh           ; should generally be zero or one
 35253                                          mov     bh,ah           ;
 35254                                          jnc	short got_time	;
 35255                                          mov     dh,1            ; it wrapped back to zero, so assume one
 35256                                  got_time:
 35257                                          or      dh,dh           ; any change?
 35258                                          jz	short input_key	; no
 35259                                          add     [secElapsed],dh ;
 35260                                          jmp	short check_time ;
 35261                                  got_key:
 35262                                          push    ax              ;
 35263                                          mov     ax,-1           ; zap both secTimeOut and secElapsed
 35264                                          xchg    [secTimeOut],ax
 35265                                          cmp     al,-1           ; was time-out already disabled?
 35266                                          je	short timeout_disabled ; yes
 35267                                          push    bx              ; let's disable # seconds display
 35268                                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 35269                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35270                                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be safe
 35271                                          int     10h             ; to completely obliterate # seconds display
 35272                                          pop     bx   		;
 35273                                  
 35274                                  timeout_disabled:
 35275                                          pop     ax              ;
 35276                                          or      al,al           ; extended key pressed?
 35277                                          jnz	short normal_key ; no
 35278                                          int     21h             ; get the next part of the key then
 35279                                          jz	short input_key	; hmmm, what happened to the second part?
 35280                                  
 35281                                          cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?
 35282                                          jne	short not_up	; no
 35283                                          cmp     bl,1            ; are we as up as up can get?
 35284                                          jbe	short input_key	; yes, ignore it
 35285                                          dec     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 35286                                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 35287                                          dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item
 35288                                          jmp     short print1
 35289                                  not_up:
 35290                                          cmp     al,50h          ; down arrow?
 35291                                          jne	short not_down	; no
 35292                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 35293                                          jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 35294                                          inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 35295                                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 35296                                          inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 35297                                  print1: 
 35298                                  	mov     al,bl           ;
 35299                                  print2: 
 35300                                  	call    print_item      ;
 35301                                          call    disp_num        ;
 35302                                  to_input_key:
 35303                                          jmp     input_key       ;
 35304                                  not_down:
 35305                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35306                                          jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 35307                                          cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?
 35308                                          jne	short not_f8	; no
 35309                                          xor     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 35310                                          call    show_status     ;
 35311                                          jmp     input_key	;
 35312                                  not_f8:
 35313                                          cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 35314                                          jne	short to_input_key ; no
 35315                                          mov     bx,-1           ; special return code (-1) indicating clean boot
 35316                                          mov     al,' '          ; don't want to display anything really;
 35317                                          jmp     short disp_input; just want to display the cr/lf sequence...
 35318                                  
 35319                                  normal_key:
 35320                                          cmp     al,0Dh          ; Enter?
 35321                                          je	short select_done ; yes
 35322                                          cmp     al,08h          ; backspace?
 35323                                          jne	short not_backspace ; no
 35324                                          mov     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; yes, special return code
 35325                                          retn			;
 35326                                  not_backspace:
 35327                                          sub     al,'0'          ; is greater than '0'?
 35328                                          jbe	short to_input_key ; no
 35329                                          cmp     al,[bMaxBlock]  ; is less than or equal to the maximum digit?
 35330                                          ja	short to_input_key ; no
 35331                                          mov	[bDefBlock],al  ;
 35332                                          call    print_item      ; redisplay the current selection
 35333                                          mov     bl,al           ; set new selection
 35334                                          jmp	short print2
 35335                                  
 35336                                  select_done:
 35337                                          mov     bh,0            ; return a full 16-bit value (for indexing)
 35338                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 35339                                          add     al,'0'          ; convert it into a digit, then display it
 35340                                  
 35341                                  	; fall into disp_input
 35342                                  
 35343                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35344                                  
 35345                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35346                                  ;
 35347                                  ;   disp_input:  display a single character + cr/lf
 35348                                  ;
 35349                                  ;   INPUT
 35350                                  ;       AL == character to display
 35351                                  ;
 35352                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35353                                  ;       None
 35354                                  ;
 35355                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35356                                  ;       None
 35357                                  ;
 35358                                  ;   NOTES
 35359                                  ;       This function is used not only for the menu input selection but
 35360                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).
 35361                                  ;
 35362                                  ;   HISTORY
 35363                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35364                                  ;
 35365                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35366                                  
 35367                                  disp_input:
 35368                                          push    ax
 35369                                          cmp     al,' '
 35370                                          jae	short disp_ok
 35371                                          mov     al,' '
 35372                                  disp_ok:
 35373                                          mov     dl,al
 35374                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 35375                                          int     21h
 35376                                          mov     dx,crlfm
 35377                                          call    print
 35378                                          pop     ax
 35379                                          retn
 35380                                  
 35381                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35382                                  
 35383                                  disp_num:
 35384                                          push    bx
 35385                                          add     al,'0'
 35386                                          mov     ah,0Ah
 35387                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35388                                          mov     cx,1
 35389                                          int     10h
 35390                                          pop     bx
 35391                                          retn
 35392                                  
 35393                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35394                                  ;
 35395                                  ;   show_status:  display current interactive mode setting (on/off/none)
 35396                                  ;
 35397                                  ;   INPUT
 35398                                  ;       None
 35399                                  ;
 35400                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35401                                  ;       None
 35402                                  ;
 35403                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35404                                  ;       None
 35405                                  ;
 35406                                  ;   NOTES
 35407                                  ;       None
 35408                                  ;
 35409                                  ;   HISTORY
 35410                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35411                                  ;
 35412                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35413                                  
 35414                                  show_status:
 35415                                          push    bx              ; BL = video page #
 35416                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35417                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 35418                                          int     10h             ;
 35419                                          push    dx              ; save it
 35420                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 35421                                          mov     dx,[bLastCol]   ; set correct row/col
 35422                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35423                                          jz	short show_onoff ; just show on/off
 35424                                          mov     dl,0            ;
 35425                                          int     10h             ;
 35426                                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 35427                                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be exact
 35428                                          int     10h             ; to obliterate the status line
 35429                                          jmp     short show_done ;
 35430                                  show_onoff: 
 35431                                          int     10h
 35432                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 35433                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 35434                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)
 35435                                  		; CX = number of times to write character
 35436                                  
 35437                                          mov     al,[_$NO]	; assume OFF
 35438                                          cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; is interactive mode on?
 35439                                          jne	short show_noton ; no
 35440                                          mov     al,[_$YES]	; yes
 35441                                  show_noton:                     ;
 35442                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ; write TTY
 35443                                          int     10h             ;
 35444                                  show_done:                      ;
 35445                                          pop     dx              ;
 35446                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35447                                          int     10h             ; restore original cursor position
 35448                                          pop     bx              ;
 35449                                          retn			;
 35450                                  
 35451                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35452                                  
 35453                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35454                                  ;
 35455                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 35456                                  ;
 35457                                  ;   INPUT
 35458                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35459                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35460                                  ;
 35461                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35462                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 35463                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 35464                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 35465                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35466                                  ;
 35467                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35468                                  ;       AX
 35469                                  ;
 35470                                  ;   NOTES
 35471                                  ;       None
 35472                                  ;
 35473                                  ;   HISTORY
 35474                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35475                                  ;
 35476                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35477                                  
 35478                                  skip_token:
 35479                                          call    get_char
 35480                                          jc	short skip_token_done
 35481                                          call    any_delim
 35482                                          jne	short skip_token
 35483                                  skip_check_eol:
 35484                                          cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 35485                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 35486                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35487                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 35488                                          clc
 35489                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 35490                                  	retn
 35491                                  skip_token_eol:
 35492                                          stc
 35493                                  skip_token_done:
 35494                                          retn
 35495                                  
 35496                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35497                                  ;
 35498                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 35499                                  ;
 35500                                  ;   INPUT
 35501                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35502                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35503                                  ;
 35504                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35505                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35506                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 35507                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 35508                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35509                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 35510                                  ;
 35511                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35512                                  ;       AX
 35513                                  ;
 35514                                  ;   NOTES
 35515                                  ;       None
 35516                                  ;
 35517                                  ;   HISTORY
 35518                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35519                                  ;
 35520                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35521                                  
 35522                                  skip_delim:       ; returns carry set if eol/eof
 35523                                          call    get_char        ;
 35524                                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 35525                                          jc	short skip_token_done ;
 35526                                          call    delim           ;
 35527                                          je	short skip_delim ;
 35528                                          jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 35529                                  
 35530                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35531                                  ;
 35532                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 35533                                  ;
 35534                                  ;   INPUT
 35535                                  ;       AL == last character read
 35536                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35537                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35538                                  ;
 35539                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35540                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35541                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 35542                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 35543                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35544                                  ;
 35545                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35546                                  ;       AX
 35547                                  ;
 35548                                  ;   NOTES
 35549                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 35550                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 35551                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 35552                                  ;
 35553                                  ;   HISTORY
 35554                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35555                                  ;
 35556                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35557                                  
 35558                                  skip_opt_line:
 35559                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35560                                          je	short skip_line_done
 35561                                       
 35562                                  	; fall into skip_line
 35563                                  
 35564                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35565                                  ;
 35566                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 35567                                  ;
 35568                                  ;   INPUT
 35569                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35570                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35571                                  ;
 35572                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35573                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35574                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 35575                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35576                                  ;
 35577                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35578                                  ;       AX
 35579                                  ;
 35580                                  ;   NOTES
 35581                                  ;       None
 35582                                  ;
 35583                                  ;   HISTORY
 35584                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35585                                  ;
 35586                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35587                                  
 35588                                  skip_line:
 35589                                          call    get_char
 35590                                          jc	short skip_line_done
 35591                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35592                                          jne	short skip_line
 35593                                  skip_line_done:
 35594                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 35595                                          retn
 35596                                  
 35597                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35598                                  ;
 35599                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 35600                                  ;
 35601                                  ;   INPUT
 35602                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35603                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35604                                  ;
 35605                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35606                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 35607                                  ;       BX == binary #
 35608                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 35609                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35610                                  ;
 35611                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35612                                  ;       AX
 35613                                  ;
 35614                                  ;   NOTES
 35615                                  ;       None
 35616                                  ;
 35617                                  ;   HISTORY
 35618                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35619                                  ;
 35620                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35621                                  
 35622                                  ; 13/05/2019
 35623                                  
 35624                                  get_number:
 35625                                          sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 35626                                  num_loop:
 35627                                          call    get_char        ;
 35628                                          jc	short num_done	;
 35629                                          cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 35630                                          jb	short num_done	; no more number
 35631                                          cmp     al,'9'          ;
 35632                                          ja	short num_done	;
 35633                                          push    ax              ;
 35634                                          mov     ax,10           ;
 35635                                          push    dx              ;
 35636                                          mul     bx              ;
 35637                                          pop     dx              ;
 35638                                          mov     bx,ax           ;
 35639                                          pop     ax              ;
 35640                                          sub     al,'0'          ;
 35641                                          cbw                     ;
 35642                                          add     bx,ax           ;
 35643                                          jmp	short num_loop	;
 35644                                  
 35645                                  	; 18/12/2022
 35646                                  ;num_done:
 35647                                          ;retn
 35648                                  
 35649                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35650                                  ;
 35651                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 35652                                  ;
 35653                                  ;   INPUT
 35654                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35655                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35656                                  ;
 35657                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35658                                  ;       AL == next character
 35659                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 35660                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35661                                  ;
 35662                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35663                                  ;       AX
 35664                                  ;
 35665                                  ;   NOTES
 35666                                  ;       None
 35667                                  ;
 35668                                  ;   HISTORY
 35669                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35670                                  ;
 35671                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35672                                  
 35673                                  get_char:
 35674                                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 35675                                          jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 35676                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 35677                                  	es	
 35678                                  	lodsb
 35679                                          mov     ah,al           ;
 35680                                          retn			;
 35681                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 35682                                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 35683                                  nearby_ret:
 35684                                          retn
 35685                                  
 35686                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35687                                  ;
 35688                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 35689                                  ;
 35690                                  ;   INPUT
 35691                                  ;       AL == current command code
 35692                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 35693                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 35694                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 35695                                  ;
 35696                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35697                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 35698                                  ;
 35699                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35700                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 35701                                  ;
 35702                                  ;   NOTES
 35703                                  ;       None
 35704                                  ;
 35705                                  ;   HISTORY
 35706                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35707                                  ;
 35708                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35709                                  
 35710                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35711                                  query_user:
 35712                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 35713                                          ;jz	short qu_1		;
 35714                                          ; 12/12/2022
 35715                                  	;jmp	short skip_all		;
 35716                                  	jnz	short skip_all
 35717                                  qu_1:
 35718                                  	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 35719                                          jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 35720                                          push    ax                      ;
 35721                                          mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 35722                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 35723                                          jnz	short query_all		; yes
 35724                                          test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 35725                                          ;jnz	short query_all		;
 35726                                          ; 12/12/2022
 35727                                  	;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 35728                                  	jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 35729                                  query_all:
 35730                                  
 35731                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 35732                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 35733                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 35734                                  
 35735                                          push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 35736                                          mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 35737                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 35738                                          jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 35739                                  
 35740                                          mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 35741                                          sub     bx,bx                   ;
 35742                                          mov     di,comtab		;
 35743                                  find_match:                             ;
 35744                                          mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 35745                                          or      bl,bl                   ;
 35746                                          jz	short line_print	; end of table
 35747                                          inc     di                      ;
 35748                                          cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 35749                                          je	short cmd_match		; yes
 35750                                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 35751                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 35752                                          jmp	short find_match	; loop
 35753                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 35754                                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 35755                                          mov     ch,0                    ;
 35756                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 35757                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 35758                                          mov     al,[di]                 ;
 35759                                          inc     di                      ;
 35760                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 35761                                          int     21h                     ;
 35762                                          loop    cmd_print               ;
 35763                                          mov     dl,'='                  ;
 35764                                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 35765                                          jne	short cmd_notset	;
 35766                                          mov     dl,' '                  ;
 35767                                  cmd_notset:
 35768                                          int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 35769                                  line_print:                             ;
 35770                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 35771                                          es
 35772                                  	lodsb
 35773                                  	or      al,al                   ;
 35774                                          jnz	short non_null		;
 35775                                          mov     al,' '                  ;
 35776                                  non_null:                               ;
 35777                                          cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 35778                                          jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 35779                                          jne	short non_space		;
 35780                                          cmp     byte [es:si],' '	;
 35781                                          jb	short prompt_user	;
 35782                                  non_space:                              ;
 35783                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 35784                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 35785                                          int     21h                     ;
 35786                                          jmp	short line_print	;
 35787                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 35788                                          mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 35789                                  
 35790                                  generic_prompt:
 35791                                          call    print                   ;
 35792                                  input_loop:                             ;
 35793                                          mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 35794                                          int     16h                     ;
 35795                                          or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 35796                                          jnz	short not_func		; no
 35797                                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 35798                                          jne	short input_loop	; no
 35799                                          mov     al,[_$NO]                  ;
 35800                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 35801                                          jmp     short legal_char        ;
 35802                                  not_func:
 35803                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 35804                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 35805                                          je	short legal_char	;
 35806                                          cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 35807                                          je	short legal_char	;
 35808                                          cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 35809                                          je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 35810                                          cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 35811                                          jne	short input_loop	;
 35812                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 35813                                          mov     al,[_$YES]
 35814                                  legal_char:                             ;
 35815                                          call    disp_input              ;
 35816                                          pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 35817                                  
 35818                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 35819                                          je	short skip_cmd		; no
 35820                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35821                                  	clc
 35822                                  do_cmd:
 35823                                  	pop     ax			;
 35824                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35825                                  	; cf=0
 35826                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 35827                                  	retn
 35828                                  
 35829                                  skip_cmd:
 35830                                  	pop     ax			;
 35831                                  skip_all:
 35832                                  	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 35833                                  	stc
 35834                                  	retn
 35835                                  
 35836                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35837                                  ;
 35838                                  ;   print_error: displays multi-config error conditions
 35839                                  ;
 35840                                  ;   INPUT
 35841                                  ;    Carry set to pause, clear to not
 35842                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 35843                                  ;
 35844                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35845                                  ;       None
 35846                                  ;
 35847                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35848                                  ;       None
 35849                                  ;
 35850                                  ;   NOTES
 35851                                  ;       None
 35852                                  ;
 35853                                  ;   HISTORY
 35854                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35855                                  ;
 35856                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35857                                  
 35858                                  print_error:
 35859                                          push    ax
 35860                                          push    bx
 35861                                          push    cx
 35862                                          push    dx
 35863                                          push    ds
 35864                                          push    cs
 35865                                          pop     ds
 35866                                          pushf
 35867                                          call    get_linenum
 35868                                          mov     [linecount],bx
 35869                                          call    error_line
 35870                                          popf
 35871                                          jnc	short pe_ret
 35872                                          mov     dx,_$PauseMsg
 35873                                          call    print
 35874                                          mov     ax,0C07h		; flush input buffer, then wait for key
 35875                                          int     21h			; wait for a key
 35876                                          or      al,al			; extended key?
 35877                                          jnz	short pe_1		; no
 35878                                          mov     ah,07h			; yes
 35879                                          int     21h			; eat it too
 35880                                  pe_1:     
 35881                                  	mov     dx,crlfm
 35882                                          call    print
 35883                                  pe_ret: 
 35884                                  	pop     ds
 35885                                          pop     dx
 35886                                          pop     cx
 35887                                          pop     bx
 35888                                          pop     ax
 35889                                  	retn
 35890                                  
 35891                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35892                                  
 35893                                  ;   This function is very simple:  it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 35894                                  ;   command-line for the shell;  this (undocumented) switch disables
 35895                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 35896                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 35897                                  
 35898                                  disable_autoexec:
 35899                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 35900                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35901                                  
 35902                                  	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 35903                                  	jz	short disable_exit
 35904                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 35905                                  	jnz	short disable_exit
 35906                                  	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 35907                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 35908                                  	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 35909                                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 35910                                  dae_1:
 35911                                          ;mov	al,[def_swchr]
 35912                                  	mov     al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 35913                                          or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 35914                                          jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 35915                                          mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 35916                                          mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 35917                                          mov     cx,bx                   ;
 35918                                          add     bl,3                    ;
 35919                                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 35920                                          ja	short disable_exit	;
 35921                                          mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 35922                                          add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 35923                                          inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 35924                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 35925                                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 35926                                          mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 35927                                          dec     bx                      ;
 35928                                          loop    disable_loop            ;
 35929                                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;
 35930                                  	;mov	word [bx-1],'D ' ; 2044h ; /D is stuffed into place now
 35931                                  	mov	[bx-1],dx  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4C29h		
 35932                                          ;mov	byte [command_line-1],0 ;
 35933                                  disable_exit:                           ;
 35934                                          retn
 35935                                  
 35936                                  CheckQueryOpt:	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.YSYS - SYSINIT:4C2Dh
 35937                                  	cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 35938                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 35939                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],2
 35940                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 35941                                  	or      byte [dae_flag],2
 35942                                  	mov     dx,' Y'
 35943                                  	jmp     short dae_1
 35944                                  
 35945                                  ;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 35946                                  
 35947                                  %endif	; 02/11/2022
 35948                                  
 35949                                  
 35950                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35951                                  
 35952                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35953                                  ;
 35954                                  ; procedure : delim
 35955                                  ;
 35956                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35957                                  
 35958                                  ;	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35959                                  ;
 35960                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35961                                  ;
 35962                                  ;any_delim:
 35963                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 35964                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35965                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 35966                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35967                                  ;       cmp     al,'['
 35968                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35969                                  ;       cmp     al,']'
 35970                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35971                                  ;
 35972                                  ;;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 35973                                  
 35974                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35975                                  	; (SYSINIT:3450h)	
 35976                                  delim:
 35977 00003045 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'		; ibm will assume "/" as an delimeter.
 35978 00003047 7416                    	je	short delim_ret
 35979                                  
 35980 00003049 3C00                    	cmp	al,0		; special case for sysinit!!!
 35981 0000304B 7412                    	je	short delim_ret
 35982                                  
 35983                                  org_delim:			; used by organize routine except for getting
 35984 0000304D 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '          ; the filename.
 35985 0000304F 740E                    	je	short delim_ret
 35986 00003051 3C09                            cmp     al,tab ; 9
 35987 00003053 740A                    	je	short delim_ret
 35988 00003055 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='
 35989 00003057 7406                    	je	short delim_ret
 35990 00003059 3C2C                    	cmp	al,','
 35991 0000305B 7402                    	je	short delim_ret
 35992 0000305D 3C3B                    	cmp	al,';'
 35993                                  
 35994                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35995                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35996                                  ;;   Make sure there's no chance of a false EOF indication
 35997                                  ;	clc
 35998                                  ;;endif
 35999                                  
 36000                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36001                                  delim_ret:
 36002 0000305F C3                      	retn
 36003
