 36024                                  ;
 36025                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36026                                  
 36027                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 36028                                  mapcase:
 36029 0000306D 51                      	push	cx
 36030 0000306E 56                      	push	si
 36031 0000306F 1E                      	push	ds
 36032                                  
 36033 00003070 06                      	push	es
 36034 00003071 1F                      	pop	ds
 36035                                  
 36036                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36037                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36038                                  ;
 36039                                  ;	mov	bl,al                   ; same cmd code this line
 36040                                  ;;else
 36041                                  ;;	xor	si,si
 36042                                  ;;endif
 36043                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36044 00003072 31F6                    	xor	si, si
 36045                                  
 36046                                  convloop:
 36047 00003074 AC                      	lodsb
 36048 00003075 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 36049 00003077 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 36050 00003079 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 36051 0000307B 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 36052 0000307D 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 36053 0000307F 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 36054                                  noconv:
 36055                                  
 36056                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36057                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36058                                  ;;
 36059                                  ;;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 36060                                  ;;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 36061                                  ;;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 36062                                  ;;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 36063                                  ;;
 36064                                  ;       cmp     bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 36065                                  ;       jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 36066                                  ;       cmp     al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 36067                                  ;       je	short convdone		; yes
 36068                                  ;check_eol:
 36069                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 36070                                  ;       je	short convdone
 36071                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 36072                                  ;       je	short convdone
 36073                                  ;;endif
 36074                                  	
 36075                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36076 00003082 E2F0                    	loop	convloop
 36077                                  convdone:
 36078 00003084 1F                      	pop	ds
 36079 00003085 5E                      	pop	si
 36080 00003086 59                      	pop	cx
 36081 00003087 C3                      	retn

 36084                                  ;
 36085                                  ; procedure : round
 36086                                  ;
 36087                                  ; round the values in memlo and memhi to paragraph boundary.
 36088                                  ; perform bounds check.
 36089                                  ;
 36090                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36091                                  
 36092                                  round:
 36093 00003088 50                      	push	ax
 36094 00003089 2EA1[DE03]              	mov	ax,[cs:memlo]
 36095                                  
 36096 0000308D E830E0                  	call	ParaRound		; para round up
 36097                                  
 36098 00003090 2E0106[E003]            	add	[cs:memhi],ax
 36099 00003095 2EC706[DE03]0000        	mov	word [cs:memlo],0
 36100 0000309C 2EA1[E003]              	mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; ax = new memhi
 36101 000030A0 2E3B06[A302]            	cmp	ax,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; if new memhi >= alloclim, error
 36102 000030A5 7322                    	jae	short mem_err
 36103 000030A7 2EF606[3414]02          	test	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],for_devmark ; 2
 36104 000030AD 7418                    	jz	short skip_set_devmarksize
 36105 000030AF 06                      	push	es
 36106 000030B0 56                      	push	si
 36107 000030B1 2E8B36[3214]            	mov	si,[cs:devmark_addr]
 36108 000030B6 8EC6                    	mov	es,si
 36109 000030B8 29F0                    	sub	ax,si
 36110 000030BA 48                      	dec	ax
 36111                                  	;mov	[es:3],ax
 36112 000030BB 26A30300                	mov	[es:devmark.size],ax	; paragraph
 36113 000030BF 2E8026[3414]FD          	and	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],not_for_devmark ; 0FDh
 36114 000030C5 5E                      	pop	si
 36115 000030C6 07                      	pop	es
 36116                                  skip_set_devmarksize:
 36117 000030C7 58                      	pop	ax
 36118                                  	; 11/12/2022
 36119                                  	; cf = 0
 36120                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36121                                  	;clc	; ? (not needed here)	; clear carry
 36122 000030C8 C3                      	retn
 36123

 36167 000030F9 7203                    	jb	short notdig2

 36180                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36181                                  ;
 36182                                  ; procedure : getnum
 36183                                  ;
 36184                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 36185                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 36186                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 36187                                  ;
 36188                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36189                                  
 36190                                  getnum:
 36191 000030FF 53                      	push	bx
 36192 00003100 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 36193                                  b2:
 36194 00003102 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 36195 00003105 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 36196                                  
 36197 00003107 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 36198 00003108 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 36199                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 36200                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36201 00003109 B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 36202 0000310B F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 36203 0000310D 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 36204 0000310E 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 36205 00003110 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 36206 00003113 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 36207                                  
 36208 00003115 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 36209                                  
 36210 00003116 E8E6F5                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 36211 00003119 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 36212 0000311B 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 36213 0000311D 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 36214 0000311F 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 36215 00003121 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 36216 00003123 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 36217 00003125 7417                    	je	short b15
 36218 00003127 2E3A06[2A03]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 36219 0000312C 7410                    	je	short b15
 36220 0000312E 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 36221                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 36222                                  	;nop
 36223                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36224                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36225                                  	;nop
 36226                                  	;nop
 36227 00003130 740C                    	je	short b15
 36228 00003132 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 36229 00003134 7408                    	je	short b15
 36230 00003136 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 36231 00003138 7404                    	je	short b15
 36232 0000313A 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 36233 0000313C 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 36234                                  b15:
 36235 0000313E 2EFF06[D203]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 36236 00003143 2EFF0E[D603]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 36237                                  b1:
 36238 00003148 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 36239 0000314A 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 36240 0000314C 5B                      	pop	bx
 36241 0000314D C3                      	retn
 36242                                  badnum:
 36243                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36244                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 36245 0000314E 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 36246                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 36247 00003150 2EA2[2A03]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 36248 00003154 5B                      	pop	bx
 36249 00003155 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 36250 00003156 C3                      	retn
 36251                                  
 36252                                  ;****************************************************************************
 36253                                  
 36254                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 36255                                  
 36256                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36257                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 36258                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 36259                                  ;	si = 0
 36260                                  ;	ax = country id
 36261                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 36262                                  ;	bx = file handle
 36263                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 36264                                  ;
 36265                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 36266                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 36267                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 36268                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 36269                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36270                                  
 36271 00003157 57                      	push	di
 36272 00003158 50                      	push	ax
 36273 00003159 52                      	push	dx
 36274                                  
 36275 0000315A 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 36276 0000315C 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 36277 0000315E B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 36278 00003161 E84F01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 36279 00003164 724D                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36280                                  
 36281 00003166 06                      	push	es
 36282 00003167 56                      	push	si
 36283                                  
 36284 00003168 0E                      	push	cs
 36285 00003169 07                      	pop	es
 36286                                  
 36287 0000316A BF[1334]                	mov	di,country_file_signature ; db 0FFh,'COUNTRY'
 36288 0000316D B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature
 36289 00003170 F3A6                    	repz	cmpsb
 36290                                  
 36291 00003172 5E                      	pop	si
 36292 00003173 07                      	pop	es
 36293 00003174 753D                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 36294                                  
 36295 00003176 83C612                  	add	si,18			;si -> county info type
 36296 00003179 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 36297 0000317C 7535                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 36298                                  
 36299 0000317E 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 36300 0000317F 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 36301 00003181 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 36302 00003184 B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 36303 00003187 E82901                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 36304 0000318A 7227                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36305                                  
 36306 0000318C 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the # of country, codepage combination entries
 36307 0000318E 81F9B601                	cmp	cx, 438			;cannot handle more than 438 entries.
 36308 00003192 771F                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 36309                                  
 36310 00003194 46                      	inc	si
 36311 00003195 46                      	inc	si			;si -> entry information packet
 36312 00003196 5A                      	pop	dx			;restore code page id
 36313 00003197 58                      	pop	ax			;restore country id
 36314 00003198 5F                      	pop	di
 36315                                  
 36316                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 36317 00003199 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 36318 0000319C 750A                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 36319                                  
 36320 0000319E 83FA00                  	cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?
 36321 000031A1 7415                    	je	short setdoscntry_any_codepage ;then no need to match code page id.
 36322 000031A3 3B5404                  	cmp	dx,[si+4]		;compare code page id
 36323 000031A6 7413                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it
 36324                                  
 36325                                  setdoscntry_next:
 36326 000031A8 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;next entry
 36327 000031AA 46                      	inc	si
 36328 000031AB 46                      	inc	si			;take a word for size of entry itself
 36329 000031AC E2EB                    	loop	setdoscntry_find
 36330                                  
 36331 000031AE B9FFFF                  	mov	cx,-1			;signals that bad country id entered.
 36332                                  setdoscntry_fail:
 36333 000031B1 F9                      	stc
 36334 000031B2 C3                      	retn
 36335                                  
 36336                                  setdosdata_fail:
 36337 000031B3 5E                      	pop	si
 36338 000031B4 59                      	pop	cx
 36339 000031B5 5F                      	pop	di
 36340 000031B6 EBF9                    	jmp	short setdoscntry_fail
 36341                                  
 36342                                  setdoscntry_any_codepage:		;use the code_page_id of the country_id found.
 36343 000031B8 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]
 36344                                  
 36345                                  setdoscntry_got_it:			;found the matching entry
 36346 000031BB 2E8916[1B34]            	mov	[cs:cntrycodepage_id],dx ;save code page id for this country.
 36347 000031C0 8B540A                  	mov	dx,[si+10]		;get the file offset of country data
 36348 000031C3 8B4C0C                  	mov	cx,[si+12]
 36349 000031C6 B80002                  	mov	ax,512 			;read 512 bytes
 36350 000031C9 E8E700                  	call	readincontrolbuffer
 36351 000031CC 72E3                    	jc	short setdoscntry_fail
 36352                                  
 36353 000031CE 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the number of entries to handle.

 36359 000031D3 51                      	push	cx			;save # of entry left

 36361

 36363 000031D8 E8AA00                  	call	getcountrydestination	;get the address of destination in es:di

 36365

 36367 000031E0 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 36368 000031E3 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 36369 000031E6 F9                      	stc
 36370 000031E7 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 36371 000031E9 72C8                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36372                                  
 36373 000031EB BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 36374 000031EE B91400                  	mov	cx,20			;read 20 bytes only. we only need to
 36375 000031F1 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;look at the length of the data in the file.
 36376 000031F3 F9                      	stc
 36377 000031F4 CD21                    	int	21h			;read the country.sys data
 36378 000031F6 72BB                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail 	;read failure
 36379                                  
 36380 000031F8 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 36381 000031FA 75B7                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail ; 13/05/2019
 36382                                  
 36383 000031FC 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data again.
 36384 000031FF 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 36385 00003202 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 36386 00003205 F9                      	stc
 36387 00003206 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer back again
 36388 00003208 72A9                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36389                                  
 36390 0000320A 56                      	push	si
 36391 0000320B BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;get length of the data from the file
 36392 0000320E 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]
 36393 00003210 5E                      	pop	si
 36394 00003211 BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 36395 00003214 83C10A                  	add	cx,10			;signature + a word for the length itself
 36396 00003217 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read the data from the file.
 36397 00003219 F9                      	stc
 36398 0000321A CD21                    	int	21h
 36399 0000321C 7295                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36400                                  
 36401 0000321E 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 36402 00003220 7591                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail
 36403

 36405 00003225 BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;si-> data buffer + id tag field
 36406 00003228 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the length of the file
 36407 0000322A 41                      	inc	cx			;take care of a word for lenght of tab
 36408 0000322B 41                      	inc	cx			;itself.
 36409 0000322C 81F9F805                	cmp	cx,(2048-512-8)	; 1528	;fit into the buffer?
 36410 00003230 7781                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail

 36414                                  	;endif

 36416 00003235 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;is the data for setcountryinfo table?
 36417 00003237 7512                    	jne	short setdoscntry_mov 	;no, don't worry
 36418                                  
 36419 00003239 26FF7518                	push	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen]  
 36420                                  	;push	word [es:di+24]		;cannot destroy ccmono_ptr address. save them.
 36421 0000323D 26FF751A                	push	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen+2] 
 36422                                  	;push	word [es:di+26]		;at this time di -> cccountryinfolen
 36423

 36425

 36439 00003256 268F4518                	pop	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen] 
 36440                                  	;pop	word [es:di+24]

 36444 0000325B 59                      	pop	cx			;restore # of entries left
 36445 0000325C 5F                      	pop	di			;restore pointer to dso_country_cdpg
 36446 0000325D 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;try to get the next entry
 36447 0000325F 46                      	inc	si
 36448 00003260 46                      	inc	si			;take a word of entry length itself
 36449 00003261 49                      	dec	cx
 36450 00003262 83F900                  	cmp	cx,0
 36451 00003265 741D                    	je	short setdoscntry_ok
 36452 00003267 E968FF                  	jmp	setdoscntry_data
 36453

 36465 0000326E 26833D00                	cmp	word [es:di],0		; zero byte data block?
 36466 00003272 7410                    	je	short sdbcsbc		; jump if so
 36467

 36486                                  getcountrydestination:
 36487                                  
 36488                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 36489                                  ;input: al - data id
 36490                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 36491                                  ;on return:
 36492                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 36493                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 36494                                  
 36495 00003285 51                      	push	cx
 36496                                  	;add	di,74
 36497 00003286 83C74A                  	add	di,country_cdpg_info.ccNumber_of_entries	
 36498                                  					;skip the reserved area, syscodepage etc.

 36500 0000328C 47                      	inc	di
 36501 0000328D 47                      	inc	di			;si -> the first start entry id
 36502                                  
 36503                                  getcntrydest:

 36535                                  
 36536                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 36537                                  
 36538                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 36539                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 36540                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 36541                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 36542                                  ;	 be moved.
 36543                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 36544                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 36545                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 36546                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 36547                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 36548                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 36549                                  
 36550 000032B3 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 36551 000032B4 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 36552 000032B7 F9                      	stc
 36553 000032B8 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 36554 000032BA 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 36555 000032BB 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 36556                                  
 36557 000032BD 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 36558 000032BF 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 36559 000032C1 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 36560 000032C3 F9                      	stc
 36561 000032C4 CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 36562                                  ricb_exit:
 36563 000032C6 C3                      	retn
 36564

 36566                                  
 36567                                  set_country_path:
 36568                                  
 36569                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 36570                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 36571                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 36572                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 36573                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 36574                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 36575                                  
 36576 000032C7 56                      	push	si
 36577                                  
 36578 000032C8 1E                      	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 36579 000032C9 06                      	push	es

 36582

 36585                                  
 36586 000032D1 8A04                    	mov	al,[si]
 36587 000032D3 46                      	inc	si
 36588 000032D4 46                      	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"

 36591                                  scp_default_drv:
 36592 000032D7 B419                    	mov	ah,19h
 36593 000032D9 CD21                    	int	21h
 36594 000032DB 0441                    	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 36595                                  
 36596                                  scp_setdrv:
 36597 000032DD 2EA2[D033]              	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 36598 000032E1 BF[D333]                	mov	di,cntry_path
 36599 000032E4 8A04                    	mov	al,[si]
 36600 000032E6 3C5C                    	cmp	al, "\"
 36601 000032E8 7406                    	je	short scp_root_dir
 36602                                  
 36603 000032EA 3C2F                    	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 36604 000032EC 7402                    	je	short scp_root_dir
 36605                                  
 36606 000032EE EB01                    	jmp	short scp_path
 36607                                  
 36608                                  scp_root_dir:
 36609 000032F0 4F                      	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 36610                                  scp_path:
 36611 000032F1 E81F00                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 36612                                  
 36613 000032F4 BF[D033]                	mov	di,cntry_drv
 36614                                  scpath_exit:
 36615                                  
 36616 000032F7 1E                      	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 36617 000032F8 06                      	push	es
 36618 000032F9 1F                      	pop	ds
 36619 000032FA 07                      	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 36620                                  
 36621 000032FB 5E                      	pop	si
 36622 000032FC C3                      	retn
 36623

 36626                                  chk_drive_letter:
 36627                                  
 36628                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 36629                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 36630                                  ;carry set if not.

 37267                                  DOSLOADSEG	equ SYSINITSEG+((SYSINITSIZE+15)/16)
